and DT industry ’s future uncertain . ” And while DT Amazonification of our economy ploughs full steam ahead , independent shops and services are pounded into dust , while JJ services are shut down , Misinformation and fear are some of DT biggest reasons parents are refusing to VB their kids vaccinated . Getty Images Rebekah Ficco was terrified of NNS . She experienced a miscarriage with her first pregnancy , and when she was able to VB pregnant again , she was determined to protect her baby . “ I did n’t VB to do anything to jeopardize this , so I poured into reading , ” Ficco told Healthline . “ And when PRP ’re a JJ parent , PRP come across all this information . PRP must be getting paid by big pharma . I walked out saying I MD never vaccinate my kids , ” she VBD . Ficco ’s initial hesitation to vaccinate her child is n’t uncommon . Another concern parents voiced was DT idea of overloading NNS ’s immune systems with too JJ NNS at once . Several had opted for alternative NN schedules in order to avoid this . text: Researchers worldwide are racing to develop potential NNS and drugs to fight DT JJ NN , called SARS - Cov - 2 . Now , a group of researchers has figured out DT molecular structure of a key protein WDT DT uses to invade human cells , potentially opening DT door to DT development of a NN , according to JJ findings . Previous research revealed IN coronaviruses invade cells through so - called " spike " proteins , but those proteins take on different shapes in different coronaviruses . Figuring out DT shape of DT spike protein in SARS - Cov - 2 is DT key to figuring out how to target DT NN , VBD Jason McLellan , senior author of DT NN and an associate professor of molecular biosciences at DT University of Texas at Austin . Though DT NN uses JJ different proteins to replicate and invade cells , DT spike protein is DT major surface protein WDT PRP uses to bind to a receptor — another protein WDT acts IN a doorway into a human cell . After DT spike protein binds to DT human cell receptor , DT viral membrane fuses with DT human cell membrane , allowing DT genome of DT NN to enter human cells and begin infection . So " if PRP can prevent attachment and fusion , PRP will prevent entry , " McLellan told Live NNP . But to target this protein , PRP need to VB what PRP looks IN . Related : VBG viral : 6 JJ findings about viruses Earlier this month , researchers of SARS - Cov - 2 . Using DT genome , McLellan and his team , in collaboration with DT National Institutes of NNP ( NIH ) , identified DT specific genes WDT code for DT spike protein . PRP then sent DT gene information to a company WDT created DT genes and sent them back . DT group then injected those genes into mammalian cells in a lab dish and those cells produced DT spike proteins . Next , using a very detailed microscopy technique called cryogenic electron microscopy , DT group created a 3D " map , " or " blueprint , " of DT spike proteins . DT blueprint revealed DT structure of DT molecule , mapping DT location of each of its atoms in space . " PRP 's impressive IN these researchers were able to VB DT structure so quickly , " VBD Aubree Gordon , an associate professor of epidemiology at DT University of Michigan who was not a part of DT NN . " PRP 's a very important step forward and MD help in DT development of a NN against SARS - COV - 2 . " Stephen Morse , a professor at Columbia University 's Mailman School of NNP NNP who was RB not a part of DT NN agrees . DT spike protein " MD be DT likely choice for rapid development of NN antigens " and treatments , he told Live NNP in an email . Knowing DT structure MD be " very helpful in developing NNS and antibodies with good activity , " as MD producing higher quantities of these proteins , he added . DT team is sending these atomic " coordinates " to dozens of research groups around DT NN who are working to develop NNS and drugs to target SARS - CoV - 2 . Meanwhile , McLellan and his team hope to use DT map of DT spike protein as DT basis for a . When foreign invaders , such as or , invade DT body , immune cells fight back by producing proteins called antibodies . These antibodies bind to specific structures on DT foreign invader , called DT antigen . But producing antibodies can take NN . NNS are dead or weakened antigens WDT train DT immune system to create these antibodies before DT body is exposed to DT NN . In theory , DT spike protein itself " MD be either DT NN or variants of a NN , " McLellan VBD . When PRP inject this spike - protein - based NN , " humans MD make antibodies against DT spike , and then if PRP were ever exposed to DT live NN , " DT body MD be prepared , he added . Based on previous research PRP did on other coronaviruses , DT researchers introduced mutations , or changes to create a more stable molecule . Indeed , " DT molecule looks really good ; PRP 's really well behaved ; DT structure kind of demonstrates IN DT molecule is stable in DT correct confirmation WDT PRP were hoping for , " McLellan VBD . " So now PRP and others will use DT molecule WDT PRP created as a basis for NN antigen . " Their colleagues at DT NIH will now inject these spike proteins into animals to see how well DT proteins trigger antibody production . Still , McLellan thinks a NN is likely about 18 to 24 months away . DT 's " still quite fast compared to normal NN development , which might take UH 10 NNS , " he VBD . DT findings were published today ( Feb. CD ) in DT journal .

text: In DT early days of 2017 , proponents of NN were deeply concerned . Donald NNP , who has long espoused a debunked link between NNS and NN , was set to enter DT White House . He met with environmental activist Robert Kennedy Jr. , who has for NNS argued IN NNS can cause a range of developmental and other NN conditions . Kennedy emerged to report he ’d been asked to chair a commission into NN safety . But seven months later , no such commission has been appointed and DT crisis - mired White House has declined to say whether DT plan has been shelved . STAT contacted Kennedy to see where plans stood . He MD only speak on condition IN STAT publish DT interview in a Q&A format . He argued IN his assertions — which are disputed as a misreading of DT scientific literature by JJ mainstream NNS — have been misquoted and misrepresented in DT NN . Here is STAT ’s conversation with Kennedy . PRP has been lightly edited , for length and readability . DT question I VBP to ask PRP relates to DT NN safety commission WDT PRP had announced in January IN PRP were VBG to head , after PRP met with then NNP - elect NNP . PRP ’s been a number of months now , and EX has n’t been any further JJ announcement . And so PRP ’ve been wondering : Where does this stand ? I ’ve had no discussions specifically about DT NN safety commission , probably since February . I ’ve spoken to DT White House about other issues of NN safety and had a number of follow - up meetings . Can I ask PRP who PRP met with ? Well , I ’ve met with high - level officials in DT White House . PRP ’ve arranged meetings for me with HHS and White House officials and agency officials . Various agency officials , including [ NIH Director ] Francis Collins and his deputy , Lawrence Tabak , I VBP . And I met with Tony Fauci , who ’s at DT National Institute of Allergy and Infectious Diseases . Linda Birnbaum , who ’s at DT National Institute of Environmental NNP Sciences . Diana Bianchi , at DT Eunice Kennedy Shriver National Institute of Child NNP and Human Development at NIH . And over at FDA I ’ve met with Peter Marks , DT director of [ DT Center for Biologics Evaluation and Research ] and some other officials RB . I ca n’t remember everybody at this point , all of DT NNS WDT PRP ’ve met with . And this is since DT NN of DT administration ? Yeah . DT White House officials and DT HHS officials accompanied me . I did PRP at their request . At “ their ” request ? Who is PRP ? So PRP VBD PRP ’ve had no discussions since February about DT NN safety commission ? Not specifically about DT commission . OK . Do PRP VB DT idea is dead ? Or do PRP VB PRP ’s in abeyance ? PRP ’d have to ask DT White House . PRP MD be IN PRP ’s evolved . I ’ve been told IN DT NN is still interested in this issue and IN he wants me to have further meetings with DT regulatory agencies and with DT White House . IN I VBD , I have not talked to anybody in DT White House about DT commission . Do PRP VB EX ’s a possibility DT commission is VBG ahead but not with PRP on PRP ? Again , PRP ’d have to ask DT White House . Do PRP VB to talk about NN safety NN at all ? I have n’t finished asking questions about this . Are PRP disappointed IN so far EX has n’t been a commission set up to do what PRP VBD PRP were VBG to be doing in January ? DT commission was not my idea . I was asked to chair a commission and I agreed IN if DT commission were created IN I MD do DT , I MD sit on PRP . [ But ] DT ’s up to DT White House how PRP VBP to handle this issue . PRP was n’t my idea . I am happy with any steps WDT are taken to make NNS safer and to improve DT scientific integrity around DT process . To reform DT process so IN NNS are subject to DT same kind of safety scrutiny and safety testing WDT other drugs are subject to . PRP need to , prior to licensing NNS , PRP need to do gold standard safety testing , IN every other drug approval requires . PRP need to do double - blind placebo testing . Because particularly when PRP comes to injecting aluminum or mercury into babies , DT consequences MD be latent . In other words , PRP MD not manifest or diagnosed to age 3 or 4 . So DT current protocols , which require testing for NNS of sometimes as little as 48 hours , are not VBG to disclose DT kind of dangers WDT DT NN and DT regulators ought to VB about . DT hepatitis B NNS WDT are currently approved had fewer than five days of safety testing . DT means IN if DT child has a seizure on DT sixth day , PRP ’s never seen . If DT child dies , PRP ’s never seen . If DT child gets food allergies or ADD or ADHD , which do n’t manifest for four or five NNS or are n’t diagnosed or NN , which usually is n’t diagnosed until age 4 , DT regulators will never see DT prior to licensing DT NN . If something happened four or five NNS out from an event , how do PRP VB which event to attribute PRP to ? Well , DT answer to DT question , of course , is double - blind placebo testing . PRP have a control group and PRP have a NN group . Sir , DT ’s done all DT NN . DT is done all DT NN . NNS are tested DT way all DT NN . PRP ’re wrong about DT . PRP is not required for NNS . So most of DT NNS — and I VBP this is surprising to PRP , and PRP ’s shocking to most NNS , because journalists VBP yourself assume IN NNS are encountering DT same kind of rigorous safety testing as other drugs , including multiyear double - blind placebo testing . But DT fact is IN NNS do n’t . And DT reason for DT is PRP ’re classified as biologics . I ’ve read a lot of NN studies . And PRP are double - blind placebo tested . No , PRP ’re wrong about DT . … But in any case , none of them have more than a few months of double - blind placebo testing , which will not allow PRP to spot illnesses IN NN WDT are n’t diagnosed before five NNS . Second of all , in most NNS , for example DT Gardasil NN , PRP do n’t use true placebos . MD PRP move actually back to DT questions WDT I wanted to ask ? [ Inaudible ] aluminum adjuvant WDT ’s highly neurotoxic . So how can PRP VB whether , if PRP do n’t use a true placebo , how can PRP determine whether DT NN is safe . So I had some questions I wanted to ask PRP , and in a Q& A WDT ’s DT way PRP works . I ask some questions , PRP answer DT questions or do n’t answer if PRP VBP . I was wondering , in DT NN since PRP spoke to DT NN in January and he asked PRP to chair DT NN safety commission , DT senior HHS positions have been filled . All of them are on DT record as supporting NNS . I was wondering if DT ’s disappointing to PRP . Well , I VBP regulators WDT are willing to look at DT NN . And who are conversant with DT safety NN , who are conversant with DT vast scientific literature WDT is now published , available on PubMed , which indicates IN JJ — particularly mercury and aluminum in NNS — need to be reassessed . And as I VBD , I ’ve been having meetings with DT regulators to urge them to do DT kind of testing . I did VB to ask PRP as well if PRP had any qualms doing this work for NNP NNP . His administration is taking some steps at DT EPA IN NNS who are concerned about DT environment find very unsettling . Given DT , I was wondering if PRP had any qualms about working with him , because PRP ’re so renowned as an environmentalist . I do n’t VB NNP NNP ’s environmental policies , and I MD not endorse them . I MD say IN NNP NNP ’s administration is essentially destroying 30 NNS of my work on environmental issues , and DT work of JJ other NNS . And I ’ve written extensively about DT . And I VBP NNS understand IN my position is clear and IN my work on NN safety and JJ NN and child safety is not an endorsement of NNP NNP ’s environmental policies . Have PRP made your position known to him ? Have PRP had DT chance to express those views to him ? Well , in my initial meeting with him , PRP had DT discussion . And he knows my position . And he ’s known my position for JJ NNS . … I do n’t VB EX ’s any question with him or with any member of DT administration WDT I ’m opposed to [ EPA Administrator ] Scott Pruitt and I ’m opposed to walking away from [ DT ] Paris [ Agreement ] . … If NNP NNP asked me to serve on a commission on fracking or on pipelines or on JJ NN , I MD do PRP . Can I just ask — and I VBP this will be my last question — PRP ’ve mentioned mercury a lot of times . Thimerosal [ a mercury - based preservative ] is not in most NNS given to NNS at this point . And in fact has not been in childhood NNS in DT NNP NNPS since 2001 , I believe . PRP VBP , studies have RB shown IN since PRP ’s been taken out , NN rates have increased , which MD suggest IN EX is n’t a correlation , and DT ’s what most NNS say . But why do PRP keep talking about mercury when NNS are n’t getting exposed to PRP in childhood NNS ? DT is an industry talking point . DT just simply is n’t true . Mercury was taken out of three pediatric NNS , DTaP , Hib , and hepatitis B in 2003 . But DT same NN PRP was , CDC recommended NN shots for pregnant women and for NNS 6 months of age and during every NN of life . And for most of DT past 15 NNS , virtually all of those NN shots [ inaudible ] . … Since 2004 , so DT MD be , I guess , 13 NNS , most NN shots were loaded with mega doses of mercury . Thimerosal is only in [ NN NN packaged in ] multidose vials . PRP ’s not in NN WDT ’s packaged in a syringe already and PRP was never in FluMist , DT live attenuated NN . Well , here are DT numbers . And DT numbers VBP every NN . I VBP in 2012 , EX were 185 million doses of NN doses manufactured in this country . And I VBP fewer than 10 million were thimerosal - free . Over 90 percent had huge , huge doses of mercury . Not trace amounts as DT industry likes to claim . Trace amounts means less than 1 microgram . PRP contain 25 micrograms , which is 25 times trace amount and over 100 times what EPA ’s safe exposure levels are . … So today , in DT last three or four NNS , DT number has been reduced to 48 million . Which number has been reduced to 48 million ? I believe this NN EX were 150 , around 150 million NN doses manufactured and 48 million of those , or a third , were loaded with mercury . And when PRP say this NN are PRP talking about 2016 - 17 ? Or are PRP talking about DT coming … 2016 . DT ’s a national NN crisis right RB . Mercury is 100 times more toxic , neurotoxic , than lead . Why MD PRP inject DT into a little baby or pregnant women ? PRP ’s insane . EX ’s been an Institute of Medicine report … No , no . No , IOM ’s 2004 report did not exonerate mercury . DT only thing WDT IOM did is PRP looked at a series of epidemiological studies WDT had been recently created by CDC and based upon , and PRP only dealt with CD issue , which was NN . So all of DT other injuries WDT are known to be caused by thimerosal , including ADD , ADHD , SIDS , speech delays , language delay … none of these have ever been studied .

text: NN encompasses a broad range of conditions characterized by challenges with social skills , communication and repetitive behaviors . NN is a spectrum disorder , meaning DT symptoms can be classified in terms of their position on a scale . NNP Speaks points out EX is not just CD type of NN but JJ subtypes influenced by a combination of genetic and environmental factors . Each individual has a distinct set of strengths and challenges affecting how PRP learn , VBP and problem - solve . In some NNS , NNS with NN spectrum disorder ( ASD ) require significant support , while others can live independently and hold high - functioning positions . Several factors are thought to influence DT development of DT condition . PRP ’s widely known IN autistic NNS often suffer from gastrointestinal ( GI ) problems , with those experiencing DT worst GI problems often having DT most severe NNS of NN . Recent research again highlights DT intriguing link between DT gut and DT brain , and how dysfunction in DT gut - brain axis influences ASD traits . In most NNS , symptoms of ASD appear by age 2 or 3 , although symptoms of associated developmental delays MD appear even earlier . In DT late 1970s , researchers discovered pairs of identical twins often shared ASD , demonstrating DT condition has a genetic component . However , genetics are by far not DT only , or even primary , risk factor . Research from Stanford University School of Medicine , published in 2011 , which again looked at twins , discovered fraternal ( dizygotic ) twins were more likely to share an NN diagnosis than identical ( monozygotic ) twins . Fraternal twins share only half their DNA , while identical twins share 99.99 % , which means something other than genetics is responsible for DT higher rate of double diagnoses among fraternal twins . According to DT researchers , environmental factors are DT most likely culprit . In conclusion , PRP stated IN “ Susceptibility to ASD has moderate genetic heritability and a substantial shared twin environmental component . ” This is not an entirely surprising finding . EX is no such thing as a genetic epidemic ; hence genetics simply cannot be used as an explanation for DT exponential growth in NN NNS . Indeed , research published in 2008 found de novo mutations ( JJ mutations WDT spontaneously arise ) associated with NN were present in just 1 % of NNS diagnosed with NN . Instead , DT majority of NN NNS appear to result from DT activation or expression of a number of different genes , and EX are several epigenetic and environmental factors WDT can trigger them . Among them : • Toxic exposures , such as DT heavy metals aluminum and mercury from contaminated NN food and NNS , toxic microbes such as viruses and mold , glyphosate and electromagnetic fields from cellphones and Wi-Fi , just to name a few . • Brain inflammation triggered by encephalitis following NN , defective placenta , immature blood - brain barrier , immune response to DT mother to infection while pregnant , premature birth and toxins in DT environment . • Gut inflammation triggered by an imbalanced microbiome . Contributing factors include C-section , abnormal microbiome in DT mother , bottle - feeding with infant formula and a processed food diet . Russian neurologist Dr. Natasha Campbell - McBride believes brain toxicity stemming from gut toxicity , otherwise known as Gut and Psychology Syndrome ( GAPS ) , is a key factor WDT sets DT stage for NN , especially when NNS are added into DT mix . According to Campbell - McBride , toxicity flowing from DT child ’s gut clogs DT brain with toxicity , preventing PRP from performing its normal function and process sensory information . As mentioned , recent research confirms and further strengthens DT theory IN DT gut plays an important role in DT development of ASD . According to this NN , published in DT journal NNP Research : In other words , genetic mutations found in both DT gut and DT brain MD be a primary culprit . Mutation in DT neuroligin‐3 R451C has previously been shown to alter synaptic function in DT hippocampus and cortex , resulting in impaired social behavior . Other research has shown neuroligin - 3 mutations can RB trigger “ specialized cognitive abilities ” seen in some autistic NNS . Previous research has RB linked DT mutation to gut dysfunction . Lead investigator Elisa Hill - Yardin , associate professor at RMIT University in Melbourne , Australia , told Neuroscience NNP : DT featured NN builds on earlier research , including unpublished clinical work by Swedish , Danish and French researchers . Neuroscience NNP reports : Even without a genetic component , DT gut microbiome appears to play an important role in ASD . In a 2013 PLOS CD NN , researchers analyzed DT microbial content of fecal samples from 20 healthy and 20 autistic NNS , finding distinct differences between DT two groups . As reported by NNP NNP Today : DT researchers noted DT autistic NNS ’s gut microflora had reduced richness and diversity , which are essential factors in creating a bacterial community capable of dealing with environmental assaults . In other words , having an imbalanced gut microbiome MD render these NNS more susceptible to DT adverse effects of environmental toxins . CD of DT lead authors told NNP NNP , “ PRP believe IN a diverse gut is a healthy gut , ” and suggested IN antibiotics , which MD eliminate beneficial bacteria and have been found to be administered more often in DT first three NNS of life among autistic NNS compared to nonautistic NNS , MD play a key role . DT GAPS protocol MD be DT answer for JJ Campbell - McBride ’s research shows EX ’s a profound dynamic interaction between your gut , brain and immune system . She has developed what might be CD of DT most profoundly important treatment strategies for preventing NN . In her research , Campbell - McBride discovered IN nearly all of DT mothers of autistic NNS have abnormal gut flora , which is significant because newborns inherit their gut flora from their mothers at DT NN of birth . Establishing normal gut flora in DT first 20 days or so of life plays a crucial role in DT maturation of your baby ’s immune system . Babies who develop abnormal gut flora are left with compromised immune systems , putting them at higher risk for suffering NN reactions . If your baby has suboptimal gut flora , NNS can become DT proverbial “ last straw ” — DT trigger WDT “ primes ” his / her immune system to develop chronic NN problems . DT good NN is PRP can rather inexpensively identify GAPS within DT first weeks of your baby ’s life , which can help PRP make better - informed decisions about vaccinations , and about how to proceed to set your child on DT path to NN . DT entire process for identifying NNS who MD be at risk for developing NN from a NN is described in her book “ Gut and Psychology Syndrome , ” but to sum PRP up , in her practice she starts out by collecting a complete NN history of DT parents , and their gut NN is assessed . Then , within DT first few days of life , DT stool of DT child is analyzed to determine DT NN of DT baby ’s gut flora , followed by a urine test to check for metabolites . Together , this can give PRP a picture of DT NN of your child ’s immune system . These tests are available in most laboratories around DT NN . If DT test results are normal , DT risk of NN after NN is significantly reduced . If PRP find IN your baby has abnormal microflora , or begins to develop symptoms of NN , DT GAPS program should be started immediately , as DT younger DT child is when PRP start DT treatment , DT better DT results . DT child RB should not be given any NNS until their gut microbiome tests normal . Identifying abnormal gut flora early on is crucial to protecting your child ’s NN Campbell - McBride reversed her own son ’s NN using dietary changes and detoxification , and her hypothesis is in my view CD of DT most relevant . I believe her GAPS nutritional protocol is important for most NNS these days , as a majority have poor gut NN due to poor diet and toxic exposures , but PRP ’s particularly crucial for pregnant women and young NNS . DT best way to prevent GAPS in DT first place is for DT mother to avoid all processed foods , sugar , antibiotics and birth control pills before conception as these cause yeast and fungi to grow and RB cause leaky gut . This can then be followed by breastfeeding and avoiding DT use of antibiotics during ( intrapartum ) and after delivery . Another important factor is vitamin D deficiency — especially in conjunction with damaged gut microbiome . Optimizing your vitamin D levels and your gut flora before and during pregnancy MD be two of DT most important prevention strategies discovered to date . For other strategies WDT can be helpful in DT prevention and treatment of NN , see “ DT autistic brain : Thinking across DT spectrum . ” ** This article ( Research confirms gut - brain connection in NN ) was originally published at Mercola.com .**

text: At 15 months old , Michelle Cedillo was a bright - eyed , cheery toddler who cooed her favorite words IN “ mommy ” and “ kitty . ” DT month Michelle had a routine NN against measles , mumps and rubella . She came down with a fever WDT lasted four days and , according to her parents , resulted in a drastic NN . “ She did not respond to her name any longer , ” says her mother , Theresa Cedillo . “ She did n’t look at PRP . She did n’t talk . ” Michelle was later diagnosed with a severe case of NN — DT neurological disorder WDT affects CD in 150 American NNS — and , 11 NNS later , her parents are still trying to figure out what went wrong . On June 11 a claim filed by DT Cedillo family against DT Department of NNP & Human Services , which maintains a fund to compensate NNS injured by NNS , went to trial in Washington , D.C. DT family claims IN thimerosal , a mercury - based preservative once common in childhood vaccinations ( PRP was phased out starting in 1999 as a precautionary measure but is still used in some NN NNS ) , in addition to their daughter ’s MMR shot , somehow triggered her NN . Their case before DT nation ’s so - called NN court is DT first of 4,800 claims linking NN and childhood shots to be heard by DT three judges . DT results are being closely watched by thousands of families desperate to understand what NNS have so far been unable to explain : What causes their NNS ’s NN ? DT debate has already turned bitter , including at DT leading advocacy group , NNP Speaks , where cofounders Bob and Suzanne Wright have clashed with their daughter Katie , who insists vaccinations caused her own son ’s NN . “ EX ’s a lot of kids in this country who have literally been poisoned by DT recommended NN program in DT NNP NNPS , ” says Wendy Fournier of DT National NNP Association . Nearly all academic and NN NNS , though , say EX is no link . A 2004 NN by DT Institute of Medicine ’s Immunization Safety Review Committee reached DT same conclusion . “ PRP MD find no evidence of a biological mechanism by which either thimerosal or MMR MD cause NN , ” says Dr. Marie McCormick of Harvard ’s School of NNP NNP , who led DT NN . While DT search for a cause continues ( see box ) , DT arguments rage on . DT Cedillos ’ attorney Kevin Conway , whose firm is handling about 1,200 NN NNS , says DT mercury in thimerosal from numerous shots , for such diseases as hepatitis B and diphtheria , suppressed Michelle ’s immune system at a vulnerable stage of development . Then , according to DT family ’s claim , Michelle received a measles NN in late 1995 , which because of DT child ’s weakened immune system was able to travel through her bloodstream to DT brain , where PRP caused inflammation and brought on NN . DT family RB blames DT measles NN for Michelle ’s severe gastrointestinal problems . Because of DT thimerosal , says Conway , “ she was unable to clear DT measles NN in DT NN [ from her system ] . ” Attorneys representing DT NN are likely to attack DT Cedillos ’ theory on several fronts . Chemicals , including DT small amounts of thimerosal once found in NNS , are typically flushed from DT body within a week , says Peter Hotez , chair of microbiology , immunology and tropical medicine at George Washington University . Dr. Samuel Katz , who helped develop DT measles shot , says , “ PRP have no evidence DT measles NN persists in DT intestines of anyone , even immune - deficient individuals . ” ( Neither Hotez nor Katz is involved in DT Cedillo case . ) A verdict in DT trial is n’t expected for up to a NN . DT Cedillos are optimistic . If PRP win , PRP stand to VB compensation from DT federal fund set up for NNS hurt by vaccinations . Claimants in non-autism NNS have won up to $ 10 million — an amount WDT MD certainly help . Theresa , 45 , a homemaker in Yuma , Ariz. , and her husband , Michael , 51 , a utility worker , spent about $ 18,000 last NN caring for Michelle , now 12 , who ca n’t walk without assistance or talk but loves watching Teletubbies and listening to music . “ I did n’t file this claim with DT intent of saying , ‘ See , I told PRP so , ' ” Theresa says . “ I ’m hopeful IN something good will come out of PRP . ”

text: ( Reuters ) - Five NNS ago , in an office complex with a giant sculpture of a mosquito just northwest of Phnom Penh , Jessica Manning struck on a novel idea . Those deaths occur mostly in poor NNS WDT do not receive as much NN research and funding . Because of JJ NN , however , those mosquitoes WDT thrive in DT tropics are moving into more NNS each NN . A NN of mice published in 2018 showed immunization with Anopheles mosquito spit protected against malaria . text: Equine Internists at DT Ohio NNP University , College of Veterinary Medicine Recommend NNP of Horses for West Nile NNP As most NNS in Ohio are aware , DT first positive West Nile NNP ( WNV ) bird was detected in July , 2001 . This NN was detected in DT tissues of a dead blue jay from Lake County , Ohio . DT finding establishes IN WNV has arrived in Ohio . Since DT NN is present in Ohio , and DT most at risk populations are crows , blue jays , horses and NNS , PRP need to work at preventing this NN from affecting these species . According to DT Ohio WNV Work Group , most of DT efforts at preventing WNV infection are directed towards mosquito control . This can be accomplished by eliminating standing NN : NN MD collect in old tires , tin cans , plastic containers , ceramic pots , or similar containers . Clean roof gutters so PRP drain properly in DT spring and fall , clean and chlorinate swimming pools , outdoor saunas and hot tubs , and if not in use , keep empty and covered . Drain NN from pool covers . VB DT NN in bird baths at least once a week , turn over plastic wading pools , and wheelbarrows , etc. when not in use . Non-toxic products such as mosquito dunks can be used to prevent maturation of DT mosquito larvae in standing NN WDT cannot be readily eliminated . DT USDA has recently approved a conditional license for a WNV NN for equids , including horses . Dr. Dave Glauer , NNP Veterinarian , has approved DT use of DT NN in Ohio . DT NN will be available starting in September of 2001 . DT NN is made with a killed NN and has limited efficacy data , however , a similar NN for Japanese Encephalitis NN , which is closely related to WNV , has been used for JJ NNS . DT efficacy of DT Japanese Encephalitis NN has been reported at ? 80 % . NNS of WNV in horses occurred as late as October in 2000 in DT eastern NNP . Therefore , internists at DT Ohio NNP University , College of Veterinary Medicine recommend IN if DT NN is available , horses should be vaccinated twice this fall . DT NN requires an initial dose and a second dose 3 to 6 weeks later . Horse owners who are interested in vaccinating their horses for WNV should contact their local veterinarian . Veterinarians are being encouraged to place orders so DT company will have some indication of DT demand for DT NN . As part of DT safety NN of DT NN , 649 horses and ponies were vaccinated . Systemic or local reactions occurred in very few of DT vaccinated horses : 3 horses had localized site reactions ( swelling and soreness ) , 2 horses were reported to have a fever following DT initial NN only , and 2 horses had other reactions ( mild diarrhea within 8 hours of injection in 1 horse and 1 horse was treated for colic within a few hours of DT initial NN ) . According to DT report filed by Fort Dodge Animal NNP , DT NN did not induce any severe local or systemic adverse reactions in 98.5 % of DT vaccinations , therefore , DT NN appears to be safe . Horse owners planning to export their animals should be aware IN vaccinated animals MD not meet DT import requirements of receiving NNS due to DT presence of anti-WNV antibodies in blood . While these antibodies are present transiently , presence of DT antibody when DT horse is due to be exported MD result in denial of permission to import . In horses WDT do become clinically ill , DT NN infects DT central nervous system and causes signs of encephalitis . Clinical signs of encephalitis in horses include loss of appetite and depression , in addition to any combination of DT following : fever , weakness or paralysis of hind limbs , impaired vision , ataxia ( incoordination ) , head pressing , aimless wandering , convulsions , inability to swallow , circling , hyperexcitability , or coma . Differential diagnoses for neurologic NN in DT horse include rabies , botulism , equine protozoal myeloencephalitis ( EPM ) , cervical vertebral myelopathy ( CVM ) , equine herpes ( EHV1 ) , equine degenerative myelopathy ( EDM ) and other encephalitides such as western equine encephalitis ( WEE ) , eastern equine encephalitis ( EEE - reportable in Ohio ) and Venezuelan equine encephalitis ( VEE - reportable in Ohio ) , should all be considered . JJ of DT reported NNS have similar clinical signs to commonly diagnosed neurologic diseases , particularly EPM . See Ohio NNP University Web site for aids in differential diagnosis . Horse owners are encouraged not to become complacent once their horses have been vaccinated . Elimination of mosquito breeding sites and personal protection are still important . Another important role DT horse owner MD play in our efforts to prevent WNV is to continue to report dead bird sightings to their local NN department . DT local NN department will determine if those dead birds should be transported to DT Ohio Department of Agriculture for pathologic examination .

text: JJ NN : Nations requiring DT most NNS tend to have DT worst infant mortality rates A JJ NN , published in Human and Experimental Toxicology ( http://het.sagepub.com/content/earl…), a peer - reviewed journal indexed by DT National Library of Medicine , found IN nations with higher ( worse ) infant mortality rates tend to give their infants more NN doses . For example , DT NNP NNPS requires infants to receive 26 NNS — DT most in DT NN — yet more than six U.S. infants die per every 1000 live births . In contrast , Sweden and Japan administer 12 NNS to infants , DT least amount , and report less than three deaths per 1000 live births . DT authors of DT NN , Neil Z. Miller and Dr. Gary Goldman , conducted a literature review to determine DT immunization schedules for DT NNP NNPS and all 33 nations with better infant mortality rates than DT NNP NNPS . DT total number of NN doses specified for infants aged less than CD NN was then determined for each country . DT 34 nations were then organized into data pairs consisting of total number of NN doses specified for their infants and infant mortality rates . A scatter plot of DT data pairs provided evidence of a positive correlation : infant mortality rates and NN doses tend to increase together . Nations were RB grouped into five different NN dose ranges . DT mean infant mortality rates of all nations within each group were then calculated . Analysis showed “ a high statistically significant correlation between increasing number of NN doses and increasing infant mortality rates . ” PRP is instructive to note IN JJ developing nations require their infants to receive multiple NN doses and have national NN coverage rates ( a percentage of DT target population WDT has been vaccinated ) of 90 % or better , yet their infant mortality rates are poor . Infant mortality rates will remain high in nations WDT cannot provide clean NN , proper nutrition , improved sanitation , and better access to NN care . Nations with higher ( worse ) infant mortality rates give their infants , on average , more NN doses . This positive correlation , derived from DT data , elicits an important inquiry : Are some infant deaths associated with over - NN ? Is PRP possible IN some nations are requiring too JJ NNS for their infants and DT additional NNS are a toxic burden on their NN ? Stock up with Fresh Food WDT lasts with eFoodsDirect ( AD ) EX is some evidence IN a subset of infants MD be more susceptible to SIDS shortly after being vaccinated . For example , Torch found IN unvaccinated babies who died of SIDS did so most often in DT fall or winter while vaccinated babies died most often at 2 and 4 months — DT same ages when initial doses of DPT were given to infants . He concluded IN DPT “ MD be a generally unrecognized major cause of sudden infant and early childhood death , and IN DT risks of immunization MD outweigh its potential benefits . ” PRP appears as though some infant deaths attributed to SIDS MD be NN related , perhaps associated with biochemical or synergistic toxicity due to over - NN . All nations have an obligation to determine whether their immunization schedules are achieving their desired goals . He has devoted DT last 25 NNS to educating parents and NN practitioners about NNS , encouraging informed consent and non-mandatory laws . Mr. Miller gives talks on NNS both locally and nationally . Past organizations WDT he has lectured for include DT International Chiropractic Pediatric Association , DT International College of Integrative Medicine , NNP NNP / Generation Rescue , DT Hahnemann Academy of North America , and DT University of Virginia . In June 2011 , Mr. Miller will be giving a NN seminar at Dr. Gabriel Cousens ’ Tree of Life Rejuvenation Center . Mr. Miller has a degree in psychology and is a member of Mensa . text: DT 2010s are over , and DT double - 20s are about to begin . CD phrase WDT I 'd VB to never hear again is " post - truth era , " an idea WDT has gained prominence during DT past decade , especially DT last few NNS . CD dominant theme of post - truthery is IN every person has a right to his / her own interpretation of DT facts , and IN these alternative interpretations–or " alternative facts , ” as NNP adviser Kellyanne Conway famously called them –deserve to be taken seriously . PRP do n't . And yet , IN most of DT pseudoscience WDT I 've been writing about for NNS now , PRP have to continue calling out nonsense for what PRP is , because some of PRP is harmful , and even deadly . Politics is a never - ending font of post - truthery ( or truthiness , as Stephen Colbert defined PRP in 2005 ) , but here I 'm concerned about NN . Today I 'll highlight three anti-truth campaigns WDT have caused great harm over DT past decades , in DT hope IN PRP will soon fade away . Among serious NNS , truth is not being questioned . Indeed , DT essence of NN is DT search for objective truth . Sometimes , though , a scientific discovery threatens to undermine DT power or profits of an influential industry , and DT 's when industry resorts to denialism ( which is essentially DT same thing as post - truthiness ) . Perhaps DT most well - documented example of organized NN denialism dates back to DT 1950s , when accumulating evidence made PRP clear IN smoking causes cancer . DT tobacco industry did n't VB to admit this , even though their own internal research supported PRP , because PRP meant IN their main product was killing their customers , which in turn was terrible NN for their business . In response , Eventually , after decades of lawsuits and literally millions of smoking - related deaths , DT industry was forced to admit DT truth and pay out billions of dollars in settlements in DT U.S. Nonetheless , JJ NNS still smoke , and even as recently as 2016 , DT largest tobacco company in DT U.S. , Philip Morris , was still trying to deny DT NN about cigarettes . My second example is more recent , and potentially even more harmful to DT human species . PRP might have already guessed PRP : I 'm talking about NN NN denialism . For several decades , DT evidence has been building IN DT NN is getting warmer . A series of reports from DT Intergovernmental Panel on NNP NNP ( IPCC ) warned , in increasingly confident terms , IN humans were DT primary cause of recent NN , mostly due to our use of fossil fuels and DT carbon PRP emit into DT atmosphere . DT current IPCC report VBZ unequivocally IN humans have already caused 1° C of NN , and IN DT NN will increase rapidly over DT next several decades . Scientifically , these facts are not in dispute . DT NN is already experiencing more severe storms , unprecedented floods and droughts , and die - offs due to NN oceans ( such as DT massive and tragic die - off of coral in Great Barrier Reef ) . However , DT fossil fuel industry sees JJ NN as a threat to their profits . Rather than invest in JJ , cleaner forms of NN , large companies such as Exxon - Mobil and billionaire coal magnates such as DT Koch brothers have poured countless millions of dollars into disinformation campaigns to cast doubt on DT NN of NN NN . Prominent among these efforts is DT Heartland Institute , a fossil - fuel - funded organization whose main mission is to cast doubt on DT NN of NN NN . ( Heartland has RB worked to cast doubt on DT link between smoking and cancer . ) NN NN denialists learned from DT tobacco companies IN PRP was possible to delay NN action by decades , simply by casting doubt on DT NN . Unfortunately , their campaigns have been working . For NNS , JJ U.S. politicians denied IN DT NN was getting warmer . As DT argument has become increasingly harder to make with a straight face , PRP 've changed their strategy , and now PRP might admit IN DT NN is heating up , but deny IN human activities are responsible . PRP 're still wrong . DT goal of this denialism is , simply put , to protect DT profits of fossil fuel industries . However , truth does n't care if PRP believe PRP or not . DT NN is getting hotter . Australia just had its four hottest days in recorded history . DT unprecedented heat wave has led to hundreds of fires through much of DT country , threatening every major city on DT continent . EX 's no reason to VB this wo n't keep happening . NN NN denialists are only fooling themselves –after being duped by oil and coal companies . My third and final example is CD WDT has frustrated me for 15 NNS now , and PRP ’s CD WDT just wo n't VB away : DT anti-vaccination movement . This is CD of DT most frustrating examples of post - truth wrongheadedness , in part PRP seems so unnecessary , and because so JJ NNS have been harmed as a result . First , let 's be clear about DT facts : NNS are CD of DT greatest boons to human NN in DT history of NN and medicine . NNS used to die by DT millions from smallpox , polio , and a dozen other infections WDT are now almost completely preventable by NNS . Smallpox was 100 % eliminated from DT NN in 1980 , in CD of humankind 's greatest JJ NN triumphs . Polio has now been eradicated from nearly all NNS , and a campaign WDT started in 1988 has now reduced polio to just a few NNS and fewer than 100 NNS worldwide . Both of these successes are due to NNS . JJ other diseases , including measles , chicken pox , and bacterial meningitis , have been reduced so dramatically by NNS WDT physicians in DT U.S. and Europe almost never see a case . This graph shows DT dramatic effect of DT measles NN , which was introduced in DT U.S. in DT early 1960s : DT graph shows DT number of reported NNS , but actual NNS were much higher , likely around 4 million NNS per NN by CD estimate . These are DT facts . So what happened ? DT modern anti-vax movement , led by a small number of extremely vocal , extremely self - confident individuals , began in 1998 with DT publication of a fraudulent NN ( later retracted when DT fraud was uncovered ) claiming IN NNS caused NN . DT NN was led by former physician Andrew Wakefield , who later lost his JJ license because of his fraud , which included misleading his co-authors and mistreating patients . Nonetheless , this NN was picked up and amplified by several celebrities with large followings , including former Playboy model and MTV host Jenny McCarthy and political activist Robert F. Kennedy Jr , DT nephew of former NNP NNP John Kennedy . RFK Jr . Anti-vax activism is all over DT web today , despite JJ efforts to quash PRP . Countless claims of " my child got sick after his NN jab " are presented as proof IN NNS cause harm , and under post - truthism , PRP 're supposed to take such claims seriously . These stories can be especially difficult to respond to , because JJ parents are dealing with NNS who have genuine NN problems –including autism–and DT parents often truly believe what PRP are saying . Thus PRP wo n't do to tell them to be quiet and VB away : their NNS really do need JJ care . PRP 're simply wrong in believing IN NNS have anything to do with their childrens ' problems . Their beliefs are amplified by Facebook groups and websites whose sole purpose is to echo and amplify DT mistaken claims of anti-vaxxers . Even though EX was never any good evidence IN NNS cause NN , NNS have conducted dozens of studies involving literally millions of NNS to answer precisely DT question , and DT evidence is very , very clear : NNS do not cause NN , nor do PRP cause any other systematic neurological or behavioral problems . NNS do prevent diseases , though , and unvaccinated NNS can and will VB sick . Recent experience has RB given PRP , tragically , JJ examples of NNS who died from entirely preventable infections , because their parents did n't vaccinate them . These tragedies did n't have to happen . Every era is DT age of truth . DT idea IN PRP 're in a " post - truth era , " despite being repeated thousands of times in articles , essays , and op - eds over DT past decade , is a commentary on NNS 's ability to fool themselves , not on DT NN of DT NN . Truth describes DT NN as PRP is , and those who choose to deny PRP might win a short - term argument , but in DT long term , PRP will always lose . Finally , on a more positive note , I 'm somewhat heartened by efforts to educate college students on how to recognize and counter bogus ideas , such as DT University of Washington course , Calling Bullshit , created by Carl Bergstrom and Jevin West . ( Yes , DT really is its title . ) As DT professors wrote : If PRP 're interested , PRP 've made DT lectures available as free videos on YouTube . Labelling an era as post - anything has always , to me , suggested a lack of substance , as if DT era is defined only by what came before PRP . DT use of " post - " RB ignores DT fact IN DT next era will need a name too . Should PRP expect " post - post - truth " to come next ? And what MD DT look IN ? Let 's hope IN DT 2020s will give PRP a return to simple respect for truth . DT future of civilization might very well depend on PRP .

text: DT Official Military Personnel Files ( OMPF ) , held at DT National Personnel Records Center ( NPRC ) , are administrative records containing information about DT subject 's military service history . JJ OMPFs contain both personnel and former active duty NN records , but DT service branches discontinued retiring DT NN record portion to DT NPRC in DT 1990s . In DT past , all of DT military services retired DT individual NN record , along with DT personnel record , to DT NPRC upon a service member 's separation from service . DT Army and DT Air Force retired its NN records with DT Official Military Personnel File , while DT Department of DT Navy ( including DT Navy , Marine Corps and Coast Guard ) retired these files separately to DT NPRC until DT 1980s . NN records cover DT outpatient , dental and mental NN treatment WDT former members received while in military service . NN records include induction and separation physical examinations , as well as routine JJ care ( doctor / dental visits , lab tests , etc. ) when DT patient was not admitted to a hospital . In comparison , clinical ( hospital inpatient ) records were generated when active duty members were actually hospitalized while in DT service . Typically , these records are NOT filed with DT NN records but are generally retired to DT NPRC by DT facility which created them ( see clinical records for more information ) . JJ records from DT Department of Veterans Affairs ( VA ) are RB not included . In DT 1990s , DT military services discontinued DT practice of filing NN records with DT personnel record portion at DT NPRC . In 1992 , DT Army began retiring most of its former members ' NN records to DT Department of Veterans Affairs ( VA ) . Over DT next six NNS , DT other services followed suit . In 2014 , DT military services dicontinued DT practice of retiring DT records to DT Department of Veterans Affairs ( VA ) . In order to determine where a JJ record is located , please see DT chart below : Veterans who plan to file a claim for JJ benefits with DT Department of Veterans Affairs ( VA ) do not need to request a copy of their military NN record from DT NPRC . After a claim is filed , DT VA will obtain DT original NN record from DT NPRC . In addition , JJ NN records were lent to DT Department of Veterans Affairs prior to DT 1973 Fire . Veterans who filed a JJ claim should contact DT Department of Veterans Affairs ( VA ) in order to determine if their record is already on file . DT VA Toll Free # is : 1-800-827-1000 - PRP will connect DT caller to DT nearest VA office .

text: Oxford University and Imperial College London are both in DT race to find a NN NN . On 23 April DT first European human trials began at a lab in Oxford ; around 800 NNS were recruited to take part . Now , on 16 June , Imperial College is starting a human trial in 300 volunteers . A further 10,000 volunteers are RB wanted across England , Wales and Scotland . Jack Sommers was CD of DT first to have DT jab on DT Oxford trial three weeks ago . [ This piece was originally published on 6 June ] . PRP ’s been a month since I first signed up for DT NN NN trials . I was paid a grand total of £ 235 for five hospital visits , various needles to be stuck in my arm , and generally to be used as a human guinea pig , all in DT hope I MD help to develop DT much - discussed NN - CD NN . Nothing has been talked up as our potential saviour more than DT Oxford University NN trial , CD of scores being developed around DT NN . DT NN has been repeatedly cited as DT best hope of returning PRP to our pre-Covid lives and DT UK NN is seriously invested ; PRP pledged a combined £ 43 million to UK - based laboratories rolling out human testing . DT first phase , which I was part of , took place in England last month . Now PRP ’re expanding PRP to ask tens of thousands of Brits across DT country to take part and put themselves in DT same position as me in DT coming weeks . If PRP do sign up , prepare for DT process to be more mundane than PRP might expect . A NN trial combines a lot of admin , IN signing up for a bank account but with DT light trepidation of having your holiday jabs . PRP apply via an online questionnaire and will be asked every conceivable question about your NN history and your family . Once approved , PRP ’ll be called to DT hospital . DT first NN I went to St George ’s in south London I had been self - isolating in my flat for two months ; I live alone and am recently unemployed . I found myself in a waiting room surrounded by other NNS I presumed were RB for DT same reason ( DT only other test subjects I VBP of are three macaque monkeys ) . Despite our common bond DT awkward GP - surgery atmosphere meant PRP did n’t talk . On this first visit PRP are required to give urine and blood samples , fill out forms and watch a video about how PRP ’re expecting PRP ’ll only VB mild side effects . Then PRP VBP home to await DT green light once everything checks out . In DT meantime be prepared for your friends and family to have endless questions , including JJ wrongly assuming PRP will be exposed to NN as part of DT trial – PRP wo n’t . I have found myself inundated with well wishes ( and a few NN theorists online too ) . Two days after my first hospital visit I sent a frantic follow - up email asking why I had n’t yet had DT call to return for DT injection . DT reply basically VBD : ‘ Calm down and wait ’ . PRP was at this point I started feeling nervous for DT first NN . I was called and returned to DT hospital – although I was anxious PRP was RB DT closest I had come to a normal workplace in weeks . PRP was a tantalising reminder of life pre-lockdown ( despite DT sterile atmosphere ) . My nostalgia quickly evaporated as a nurse started talking about DT NNS given to DT rhesus macaques ; I salute DT monkey 's sacrifices for JJ NN but DT serene ‘ guinea pig ’ image in my head was now well and truly gone . I thought back to a few messages I had had from NNS shielding , including CD woman with multiple sclerosis who told me : “ PRP are doing something WDT MD help millions of NNS ” . This made me , a grown man who does n’t VB needles and puts a hand in front of his face during horror films , feel fearless . DT injection itself – DT only dose PRP receive – was painless . I was given a thermometer and asked to record my symptoms daily through an online diary . My biggest side effect seems to have been paranoia . I do n’t VB whether I was in DT 50 per cent given DT actual NN or 50 per cent given a control , but twice in DT first week I went to bed with mild fever symptoms , which I MD , in retrospect , have imagined . “ Raised temperature and sneezing , ” I wrote in DT diary ’s text box on day three with DT solemn resignation PRP might use to telegraph IN DT Titanic had struck an iceberg . Given my temperature DT day was a perfectly normal 36.5 degrees , my narrative did n’t always quite match reality . As DT weeks have gone on I ’ve not suffered any further symptoms . Instead my preoccupation has become with DT success of DT trials . I used not to care whether Imperial or Oxford got RB first but every piece of good NN about “ my ” NN has made me VB to cheer and blow an Oxford University vuvuzela out DT window . Then when PRP was reported IN DT vaccinated monkeys all ended up contracting NN , I was bereft . Thankfully I will not ( intentionally ) be made to face DT NN in DT same way but I VBP to tell my grandchildren I tested DT NN WDT saved humanity , not CD of DT forgotten scores WDT did n’t work . Looking back , I can see I ’d incorrectly seen myself as DT protagonist who had to have DT best story , DT most dramatic side effects . Eventually , I came to appreciate EX will be JJ trials and thousands more volunteers on DT Oxford trial alone . Next week I ’ll be back in hospital for follow - up tests just as DT latest volunteers arrive for their first shots . Failure and learning are central to DT NNS eventually succeeding so even if my NN does n’t work , I wo n’t ever regret having been CD of DT first to add my name to DT list . To sign up to participate in a NN trial , PRP can register your interest online .

text: Since writing this in 2004 , I have come to DT conclusion IN PRP was common knowledge : DT Rothschilds ran both Britain and USSR and EX is no way England MD allow Germany His real mission was to lead Germany Hitler did n't VB a NN war , and had no stomach for fighting England , according to Pulitzer Prize - winning journalist Louis Kilzer , author of Churchill 's Deception ( Simon & Schuster , 1994 ) . DT English army was trapped at Dunkirk . Rather than take them prisoner , Hitler halted his generals for three days allowing 330,000 men to escape . " DT blood of every single Englishman is too valuable to shed , " Hitler VBD . " Our two NNS belong together racially and traditionally . DT is and always has been my aim , even if our generals can't grasp PRP . " ( Kilzer , p.213 ) This is not an attempt to exonerate Hitler . ( Do I need to say this ? ) My own grandparents were murdered by DT Nazis . I believe NNS can take pride in their race or nationality without seeking to dominate others . Furthermore , Hitler was created , manipulated and destroyed by DT same Illuminist clique WDT runs DT NN today . text: In DT evolution of DT NN - CD pandemic , Friday marks a small landmark . Andrew Cuomo , DT governor of NNP York , is delivering DT last of his daily briefings , which have been watched avidly from Bensonhurst to Buffalo , and well beyond . Back in early April , when DT Empire NNP was recording more than ten thousand JJ NN NNS each day , and nearly eight hundred deaths on some days , DT sight of a socially distanced Cuomo VBG calmly through DT latest figures , and explaining DT situation regarding masks , gowns , and ventilators , presented a ghastly spectacle , but RB a reassuring NN . With DT country effectively leaderless , EX was at least CD responsible adult in a position of authority — or so PRP told ourselves as PRP hunkered down in our apartments and listened to DT ambulances racing by . During DT past couple of months , NNP York ’s case figures have fallen precipitously . On Thursday , DT NN reported six hundred and eighteen JJ infections , and just thirty - two deaths . Most of NNP York is now well into DT reopening process , and NNP York City will take another significant step next week , Mayor Bill de Blasio confirmed on Thursday , allowing JJ offices , retail stores , barbershops , and playgrounds to reopen . From this point on , Cuomo will deliver his NN - CD briefings as needed , he has indicated . NNP York ’s comeback is a testimony to DT heroic efforts of NN professionals , E.M.T. employees , transit workers , delivery - truck drivers , and equally essential workers in supermarkets , warehouses , and other places — JJ of them poorly paid — who kept DT stricken city and NN VBG through its darkest days and nights . Cuomo and de Blasio , after some critical early missteps , RB deserve credit for sticking at PRP , as do ordinary NNP Yorkers who obeyed DT stay - at - home orders and wore masks when PRP became available . DT key point is IN PRP took a monumental and community - wide effort to limit DT official death toll to fewer than twenty - five thousand statewide . ( Based on DT number of “ excess deaths ” this NN , DT actual figure is probably considerably higher . ) DT experiences of NNP Jersey and Massachusetts were similar . Now , as case counts rise alarmingly in other parts of DT country , EX is every reason to suppose IN these places will need similarly comprehensive efforts to prevent a disaster from occurring . At DT moment , though , particularly in parts of red America , a combination of poor leadership , JJ exhaustion , and right - wing politics is greatly hampering an effective response . Take Arizona , Florida , and Texas , three Republican - run NNS WDT began reopening their economies in early NNP . In all three NNS , DT number of confirmed JJ NNS has spiked over DT past couple of weeks . On Thursday , Arizona reported 2,519 JJ infections and Florida reported 3,209 , both of which were record highs . On Tuesday and Wednesday , Texas reported almost eight thousand JJ NNS , which is by far its biggest two - day count yet . These numbers are still relatively small compared to what was experienced in DT Northeast , but DT nature of a pandemic is IN when PRP gets VBG PRP can spread very rapidly , and EX are other worrying signs IN this MD be starting to happen . In all three NNS , DT percentage of tests returning positive results has increased , which means DT rise is n’t simply an artifact of more testing . In Arizona , DT rate of positive tests was five per cent on NNP 10th , and PRP ’s now 9.1 per cent , according to reporting on Thursday from KTAR , a Phoenix NN station . In Florida , DT positive rate was below five per cent a month ago , and PRP ’s now 7.4 per cent , according to DT NN database WDT Johns Hopkins University maintains . DT number of hospitalizations has RB risen sharply . In Arizona on Wednesday , 3,861 NNS had been hospitalized for NN - CD , compared to 1,699 a month ago , according to figures from DT NNP Tracking Project — a rise of about a hundred and thirty per cent . A former director of DT NN ’s NN department has warned IN emergency field hospitals MD be needed by July 4th . In Texas , NN authorities reported on Thursday IN EX are 2,947 NNS with NN - CD in hospitals , which represents a doubling since Memorial Day . In Florida , 12,673 NNS have been hospitalized , compared with a cumulative total of 8,553 a month ago , according to DT NNP Tracking Project . As yet , DT number of deaths has n’t risen as sharply as hospitalizations . DT MD well VB in DT coming weeks . With DT NN spreading , bitter disputes have arisen between DT NNS ’ Republican governors — Doug Ducey , in Arizona ; Ron DeSantis , in Florida ; and Greg Abbott , in Texas — and local leaders in DT hardest - hit areas , who are calling for mandatory mask - wearing , more NN resources , and an expansion of contact tracing . Despite having had months to prepare for a possible surge in infections , all three NNS have fallen woefully short in all of these areas . DT dispute over DT use of masks is particularly tragic , since PRP is by far DT easiest and cheapest way to check rapid spread of DT NN . Pressured by conservative activists and demonstrators , who in turn have been inspired by NNP NNP ’s chronic irresponsibility on this matter , Ducey , DeSantis , and Abbott have refused to issue statewide orders mandating wearing masks in NN . Finally , in DT past couple of days , two of them — Ducey , in Arizona , and Abbott , in Texas — have shifted ground , but DT manner in which PRP moved demonstrated DT damaging politics at play . On Wednesday , Abbott VBD IN , while he was sticking to his refusal to act at DT NN level , he MD support local authorities and businesses WDT require employees and customers to wear masks . “ PRP VBP to make sure IN individual liberty is not infringed upon by NN and , hence , NN cannot require individuals to wear a mask , ” told a Waco television station . “ However , pursuant to my plan , local governments can require stores and businesses to require masks . ” DT same day , Ducey belatedly acknowledged reality , noting , “ EX is a trend , and DT trend is headed in DT wrong direction . ” He RB dropped his opposition to cities in Arizona , such as Tucson and Flagstaff , mandating DT wearing of masks in NN , but he again refused to issue a statewide order , saying PRP MD n’t work , and adding , “ I VBP some NNS view this as an issue of personal freedom . ” PRP has long been a basic principle of democratic governance WDT where JJ NN comes into conflict with individual freedoms , DT latter MD have to be constricted , at least temporarily . But with NNP in DT White House and elected Republicans terrified of incurring his supporters ’ wrath , EX is now , in parts of red America , nobody willing to make this argument or to follow through with actual edicts . Local leaders and their constituents are left to fend for themselves . Indeed , DeSantis , in Florida , VBD this openly on Wednesday , when , after insisting IN he MD n’t suspend any of his reopening measures , he added IN residents of DT NN should “ make wise decisions for themselves based upon their own personal risk . ”

text: Our general interest e-newsletter keeps PRP up to date on a wide variety of NN topics . Childhood NNS protect NNS from a variety of serious or potentially fatal diseases , including diphtheria , measles , mumps , rubella , polio , tetanus , whooping cough ( pertussis ) and others . If these diseases seem uncommon — or even unheard of — PRP 's usually because these NNS are doing their job . Still , PRP might wonder about DT benefits and risks of childhood NNS . Here are straight answers to common questions about childhood NNS . Is natural immunity better than NN ? A natural infection might provide better immunity than NN — but EX are serious risks . For example , a natural chickenpox ( varicella ) infection MD lead to pneumonia . A natural polio infection MD cause permanent paralysis . A natural mumps infection MD lead to deafness . A natural Haemophilus influenzae type b ( Hib ) infection MD result in permanent brain damage or even death . NN can help prevent these diseases and their potentially serious complications . NNS do not cause NN . Despite much controversy on DT topic , researchers have n't found a connection between NN and childhood NNS . In fact , DT original NN WDT ignited DT debate NNS ago has been retracted . Any NN can cause side effects . Usually , these side effects are minor — a low - grade fever , fussiness and soreness at DT injection site . Some NNS cause a temporary headache , fatigue or loss of appetite . Rarely , a child might experience a severe allergic reaction or a neurological side effect , such as a seizure . Although these rare side effects are a concern , DT risk of a NN causing serious harm or death is extremely small . DT benefits of getting a NN are much greater than DT possible side effects for almost all NNS . Of course , NNS are n't given to NNS who have known allergies to specific NN components . Likewise , if your child develops a life - threatening reaction to a particular NN , further doses of DT NN wo n't be given . Why are NNS given so early ? DT diseases WDT childhood NNS are meant to prevent are most likely to occur when a child is very young and DT risk of complications is greatest . DT makes early NN — sometimes beginning shortly after birth — essential . If PRP postpone NNS until a child is older , PRP might be too late . Is PRP OK to pick and choose NNS ? In general , skipping NNS is n't a good idea . This can leave your child vulnerable to potentially serious diseases WDT MD otherwise be avoided . And consider this : For some NNS — including those who can't receive certain NNS for JJ reasons ( such as cancer therapy ) — DT only protection from NN - preventable diseases is DT immunity of DT NNS around them . If immunization rates drop , NN - preventable diseases might once again become common threats . If PRP have reservations about particular NNS , discuss your concerns with your child 's doctor . If your child falls behind DT standard NNS schedule , ask DT doctor about catch - up immunizations . text: Willcocks LC et al. ( 2007 ) DT effect of sirolimus therapy on NN responses in transplant recipients . Am J Transplant 7 : 2006 –2011 Immunosuppressants such as ciclosporin and mycophenolate mofetil can reduce DT protective antibody response to NN in transplant recipients , putting these patients at high risk of infections and complications . Few data are available regarding DT effect of sirolimus on NN response . Willcocks et al. investigated immune responses to influenza and pneumococcal vaccinations in 9 hepatic and 23 renal transplant recipients who had been randomized to either continue on a calcineurin inhibitor ( CNI ; tacrolimus or ciclosporin ; n = 17 ) or switch to sirolimus ( n = 15 ) at least 3 months after transplantation . All patients received — from DT same batches — an influenza NN and , 4 weeks later , a pneumococcal NN . Four weeks after influenza NN , mean titers of antibodies against all three influenza antigens tested had increased significantly in both patient groups ( P < 0.0005 ) and EX were no significant differences in increases between groups . Nevertheless , all sirolimus - treated patients mounted an antibody response against at least CD influenza antigen WDT was deemed to be protective , compared with only 75 % of CNI - treated patients ( P = 0.038 ) . Eight weeks after pneumococcal NN , DT mean antibody levels for 6 of DT 7 pneumococcus serotypes measured had increased significantly in patients in both groups ( P < 0.05 ) ; no significant differences in pneumococcus antibody levels or changes in antibody levels were observed between groups . Transplant type , serum creatinine level and number of immunosuppressant agents had no effect on response to either NN . text: ’s NN - CD reporting is supported by DT Pulitzer Center . Senior Catholic leaders in DT NNP NNPS and Canada , along with other antiabortion groups , are raising ethical objections to promising NN - CD NN candidates WDT are manufactured using cells derived from human fetuses electively aborted decades ago . PRP have not sought to block NN funding for DT NNS , which include two candidate NNS WDT DT NNP administration plans to support with an investment of up to $ 1.7 billion , as well as a third candidate made by a Chinese company in collaboration with Canada ’s National Research Council ( NRC ) . But PRP are urging funders and policymakers to ensure IN companies develop other NNS WDT do not rely on such human fetal cell lines and , in DT NNP NNPS , asking DT NN to “ incentivize ” firms to only make NNS WDT do n’t rely on fetal cells . “ PRP is critically important IN Americans have access to a NN WDT is produced ethically : no American should be forced to choose between being vaccinated against this potentially deadly NN and violating his or her conscience , ” members of DT U.S. Conference of Catholic Bishops and 20 other religious , JJ , and political organizations WDT oppose abortion wrote to Stephen Hahn , commissioner of DT U.S. Food and Drug Administration ( FDA ) , in April . “ Thankfully , other [ NNP - CD ] NNS … utilize cell lines not connected to unethical procedures and methods . ” “ PRP urge your NN to fund DT development of NNS WDT do not create an ethical dilemma for JJ Canadians , ” wrote Archbishop of Winnipeg Richard Gagnon , NN of DT Canadian Conference of Catholic Bishops , and 17 other antiabortion religious , JJ , and politic groups and individuals in a 21 NNP letter to Prime Minister Justin Trudeau . “ DT … manufacture of NNS using such ethically - tainted human cell lines demonstrates profound disrespect for DT dignity of DT human person . ” FDA and senior White House officials did not respond to emails requesting comment on DT letter to Hahn . In Canada , DT NN ministry has promised to respond to DT letter to Trudeau , says Moira McQueen , executive director of DT Canadian Catholic Bioethics Institute and lead signatory on DT letter . Cells derived from elective abortions have been used since DT 1960s to manufacture NNS , including current NNS against rubella , chickenpox , hepatitis A , and shingles . PRP have RB been used to make approved drugs against diseases including hemophilia , rheumatoid arthritis , and cystic fibrosis . Now , research groups around DT NN are working to develop more than 130 candidate NNS against NNP - CD , according to DT NNP NNP Organization ; 10 had entered human trials as of 2 June . At least five of DT candidate NNP - CD NNS use CD of two human fetal cell lines : HEK - 293 , a kidney cell line widely used in research and industry WDT comes from a fetus aborted in about 1972 ; and PER . C6 , a proprietary cell line owned by Janssen , a subsidiary of Johnson & Johnson , developed from retinal cells from an 18 - week - old fetus aborted in 1985 . Both cell lines were developed in DT lab of molecular biologist Alex van der Eb at Leiden University . Two of DT five NNS have entered human trials ( see table , below ) . In four of DT NNS , DT human fetal cells are used as miniature “ factories ” to generate vast quantities of adenoviruses , disabled so IN PRP cannot replicate , WDT are used as vehicles to ferry genes from DT novel NN WDT causes NN - CD . When DT adenoviruses are given as a NN , recipients ’ cells begin to produce proteins from DT NN , hopefully triggering a protective immune response . DT fifth NN , which has shown promise in monkeys and is headed for human trials as soon as this summer , is what is known as a protein subunit NN . Researchers at DT University of Pittsburgh use HEK - 293 cells to manufacture DT NN ’ spike protein — a vital part of its structure — which is used to trigger an immune response . DT NN is delivered through a skin patch with 400 tiny needles . DT fetal cell lines are key to producing both types of NN . “ HEK - 293 [ cells ] are essential for making protein subunit NNS , ” says Andrea Gambotto , a NN scientist at DT University of Pittsburgh School of Medicine and DT NN ’s lead developer . Their human origin is important , he says : “ Cultured [ nonhuman ] animal cells can produce DT same proteins , but PRP MD be decorated with different sugar molecules , which — in DT case of NNS — runs DT risk of failing to evoke a robust and specific immune response . ” ( Among DT developers of DT five NNS , only Gambotto responded to a request for comment . ) David Prentice , vice NN and research director at DT Charlotte Lozier Institute , which opposes abortion , notes researchers making adenovirus NNS have modified HEK - 293 cells to be adept at packaging JJ genes — such as those WDT direct cells to assemble DT NN spike protein — into adenoviruses . But he adds IN other technologies are available , including using cells captured from amniocentesis WDT are engineered to make replication - deficient adenoviruses . “ DT use of cells from electively aborted fetuses for NN production makes these five NN - CD NN programs unethical , because PRP exploit DT innocent human beings who were aborted , ” Prentice and a co-author — molecular biologist James Sherley , a Lozier Institute associate scholar and director of DT adult stem cell company Asymmetrex — wrote in a position paper published last month . But Arthur Caplan , a bioethicist at DT NNP York University School of Medicine , counters : “ EX are better ways to win DT abortion wars than telling NNS not to use a NN . These are long - over abortions . These cells are decades old , and even major religious leaders IN DT pope have acknowledged IN for DT greater good PRP ’s not worth DT symbolism to put DT community at risk . ” DT Vatican ’s Pontifical Academy for Life declared in 2005 and reaffirmed in 2017 IN in DT absence of alternatives , Catholics MD , in good conscience , receive NNS made using historical human fetal cell lines . A NN made by DT Chinese company CanSino Biologics was DT first NNP - CD NN to enter phase II human trials . PRP was developed using adapted HEK - 293 cells WDT DT company licensed from Canada ’s NRC , where DT cells were developed . ( NRC - developed HEK - 293 cells have already been used to develop an approved Ebola NN . ) Last month , NRC announced a collaboration with CanSino Biologics under which PRP is preparing to run late - stage clinical trials of DT NN in Canada , and scale up facilities to produce DT NN in quantity . DT two U.S. - backed NNS WDT have drawn criticism from antiabortion groups are on a short list of candidates targeted to VB financial and logistical support from DT U.S. NN under DT White House ’s Operation Warp Speed , which aims to accelerate DT development and approval of at least CD NN - CD NN by January 2021 , according to a 3 June report in . CD of DT Warp Speed candidates , made by Janssen Research & Development , uses PER . C6 cells . DT second , from University of Oxford researchers and AstraZeneca , uses HEK - 293 cells . Both have received U.S. NN commitments of , respectively , $ 456 million and $ 1.2 billion , if PRP meet milestones , through DT Biomedical Advanced Research Development Authority ( BARDA ) . Another NN WDT relies on HEK - 293 , being developed by two companies owned by DT billionaire scientist and businessman Patrick Soon - Shiong , made an earlier , Warp Speed long list of 14 promising candidates , according to a press release from CD of companies , NantKwest . Prentice says : “ As PRP are choosing — BARDA and DT Warp Speed NNS — what NNS to move ahead , PRP should at least recognize IN EX is some portion of DT population who MD VB an alternative NN PRP can take in good conscience . ” Caplan disagrees . “ If PRP are VBG to say DT NN should n’t fund things WDT a minority of NNS object to , PRP will have a very long list of things WDT wo n’t VB funded by DT NN , from research on weapons of war to contraceptive research . ” DT NNP administration has restricted DT use of human fetal tissue from elective abortions in biomedical research . CD NN ago , PRP adopted a policy WDT forbids researchers at DT National Institutes of NNP ( NIH ) from using fetal tissue from elective abortions in their studies . And PRP imposed an extra layer of review on non-NIH NNS seeking agency funding to do research using such tissue . But DT policy did not stop either group from using decades - old fetal cell lines IN HEK - 293 and PER .C6 . * Clarification , 8 June , 12:10 p.m. : This story has been updated to clarify IN DT Vatican approves of Catholics receiving NNS manufactured using human fetal cells only in DT absence of alternatives .
