text: This is DT latest in a POLITICO special report on NNS : DT accomplishments , history , controversy and business challenges . EX ’s no easy way to develop a NN . Each experimental candidate has about a six percent chance of making PRP to market , about half DT estimate for traditional drugs . Developing NNS is getting more complex and costs are VBG up . “ NN development is facing a crisis , ” according to Stanley Plotkin , a scientist pivotal in developing DT rubella jab in DT 1960s and who now advises Sanofi Pasteur MSD , writing in a NNP England Journal of Medicine comment . DT culprits are JJ : more stringent clinical trial and manufacturing rules introduced over DT last decade , costly production , DT “ lowest hanging fruit ” already developed and a difficult business model , which some VBP so far as to call dysfunctional . Amid these trends , demand is rising . Even at a record pace for industry , several NNS to protect against DT Ebola NN WDT killed more than 11,000 NNS last NN have been tested , but EX is still no licensed product . Demand for NNS for Lyme NN , tuberculosis , and JJ more infectious diseases are RB needed , according to DT JJ NN experts . And EX are spot shortages even in developed NNS . For example , a shortage of tuberculosis NNS in France prompted Sanofi Pasteur MSD to hand out shots initially meant for Poland last month . So far , a concerted JJ effort eradicated CD NN with NN — smallpox in DT 1980s — showing what is possible with broad coordination . A major hurdle DT industry faces is meeting DT fragmented demand across Europe ’s markets , according to Andrea Rappagliosi , NN of NNPS Europe , an industry group . Immunization schedules vary by country , requiring different doses and frequency of jabs . “ This does n’t ease access to a complex product , ” which takes up to two NNS to develop once an order is placed , VBD Rappagliosi , who RB sits on DT executive committee of DT Sanofi Pasteur MSD joint venture . NNS are made using DT NN - causing NN or bacteria , but in a form WDT is essentially harmless , either by weakening PRP , killing PRP , or extracting part of DT NN or bacteria . This prompts DT immune system to develop antibodies against DT NN . Given DT complexity in development and DT high risks involved , DT rewards need to be sizeable to attract investors . DT industry says PRP costs between $ 200 and $ 900 million to develop a NN , with an estimated 70 percent of DT dedicated to quality control , according to DT International Federation of Pharmaceutical Manufacturers & Associations . But some are skeptical IN development costs are DT biggest hindrance to better and faster NNS . Where DT money goes Just a handful of companies — GlaxoSmithKline , Pfizer , Merck and Sanofi Pasteur MSD — control DT majority of DT market , which inflates prices , critics say . “ DT [ research and development ] model is broken , ” VBD Kate Elder , NNS policy adviser at Médecins Sans Frontieres . “ Priorities are chosen based on where DT money is … diseases predominantly in DT developed NN , ” she VBD . MSF , which buys drugs in bulk for their work in developing NNS , says IN although DT number of diseases against which NNS are advised to be vaccinated has doubled since 2000 , DT cost of DT NN package has multiplied 68 - fold . text: Originally published at NNP Research by Prof. Edward Curtin on 12/1/14 DT anthrax attacks WDT followed those of 9/11 have disappeared from JJ memory in ways analogous to DT pulverization of DT Twin Towers and NNP Trade Center Building 7 . For DT towers , at least , ghostly afterimages persist , albeit fading IN last night ’s nightmare . But DT anthrax attacks , clearly linked to 9/11 and DT Patriot Act , are IN lost letters , sent , but long forgotten . Such disappearing acts are a staple of American life these days . Memory has come upon hard times . With DT 2001 Anthrax Deception , Professor Graeme MacQueen , founding Director of DT Center for Peace Studies at McMaster University , calls PRP back to a careful reconsideration of DT anthrax attacks . PRP is an eloquent and pellucid lesson in inductive reasoning and deserves to stand with David Ray Griffin ’s brilliant multi-volume dissection of DT truth of DT tragic September 11th . MacQueen makes a powerful case for DT linkage of both events , a tie WDT binds both to insider elements deep within DT U.S. NN , perhaps in coordination with foreign elements . MacQueen ’s thesis is as follows : DT criminal anthrax attacks were conducted by a group of conspirators deep within DT U.S. NN who are linked to , or identical with , DT 9/11 perpetrators . Their purpose was to redefine DT Cold War into DT JJ War on Terror and in doing so weaken civil liberties in DT NNP NNPS and attack other nations . Obviously these are explosive charges WDT demand substantial evidence connected logically in a compelling thesis . MacQueen , in countering anti-conspiratorial thinkers of DT left and right who approach such issues with minds IN beds already made up , explains his method thus : “ DT tools of investigation are no different from those used to test other proposals . PRP use evidence and reason . In some NNS PRP will be able to make confident assertions and in other NNS PRP shall have to acknowledge IN PRP are speculating , but even in this second case PRP will do our best to ground our speculation in evidence . Ideology , national loyalty , outrage and ‘ common sense ’ will not do DT job . ” EX is no doubt IN his thesis , backed up by abundant evidence and some intriguing speculation , is a NN theory , just IN DT 9/11 Commission Report ’s explanation of 9/11 and DT Bush administration ’s neo-con and NN assisted conspiratorial tying of Saddam Hussein and Al Qaeda to 9/11 and DT anthrax attacks . “ PRP MD have to look very hard to find anyone who does not hold a NN theory about 9/11 , ” he writes . “ And for this reason PRP is silly to denigrate NNS for holding a NN theory about this event . ” But good theory of any kind necessitates facts to make PRP credible , and MacQueen provides a plethora of these , while DT Bush administration made allegations and promises of evidence WDT was never delivered . He aptly quotes researcher Elias Davidsson ‘s evidentiary points concerning DT 9/11 hijackers : Not only does MacQueen provide copious documented facts to support his case , but he does PRP in a systematically logical way WDT leaves DT official story in shambles . If a crime were being prosecuted ( as PRP should , but war was waged instead ) , MacQueen marshals a case for conviction beyond a reasonable doubt . DT anthrax letter attacks began on September 18 , 2001 when DT first letters were mailed from Princeton , NNP Jersey . Between October 3 and November 20 twenty - two NNS were infected with dried anthrax spores and five died . Between October 6 and October 8 especially highly refined and aerosolized anthrax letters were sent to two key Democratic Senators , Thomas Daschle and Patrick Leahy . Before October 3 when DT first case , DT of Robert Stevens who died two days later , was diagnosed , DT FBI claimed IN “ no NN except DT perpetrators knew … IN DT attacks were in progress . ” Yet DT NNP York Times , between September 12 and October 3 , made reference to DT possibility of biological or chemical terrorist attacks 76 times , 27 references specifically to anthrax . JJ of these warnings came from NN leaders . Of course DT Times was home to Judith Miller , notorious for her deceptions regarding Iraq ’s WMD , and whose book Germs : Biological Weapons and America ’s Secret War , was about to be published in DT first few days in October . In DT book Miller et al. assert IN Iraq might use a terrorist group to unleash a bioweapon against DT NNP NNPS . Just coincidentally , throughout DT month of October as DT anthrax attacks became JJ , DT Bush administration and DT mainstream NN pushed DT claim IN Al Qaeda ( already accused of 9/11 ) and Saddam Hussein ( slyly implicated by innuendo ) were responsible for DT anthrax attacks . Once DT U.S. started bombing Afghanistan on October 7 , alleged Al Qaeda retaliation enhanced DT claim . No evidence was presented . DT Washington Post , vying with DT NNP York Times for Cassadran bragging rights , had published a September 27 article “ Al Qaeda NNP Have Crude Chemical Capabilities . ” This double foreign group suggestion – IN Bin Laden ’s group , NN - sponsored by Iraq , sent DT anthrax spores – was promoted vigorously throughout October . DT crude anthrax letters written to Tom Brokaw of NBC NNP and Senator Daschle with their 09 - 11-01 headings and Muslim extremist language , released to DT NN on October 23 , seemed to clinch DT case . By October 26 , once Bush had signed DT Patriot Act , DT case began falling apart , but not before DT two Democratic Senators , Daschle and Leahy , who had resisted ramrodding DT bill into law , had received their own lethal anthrax letters as possible reminders . When R. W. Apple Jr. wrote a NNP York Times front page article on October 18 , “ City of Power , City of Fears , ” and VBD , “ DT NN has been caught completely by surprise by DT anthrax attacks , ” he MD not have known about DT exercise termed Dark Winter , conducted four months earlier on June 22 - 23 , though PRP MD VB he might have known of DT plethora of references to anthrax in his own paper in DT few weeks before DT attacks became known . Maybe he thought DT Bush administration did n’t read DT NNP York Times for intelligence . MacQueen , in a greatly significant piece of sleuthing , however , lets PRP VB about Dark Winter , a biological warfare simulation planned and conducted by Johns Hopkins Center for Civilian Biodefense Strategies / Center for Strategic and International Studies at Andrews Air Force Base with uncanny parallels to DT actual anthrax attacks . Some oddities follow . Dark Winter had anonymous letters sent to DT mainstream NN with threats of anthrax . Dark Winter claimed IN DT perpetrators are probably NN - sponsored international terrorists . Dark Winter claimed IN “ a prominent Iraqi defector is claiming Iraq arranged DT bioweapons attacks on DT U.S. through intermediaries . ” Dark Winter concludes IN DT attacks necessitate harsh restrictions on civil liberties , possibly Martial Rule . Dark Winter has a fictional television anchor announce IN “ still no group claims responsibility for unleashing DT smallpox NN , but NCR has learned IN Iraq MD have provided DT technology behind DT attack to terrorist groups based in Afghanistan . ” And yes , not to be missed , PRP learn IN Dark Winter ’s simulation ’s actors included Apple ’s NNP York Times ’ colleague Judith Miller , soon to be DT NNP York Times best - selling author of Germs , playing a reporter for DT NNP York Times ; James Woolsey , former CIA Director and supporter of DT Project for DT NNP America Century ( PRP ’ll need a JJ Pearl Harbor , folks ) ; and Jerome Hauer , a member of DT Committee on DT Present Danger , and “ an important figure in DT linking of DT 9/11 attacks and DT anthrax attacks , ” who played DT FEMA director . Once DT NN ’s accusations against Al Qaeda and Iraq fell apart but DT Patriot Act had become law , NSA spying commenced , and DT war in Afghanistan proceeded apace , DT FBI changed its tune and pursued DT lone wolf perpetrator theory , first accusing a scientist named Steven Hatfill and then , after he sued and eventually received $ 5.82 million in compensation , PRP accused Bruce Ivins , a scientist working on an anthrax NN at Fort Derrick in Maryland . MacQueen shows in detail how DT claim came apart and resulted in a case without credibility but with Ivins committing suicide . But , he concludes , DT Ivins accusation served its purpose of diverting attention from DT real reason for DT anthrax attacks and its culprits . Finally , MacQueen details how DT anthrax evidence leads to some of DT alleged 9/11 hijackers in Florida as PRP lay down a trail of incriminating “ evidence ” PRP were meant to follow , linking crop - dusters / anthrax to 9/11 . Mohamed Atta , DT alleged 9/11 ringleader , supposedly went into a U.S. Department of Agriculture office seeking a $ 650,000 loan to buy and enlarge a crop-duster . He made sure DT agent knew and MD spell his name , and when she balked at DT loan , “ he asked what MD stop him from VBG around her desk , cutting her throat , and taking DT money from DT large safe in DT office . ” He then admired a photo of Washington , D.C. , asked to buy PRP , inquired about security at DT NNP Trade Center , implied he was associated with Al Qaeda , and told her IN Bin Laden “ ‘ MD someday be known as DT NN ’s greatest leader . ’ “ MacQueen sardonically comments , “ And DT is DT story of how a terrorist leader , engaged in a top - secret operation , sought a NN loan to help him with his plan . ” For CD familiar with Lee Harvey Oswald ’s ( or his double ’s ) antics to make himself unforgettable on visits to a car dealership and a rifle range before JFK ’s assassination , DT Atta charade should ring a bell . MacQueen makes a powerful case IN DT various crop-duster incidents were “ disinformation ” and IN their purpose was to link 9/11 to DT anthrax attacks and , notably , to Iraq . He notes IN PRP was RB at this NN IN DT fictitious story of Atta meeting with an Iraqi intelligence agent in Prague was widely circulated to “ solidify this connection . ” He argues IN once DT FBI admitted IN DT anthrax attacks were not a foreign operation but DT claim had served its purpose , DT crop - duster stories vanished into obscurity . However , he concludes , “ Given IN DT anthrax attacks were a domestic operation , and given IN DT alleged hijackers were implicated in DT operation prior to its occurrence , DT conclusion cannot be avoided : DT 9/11 attacks were RB a domestic operation . ” But as few can forget , on February 5 , 2003 at DT UN Security Council , DT Iraq / anthrax / crop - duster claim arose from its sleep in DT infamous , fraudulent presentation by Colin Powell as he slyly tied Iraq back to DT anthrax attacks and shilled for war against Iraq . DT feat of propaganda was but CD of at least 532 occasions when eight top members of DT Bush administration made at least 936 false statements on Iraq ’s possession of weapons of mass destruction and its links to Al Qaeda , according to a NN conducted by DT Center for NNP Integrity and DT Fund for Independence in Journalism and released in 2008 . Anyone concerned about DT truth behind 9/11 and DT anthrax attacks should read this profoundly important book . PRP is filled with tight argumentation backed by solid evidence , and even DT speculative parts ring true . In closing I will mention MacQueen ’s fascinating penultimate chapter wherein he speculates about DT significance of DT repeated word “ unthinkable ” by DT NN and NN officials following George W. Bush ’s use of DT term “ rethink DT unthinkable ” in a NNP 1 , 2001 speech at DT National Defense University . DT mainstream NN used DT word “ unthinkable ” repetitively throughout October 2001 when referring to DT anthrax attacks . And CD of DT early anthrax threatening letters sent to Tom Brokaw , begins : “ DT Unthinkabel ” ( sic ) – showing , of course , how Muslim terrorists ca n’t spell English . “ EX is a pattern here , ” MacQueen writes . Words matter , and those repeated enough matter more , words such as ground zero , homeland , and unthinkable . “ He who wants to persuade should not put his trust in DT right argument , ” Joseph Conrad wrote in Lord Jim . “ DT power of sound has always been greater than DT power of sense . ” MacQueen has chosen sense through argument , and rather than dismissing his as unthinkable , thinking NNS everywhere should engage PRP . DT 2001 anthrax letter attacks in DT NNP NNPS killed five NNS and wounded dozens . PRP were widely blamed on extremist Muslims and their backers and used to support DT invasions of Afghanistan and Iraq . PRP were RB used to justify and hasten DT passage of DT USA PATRIOT Act , which was being presented to Congress just as DT first anthrax victim grew ill . In October 2001 , CD of DT hypotheses WDT gained ground was DT of DT Double Perpetrator , DT claim IN al - Qaeda was carrying out DT attacks with DT support of Iraq . Much evidence was put forth to support this Double Perpetrator hypothesis but independent NNS soon discovered IN DT anthrax spores came from a domestic lab in DT NNP serving DT military and intelligence communities , not from al - Qaeda or Iraq . DT FBI then quickly claimed IN an individual was responsible for DT attacks and began noisily looking for this “ lone wolf . ” In 2008 DT Bureau named Dr. Bruce Ivins of DT NNP Army NNP Institute of Infectious NNP as DT “ anthrax killer . ” Although DT FBI remains committed to DT Ivins hypothesis , DT case has been disintegrating for DT last three NNS . Currently , PRP is justly held in contempt not merely by NNS who worked with Ivins but by JJ journalists as well as several NNP senators . But this raises DT question : if Ivins did not commit this crime , who did ? This book presents evidence to support DT following points : ( a) DT anthrax attacks were carried out by a group of perpetrators , not by a “ lone wolf . ” DT attacks were , therefore , DT result of a NN — by definition a plan by two or more NNS , made in secret and resulting in an immoral or illegal act . ( b) DT group WDT carried out this crime consisted , in whole or in part , of insiders deep within DT NNP NN apparatus . ( c) These insiders were DT same NNS who planned DT 9/11 attacks (d) DT anthrax attacks were meant to facilitate a seizure of power by DT executive branch of NN through intimidation of Congress and NNP civil society . PRP were RB designed to achieve JJ acquiescence to and support for DT redefinition of NNP foreign policy , replacing DT Cold War with a JJ and aggressive JJ conflict framework , DT JJ War on Terror .

Both of PRP are working due to which PRP are not able to interact with her at all ; hardly 5 - 10 minutes in DT day . She stays with her grandparents who take care of her needs IN food , bath etc. but PRP do not interact with her either . She keeps watching TV all DT NN . She has started doing things IN drinking NN from tumbler etc. only after learning PRP from TV . She does not respond to her name . Till now none of PRP call her by any particular name . PRP use different names or no name at all . She plays on her own , takes care of herself IN walking carefully on slippery floor or catching hold of railing while on steps . But she does not walk on slopes and if she does , she takes calculated steps . She does not have any eye contact with PRP . Though PRP has improved in last few days but is still minimal . She does not stick to CD toy for long and soon gets bored of PRP . She does not speak any meaningful words IN mama or papa . She does not interact with any NNS of her own age group and PRP do n't VB if she will do so in future . She seems to VB older NNS ( 7 - 8 NNS old ) and tries to interact with them when she goes to DT park - but walks off on her own if EX is no immediate response from them . Will she be dependent on someone in future ? A: DT fact IN your daughter has shown improvement with only a little stimulation from DT parents is very hopeful . Perhaps all four of PRP should agree on calling her by CD name , giving her a chance to develop an identity and a name . At this age , most NNS will move from CD activity to another . text: Fact check : Melinda Gates did n't exactly say Black NNS ' must ' be vaccinated for NN - CD DT claim : Melinda Gates says Black NNS must be vaccinated first for NN - CD after NN care workers . Melinda Gates , philanthropist and co-founder of DT Bill & Melinda Gates Foundation , says IN after NN care workers , Black NNS must be next in line for NN for NNP - CD , according to a story on Live24 . Gates , in a NNP magazine interview on DT eve of JJ NN summit in early June , discussed how anti-racism protests following DT death of George Floyd , an African American man , while in custody of Minneapolis police fits into NN equity , especially with development of a NN - CD NN . " DT first NNS WDT need this NN are DT 60 million NN care workers around DT NN . PRP deserve to VB PRP before anybody else . Then PRP start tiering , " 24 Live quoted Gates as saying in DT NNP story , written by Jamie Ducharme . DT quote matched DT NN in NNP ( though Live24 incorrectly identified DT magazine as a newspaper ) . But then , instead of continuing DT direct quote , DT Live24 piece paraphrased Gates ' subsequent statement , writing , " Melinda went on to say IN Black NNS in DT U.S. must be vaccinated after more than 60 million NN care workers around DT NN . " DT same headline was repeated by NNP Nut NNP , but attributed to NNP . DT NNP interview did not quote Gates as saying Black NNS " must be " vaccinated after NN workers . Asked who needs NNS after NN care workers , Gates told DT magazine , " in DT U.S. , DT MD be Black NNS next , quite honestly , and JJ other NNS of color . " Related : Historic layoffs take biggest toll on Blacks , Latinos , women and DT young " PRP are having disproportionate effects from NN - CD . From RB , NNS with underlying NN conditions , and then NNS who are older . Those are DT ones who all need PRP first . PRP RB need to VB about essential workers who are keeping our grocery stores open for PRP so PRP can buy food , or who are making sure IN food moves through DT warehouses . " Live24 did n't immediately respond to a request for comment on DT way PRP characterized Gates ' statement . Asked about DT Live24 article , DT Gates Foundation directed USA TODAY to DT NNP piece . DT Gates Foundation VBD at DT June 4 summit PRP will donate $ 1.6 billion over five NNS to Gavi , a JJ - private partnership WDT helps vaccinate half DT NN 's NNS against NN . DT foundation RB VBD in an online JJ release IN PRP will donate $ 100 million to a JJ Gavi effort to purchase NN - CD vaccinations for lower - income NNS so IN " everyone who needs PRP can have access to PRP , starting with NN care workers and other high - risk populations . " DT headline , " Melinda Gates says Black NNS must be vaccinated first for NNP - CD after NN care workers " is misleading . And PRP was repeated in DT story . Gates did say , however , IN Black NNS and " JJ other NNS of color " should be next in line for DT NN after NN care workers . • NN magazine 's " Melinda Gates Lays Out Her Biggest Concern for DT Next Phase of DT NNP - CD Pandemic " • Live24's " Melinda Gates Says Black NNPS Must Be Vaccinated First For NNP - CD After NNP Care Workers " • DT Gates Foundation : " Bill & Melinda Gates Foundation pledges $ 1.6 billion to Gavi , DT NNP Alliance , to protect DT next generation with lifesaving NNS " • Gavi , DT NNP Alliance 's " NN leaders make historic commitments to provide equal access to NNS for all " Donnelle Eller covers agriculture , DT environment and NN for DT Register . text: For DT fifth consecutive day , EX are no JJ NNS of NN - CD NNS in NNP Zealand . PRP remains at 1,754 . And DT total of confirmed and probable NNS is 1,404 . EX is CD additional recovered case and this total is now 1,462 and EX are just 21 remaining active NNS of NN - CD . EX are no additional deaths to report . And , currently , EX is nobody in hospital with NNP - CD following DT discharge of a person from Middlemore Hospital . Yesterday , our laboratories processed 4,279 tests . So our grand total of tests undertaken to date in NNP Zealand is 267,435 . Just an update on DT NZ NNP Tracer app , EX are now 422,000 registrations on DT - an increase of 17,000 since yesterday . Just to remind NNS , IN even registering , which provides your up - to - date contact details with DT Ministry of NNP is incredibly helpful for both PRP and for PRP and our wider efforts . So I continue to encourage to download DT app . EX are now over 17,000 QR posters available in businesses around NNP Zealand , representing DT unique NNP Zealand business number and those are DT ones WDT work with DT NZ NNP Tracer app . PRP 're launching another app today called Āwhina for NN care and professional staff . PRP provides them with access to information on DT updated case definition , on local clinical pathways , and on guidance around use of personal protective equipment amongst other things . PRP 're very pleased to be able to provide DT information to our NN professional workforce so PRP 's available on their mobile device and PRP is updated as PRP is updated on our website . PRP 've worked on DT app with feedback and input from NNS across DT system . Finally , on another important topic , back in alert level 4 , I certainly noticed , and PRP MD well have , EX were JJ NNS out walking or cycling to VB some fresh air and physical activity to break DT monotony of being inside . With less traffic on DT roads , I have to say , PRP was both easy and very enjoyable . Now EX is obviously more traffic on DT road under alert level 2 , but I MD encourage NNS to still try and build in some physical activity into your days . I VBP PRP 's getting more difficult with shorter and colder days , especially those mornings , but if PRP can retain DT physical activity and build PRP into your day , perhaps for local trips - whether PRP 's school , work or to DT shops - DT will help PRP stay well over winter . What PRP MD notice is your local councils providing more space for walking and cycling to make PRP easier . I commend DT councils for doing this . I strongly encourage NNS to make DT most of DT . So PRP 'll cooperate - continue to work , as PRP have been , with DT Ministry of Transport , around DT benefits of walking and cycling where EX is NN - CD or not . NN : MD PRP be comfortable with DT country moving to level 1 earlier than a month away ? Dr Ashley Bloomfield : DT advice PRP 've given , and this was DT basis for DT Cabinet discussion , and their decision on Monday was to first of all to move DT group side up to 100 and then -- size up to 100 and then remain in full alert level 2 for a period of two weeks before moving to alert level 1 . But I 'm RB aware as DT Prime Minister VBD on Monday PRP will be reconsidering DT aLe letter level set -- alert level settings on June 2 . DT ultimate decision remains with cabinet . NN : What why do PRP need to say in alert level 2 for so long ? Dr Ashley Bloomfield : DT main thing is PRP need to be certain IN DT cumulative result of activities means our border procedures are safe and secure especially as contemplate to a possible move to a bubble with Australia and / or more NNS coming into DT country . NN : Have PRP seen Winston Peters this morning VBD PRP should be in level 1 already and have a Trans - Tasman bubble arranged ? MD DT be a workable possibility at DT moment ? Dr Ashley Bloomfield : I can't speak for DT Deputy Prime Minister 's comments . What I can say is IN PRP are working hard on what alert level 1 will look IN . And RB separately , but obviously linked very hard with DT airline industry , airports , foreign affairs and of course our counterparts in Australia , on what MD need to be in place to allow a Trans - Tasman bubble , DT key thing is WDT MD require both NNS have confidence in DT arrangement . NN : DT MD be a no right now , from today , tomorrow , immediate future ? Dr Ashley Bloomfield : As I say , PRP is work actively under way but PRP MD require decisions of cabinets of both NNS before a Trans - Tasman bubble MD VB ahead . Our job is to provide really good advice on what needs to be in place both in terms of DT pattern of NNS in each country but RB at DT border and on flights to help make sure EX was no risk of transmission of any NNS between NNS . NN : I understand IN DT mask - wearing has been completed . Is DT DT case ? When was an announcement made ? Dr Ashley Bloomfield : EX was a review of DT scientific evidence and literature a couple of weeks ago , which is DT NN on our website . PRP have asked for further advice from our different technical advisory groups , including our overall technical advisory group . EX is not a unanimous view on any of those groups but DT weight of DT rue is still IN our current policy , which is not to either recommend or require widespread use of masks , is DT right NN at this point in NN . But PRP 're just finising -- finalising DT . PRP will make an updated statement available in DT next day or two . NN : Have PRP changed your position on wearing masks in places IN JJ transport ? Dr Ashley Bloomfield : No , PRP 're not . DT use of masks needs to be put in DT context of DT situation PRP 're in right now , alert level 2 VBG to alert level 1 with a record fifth day in - a - row with no JJ NNS and no evidence of community transmission . DT 's DT evidence WDT will keep NNS safe along with physical distancing . NN : Some say PRP MD VB to see international students who VBP to VB at DT University of Auckland 's NNP School to be able to enter DT country . Do PRP VB PRP 's safe to have some students come in if PRP 're paying to stay at hostels ? Dr Ashley Bloomfield : This is a piece of work under way , discussions are happening , PRP 're involved in them , led by our education colleagues . DT key thing is , any group coming into DT country - EX 's been publicity about some particular NNS with particular skills who 've come in over DT last few weeks under a special exemptions policy , anyone who comes into DT country needs to do so in a way WDT complies with DT 14 - day self or managed isolation , except in very rare circumstances PRP can be very confident DT risk is low . Yes , DT does open up DT option of international students coming into DT country and PRP MD need to make sure IN all DT arrangements were in place to do so safely . NN : What alert level will DT country have to be at for PRP to feel comfortable to establish a Trans - Tasman bubble ? Dr Ashley Bloomfield : I VBP DT 's depend on both governments deciding DT risks are able to be managed within an appropriate process . I VBP PRP VBD this on Monday - PRP is not dependent on PRP being in alert level 1 but dependent on decision - makers in both NNS agreeing to PRP . NN : VBG back to allowing NNS back into DT country , MD PRP still recommend PRP stay at hotels in Christchurch or Auckland or MD PRP envisage a NN PRP MD self - isolate at home as PRP did before ? Dr Ashley Bloomfield : At this point in NN , because DT border is so important for PRP to keep DT infection out of DT country , PRP 're maintaining DT position IN PRP requires , either , quarantine or supervised isolation at CD of DT facilities WDT are setup in Auckland or Christchurch . NN : Is is this DT first NN -- is this DT first NN EX 's been no - CD in hospital for NNP - CD since DT pandemic lockdown began ? Dr Ashley Bloomfield : I VBP PRP is , absolutely , yes , PRP 've had a number of NNS in hospital . Never a big number but I VBP this is DT first NN in a couple of months PRP have n't had someone in hospital . DT 's another good position to be in . NN : Yesterday PRP spoke a bit about exemptions PRP signed off on . Do PRP sign off on them all ? How JJ have PRP signed off on for NNS in DT screen industry ? Dr Ashley Bloomfield : DT ones in screen industry I do n't sign - off on . PRP 're signed off by Minister Twyford and PRP 're related to specific commercial ventures . DT very small number I sign off on are around workers with very particular skills , IN EX were some engineers in Europe what came to fix DT so - called " poo " pipe here in Wellington . And CD I mentioned yesterday who is here to repair X - ray machines . DT ones about commercial ventures are not something I sign off on . However , PRP have to comply with DT very strict JJ NN measures in place for earn else . PRP -- everyone else . PRP require DT 14 - day quarantine period . NN : Do PRP VB how JJ have been signed off on ? Dr Ashley Bloomfield : In DT latter category ? REPORTER : In both . Dr Ashley Bloomfield : I 've signed off on in a handful . I should say those are NNS who do n't need to do DT 14 - day quarantine , assuming PRP 've fulfilled a number of requirements . In DT case of DT other group , PRP 's somewhere between CD and 200 but Minister Twyford is DT person who will VB DT exact numbers RB . NN : On DT point of allowing further NNS in , some of DT arrangements WDT these NNS are quarantining overseas rather than quarantining when PRP VBP here ? Dr Ashley Bloomfield : Not at this point in NN . But DT is something PRP are looking at . PRP MD need to be comfort in DT quarantine arrangements in DT - at DT destination , where PRP 're coming from - sorry , at DT point of where PRP 're coming from and be confident PRP were following DT same strict JJ NN measures PRP have in place here . PRP is something PRP 're looking at a possibility . NN : Is DT something PRP MD move to of sort of RB being a visa or something requirement and proof IN PRP have managed to self - isolate and / or quarantine in their country of residence before coming to NNP Zealand and then PRP MD VB straight into their role ? Dr Ashley Bloomfield : Yes , DT 's absolutely an option . Another option - PRP 're seeing some NNS do this - is requiring testing before NNS depart from their departure point in a timely way . Both those are options . But at this point in NN , PRP 're not using either of those options but PRP are options for DT future . NN : Note IN DT NN 's response to PPE requests internationally is currently no , can PRP say which NNS have asked for help with PPE ? Dr Ashley Bloomfield : No , I do n't VB which NNS have asked DT but PRP can provide DT information . NN : PRP MD have seen NNS wearing makeshift masks over DT mouth , nose area . Does DT offer any value for NNS taking those measures ? Dr Ashley Bloomfield : I 'm not discouraging NNS from doing PRP . If PRP 're VBG to use a mask or face covering , VB how to do DT safely . PRP makes PRP even more careful to use careful hand hygiene . Because DT 's where DT potential for using face masks can be , with touching inanimate objects and then touching DT face . PRP have done reviews where NN care staff MD have got infected from - on more than CD occasion PRP believe PRP is from contaminated surfaces even though PRP were wearing full PPE . I can't overstate DT importance of NNS using good hand hygiene whether using a face covering or not . NN : Are PRP happy with where testing numbers are at ? PRP 's dropped off over DT last couple of days . Is DT to be expected ? Dr Ashley Bloomfield : First of all , PRP always see a drop over DT weekend and DT tends to flow through into DT Monday and Tuesday numbers . PRP 's coming up again , I VBP , today . PRP were 4,279 tests processed yesterday . Yes , PRP will expect to see DT numbers come down because - for two reasons . First of all , through DT last couple of months PRP 've been testing for NNS with symptoms . PRP continue to do DT , and DT is IN DT vast majority of DT testing WDT 's happening . Anyone who fits DT case information on our website , which is very broad still . But secondly , PRP were doing a lot of testing to try and identify if EX was any hidden NN out RB in DT community . Now IN PRP 's clear it's not , PRP 'll be shifting DT focus for DT testing to DT border because DT 's DT area where PRP 'll have DT most risk . EX is a very specific plan being developed around IN which CD PRP has been through cabinet and approved will become in operation from 8 June . PRP is testing NNS and looking for any breach at DT border with more testing RB . NN : Because of our success in tackling NN - CD , is PRP VBG to affect our chances if EX 's a NN created internationally , will PRP affect our chances of getting DT NN if PRP 're a country as seen as doing well and does n't need PRP as badly as other NNS ? Dr Ashley Bloomfield : I should n't VB so . PRP 's still a long way off , for a start . Secondly , as PRP will have seen in DT NN strategy WDT was publicised earlier in DT week PRP have a number of irons in DT fire RB to make sure IN PRP have access to a NN as soon as PRP 's available , and RB planning for making sure IN PRP can vaccinate our population . NN : Following on what PRP were saying RB , JJ testing at DT borders , does DT mean PRP MD see more NNS coming through DT borders ? Dr Ashley Bloomfield : Ah , regardless of whether PRP 're seeing more NNS coming through DT borders what PRP 're looking at is whether PRP routinely test everyone coming through DT border at some point during their quarantine period . But RB , PRP 's about testing of NNS who are working at DT border , either at airports or ports , or in those quarantine facilities . So DT will be where DT focus of our asymptomatic testing will be . NN : Back to masks , where does DT discrepancy lie at DT moment ? Dr Ashley Bloomfield : EX are a range of views whether widespread mask use whether on JJ transport or in other JJ settings by DT general NN is worth doing from a sense of IN DT benefits outweigh DT potential risks at this point in NN . But PRP 's just CD of those things WDT 's under active conversation . NN : CD question from our sports team . DT Tokyo Olympics have been postponed to DT middle of next NN . Do PRP VB a NN MD be ready by DT NN , and do PRP VB DT Olympics should VB ahead if EX is n't a NN and PRP are VBG to have thousands of athletes around ? Dr Ashley Bloomfield : I 'm prepared to answer most questions but I do n't VB I can offer any sound insights into DT particular issue . I 'm sorry . OK . Thank PRP very much , everybody .

text: MILANO ( Reuters ) - Italian biotech firm Rottapharm Biotech is looking for more investors at home to help fund development of a NN against NNP - CD as DT country looks to produce domestic supplies of medication to fight DT pandemic , its CEO told Reuters . DT first results are expected March next NN , he VBD . At least two other trials are underway by domestic pharmaceutical research companies in Italy , CD of DT European NNS worst hit by DT NN . NNS are looking for ways to shore up supplies of potential NNS as drugmakers rush to develop a treatment or NN for DT NN , which has infected more than 6.53 million NNS and killed over 385,000 . text: EX are 102 candidate NNS being explored as a means of ending DT NN - CD pandemic , as of April 30 . Eight of these have already made PRP to clinical trials in humans , and another 94 are in DT pre-clinical evaluation stage . These candidates RB fall into eight different categories of NN development strategy WDT are being explored . While PRP still does n’t guarantee success , this is in effect DT biological equivalent of hedging our bets in DT hope IN CD of DT strategies will pay off . But if and when a successful NN is found , PRP still have to manufacture enough of PRP to immunise huge numbers of NNS all around DT NN . And how long this will take , and what is involved , will depend on which strategy is found to work , because different NNS are made in different ways . Despite arguments about lack of preparedness concerning PPE and testing , DT UK has been on DT front foot when PRP comes to identifying suitable candidate NNS . PRP is leading DT charge to ramp up production , having invested more than any other country in doing so , according to DT NN secretary , Matt Hancock . DT UK’s two leading candidate NNS , being developed by DT University of Oxford and Imperial College London respectively , both use very different approaches WDT were already under investigation in DT lab for other diseases . Oxford ’s candidate , ChAdOx1 nCoV - CD , uses a genetically modified chimpanzee adenovirus as a “ vector ” to carry DT genetic sequence of a protein from DT NN - CD NN to DT human body . DT body can then learn to recognise DT NN and start producing antibodies to fight PRP . This is DT same technique DT team previously developed for DT closely related Mers NN , which showed promise in animal and early - stage human testing . Usually NN development takes NNS , but human clinical trials for DT Oxford NN candidate are underway , just three months after DT genetic sequence of DT NN was released for NN . This is thanks to a specialist adenovirus manufacturing platform adapted as part of work by DT EPSRC UCL - Oxford Future NNP Manufacturing Research Hub ( Vax Hub ) , as well as next - generation gene sequencing methods WDT have enabled DT team to proceed at breakneck speed . Pharmaceutical company AstraZeneca has announced PRP will develop , manufacture and distribute DT NN ( if PRP ’s successful ) around DT NN . But to do this , PRP will need to find a way to scale up production without critically affecting DT supply of other vital NNS . JJ manufacturing facilities are adept at producing millions of NN doses against influenza , measles and polio . PRP have strategies in place to step up production at times of increased demand , such as for DT annual winter NN season . But PRP are in unprecedented times , and DT JJ demand for a safe and effective NN NN will be on a scale never before seen , likely resulting in key production and distribution bottlenecks . NN production requires complex manufacturing processes involving DT production of living organisms WDT , in turn , generate DT genetically - modified NN on which DT NN is based . And PRP must VB DT manufacturing right . These NNS will be administered to healthy NNS to generate immunity to DT NN . Any faults MD risk their safety and a long - term loss of JJ confidence . But EX is cause for cautious optimism . As PRP await DT clinical trial outcomes for DT Oxford NN , behind DT scenes EX has been a flurry of activity to adapt existing manufacturing technologies and processes to make DT adenovirus vector PRP relies on . DT manufacturing process for DT Oxford NN will begin by encoding DT NN surface protein into DT adenovirus vector . “ Producer cells ” , usually human embryonic kidney ( HEK ) cells , will then be used as mini-factories to produce DT vector particles . DT producer cells will be grown at scale in a bioreactor , a vessel WDT tightly controls DT environmental conditions to optimise cell growth . DT cells will then be put through a series of steps to purify and concentrate DT final adenovirus vector , including filtration and centrifugation ( spinning PRP very fast in order to separate different particles ) . Finally , DT solution will be formulated into a usable product and kept stable by storing PRP between 2 °C and 8°C . However , DT final concentration of DT solution can vary significantly , and PRP is DT lack of an effective manufacturing process to resolve this problem WDT limits current production on a mass scale . This will be DT significant challenge AstraZeneca will face in translating DT lab - based Oxford process to something akin to industrial manufacturing . Of course , all these efforts will only come into play if DT Oxford NN ( or potentially another in DT same category ) is found to work . Other NN candidates , such as DT being developed by Imperial , will require a substantially different manufacturing process . In these unprecedented times , DT NN ’s NN experts will have to work with unprecedented speed and innovation to deliver a way to save potentially millions of lives and start returning society to normal .

text: Full details have been confirmed for DT NME Spotify Signing Tent at this weekend ’s Reading and Leeds Festivals . Following DT successful launch of DT NME app within Spotify , PRP ’re teaming up once again to make our annual festival signing tents better than ever . And so far DT NNPS , Paramore and Enter Shikari have confirmed to meet fans up close and personal . While PRP ’re RB , be sure to take DT most outlandish object PRP can VB of for DT bands to sign , and DT best will make DT magazine next week . Tweet or Instagram your pictures to # NMEreading and # NMEleeds . And after PRP ’ve been to meet your favourite band , be sure to head over to our dedicated hub where PRP ’ll be able to view , download and share photos taken by an NME photographer and listen to Spotify playlists made by DT bands themselves . DT Reading and Leeds Festivals take place this weekend ( August 24 - 26 ) at Little John ’s Farm in Reading and Bramham Park in Leeds . Horowitz , DMD , MA , MPH Author of thirteen books including DT national bestseller , Emerging Viruses : AIDS & Ebola - Nature , Accident or Intentional ? and Death in DT Air : Globalism , Terrorism and Toxic Warfare 4 -2-3 Abstract Rather than a JJ NN emergency , DT " Severe Acute Respiratory Syndrome , " generally called SARS , is best diagnosed as a " Sickening and Repulsive Scam . " This article argues IN this unprecedented viral attack is , alternatively , an ingenious social experiment featuring institutionalized bioterrorism for widespread psycho-social control . DT outcome of this experiment , whether PRP leads to population reduction or not , depends on PRP . Background PRP are about to read much neglected truths pertaining to this bizarre JJ pneumonia - JJ illness called SARS . Authorities explain this acronym for Severe Acute Respiratory Syndrome as simply DT latest threat in an ongoing series of attacks on humanity by mysteriously mutating " supergerms . " Yet , a careful NN of this multi- disciplinary subjectÊ reveals something amiss far more insidious and deadly than SARS . This spreading scourge of Severe Acute Respiratory Syndrome stretching from Asia to North America has all DT earmarks of a novel social experiment in population manipulation aimed to culture DT mass mind for DT arrival of " DT Big NNP " - a biological agent WDT will facilitate decimation of approximately a third to half of DT NN 's population , in keeping with current official population reduction objectives . Naturally PRP MD be disinclined to believe DT above sentence . Open - mindedness in this domain threatens exposure to a " Twilight Zone " of knowledge in which reality is far stranger than fiction . Your first instinct , therefore , might be to close this page in favor of DT next SARS site WDT promises more of DT standard treatments broadcast on every official NN page and NN report on this subject . But , if PRP choose to have your worldview shattered by considering DT little known truths surrounding Severe Acute Respiratory Syndrome , then continue reading . . . . text: ( Reuters NNP ) - - Pregnant women who VBP DT NN , or a NN NN , are not increasing their baby ’s risk for an NN spectrum disorder ( ASD ) , a JJ NN suggests . Researchers analyzed data on 196,929 NNS born from 2000 through 2010 in DT Kaiser Permanente Northern California healthcare system after at least 24 weeks gestation . During follow - up periods ranging from two to 15 NNS , 1.6 percent of DT NNS were diagnosed with ASD . Among DT mothers of DT 1.6 percent , fewer than 1 percent had DT NN while pregnant , and about 23 percent had gotten a NN NN . Neither influenza infection nor NN during pregnancy were tied to NNS being diagnosed with ASD , DT research team reports in JAMA Pediatrics . “ Our data showed pretty convincingly IN EX was no association with influenza at any NN during pregnancy and NN in DT child , ” VBD senior author Lisa Croen , of Kaiser Permanente Northern California in Oakland . “ PRP ’re not recommending IN any changes be made to DT NN policy , ” Croen told Reuters NNP . “ PRP are encouraging women to VB vaccinated while pregnant . ” Previous studies looking at possible links between influenza during pregnancy and ASD had produced mixed results , Croen and her colleagues note in JAMA Pediatrics . And until now , PRP add , no studies had looked for links between ASD and NN NNS , which are recommended for pregnant women . NNS with ASD MD have social , communication and behavioral challenges WDT MD cause them to interact , learn and behave in ways different from most NNS , according to DT U.S. Centers for NNP Control and Prevention ( CDC ) . A second NN published in DT same journal RB found no link between NNS against influenza A ( H1N1 ) - sometimes referred to as swine flue - during pregnancy in 2009 - 2010 and complications later in life for over 60,000 Danish NNS . DT results support DT overall safety profile of DT NN , write DT researchers , who were led by Anders Hviid , of DT Statens Serum Institute in Copenhagen . PRP support DT NNP NNP Organization ’s recommendations WDT pregnant women should VB a NN NN . While DT CDC recommends IN everyone over 6 months of age receive a NN NN , PRP ’s especially important for some NNS - including pregnant women - who are more likely to experience complications from DT NN . “ DT NN in pregnancy is dangerous , ” VBD Dr. Loralei Thornburg , a high - risk pregnancy expert at DT University of Rochester NNP Center in NNP York . “ PRP VBP IN women who have DT NN do much worse and PRP VBP their babies do worse . ” Pregnant women with influenza MD be at an increased risk for premature labor and delivery , according to DT CDC . EX is RB a greater risk of birth defects in their babies . “ EX have been a lot of fears about NNS , but DT data suggest PRP are effective and do n’t increase DT risk of NN and other perinatal complications , ” VBD Thornburg , who was not involved with DT JJ studies . “ DT benefits strongly outweigh any risks or theoretical risks WDT PRP ’ve seen . ”

text: • Shares of Inovio Pharmaceuticals , Moderna , and Novavax surged on Monday as NNP 's NN spread further . • On Thursday , DT Coalition for Epidemic Preparedness Innovations announced IN PRP MD provide as much as $ 11 million in funding to Inovio and Moderna to develop NNS against DT Wuhan NN . • Here 's how much each company gained . DT companies continued rallies WDT were sparked on Thursday when DT Coalition for Epidemic Preparedness Innovations , a JJ - private nonprofit based in Norway , announced IN PRP MD provide as much as $ 11 million in funding to Inovio and Moderna to develop NNS against DT NN . DT University of Queensland in Australia is RB working on a NN for DT NN and received funding from DT coalition . As of Monday , DT NN , which was first identified in Wuhan , NNP , had killed at least 81 NNS and infected more than 2,700 others amid fears of a JJ outbreak . EX are no NNS or treatments for DT NN , officially called 2019 - nCoV . PRP 's similar to DT NN WDT caused severe acute respiratory syndrome , or SARS , which incited JJ panic during a 2003 outbreak . While some of DT experimental NNS DT pharma companies are working on to target DT Wuhan NN MD be ready for human testing in a few months , approval for widespread use will take much longer , DT Wall Street Journal reported on Thursday . text: NN sources out of NNP Zealand are reporting IN two nurses in Samoa , facing charges over DT deaths of two babies who died shortly after receiving DT measles , mumps , and rubella ( MMR ) NN , have pleaded guilty to manslaughter . Two nurses in Samoa , facing charges over DT deaths of two babies , have pleaded guilty to manslaughter . PRP had previously denied charges of negligence , manslaughter , and obstruction of justice . DT pair appeared today in DT Supreme Court for DT start of an expected two week trial , but their lawyer entered guilty pleas . CD defendant , Luse Emo Tauvale , has admitted to three charges of obstruction of justice and two of negligence and manslaughter , while Leutogi Te’o has pleaded guilty to CD charge of manslaughter . NNP Impact NNP reported on DT original story in 2018 when PRP made headline NN on TV1 in Samoa . Tala Fou brings PRP breaking NN on DT death of two young NNS both aged 1 - NN - old from DT villages of Safotu and Sasina in Savaii . Both NNS died within minutes of being vaccinated with DT MMR vacine at Safotu Hospital on Friday morning DT 6th of July . Our NN Reporter Alisa Faamaoni met with both families in Savaii today . DT parents of DT first child Marietta and Samuelu Tuisuesue of Sasina explained in detail to Tala Fou IN within three minutes of their 1 - NN - old daughter Lannacallystah Samuelu being injected with DT MMR vacine by a nurse she was dead . • CDC , check YOUR data , MMR rates are NOT declining What was so tragic about this story was IN DT parents of DT second child who died had reportedly already learned about DT first infant ’s death a couple hours earlier and declined to have their child receive DT same NN . DT mother reported IN DT nurse administered DT MMR NN against her consent , leading to DT child ’s immediate death upon receiving DT NN . DT second family from Safotu is still coming to grips with DT loss of their 1 - NN - old son Lameko Siu . DT parents Punipuao and Si’u Timua arrived at DT Safotu hospital with their son Lameko on Friday within two hours of DT death of DT first child once PRP became aware of what had happend DT mother refused to allow her son to be vaccinated . DT mother claims IN DT nurse on duty persisted and without her consent vaccinated her son administering DT MMR NN and within a minute he was dead . After DT second death , NN authorities immediately confiscated all DT remaining doses of DT MMR NN , and dismissed DT JJ staff , not only to apparently conduct an investigation , but for their own safety from an outraged NN . DT Prime Minister of Samoa , Tuilaepa Aiono Sailele Malielegaoi , issued a statement about DT tragic events and reported IN , as a grandfather , CD of his grandsons had previously suffered something similar , an apparent NN injury WDT he survived but now can no longer talk . Death leaves a heartache no NN can heal . And I can imagine IN EX is no pain more far reaching and deeper than losing a child . My heart and prayers VBP out to DT grieving families at this most difficult NN . To DT effect , I humbly extend my deepest sympathy , condolences and pray IN comfort and peace will come to them . As a grandfather and father , I can relate to DT grief by DT families for their loss . I RB almost lost CD of my grandsons several NNS ago under similar circumstances . But with DT Grace of our Father in Heaven my grandson survived with DT proper treatment but he will never be DT same as he has lost DT ability to speak . As Prime Minister , I have called a full inquiry into DT circumstances leading up to this devastating incident which I do not take lightly . EX are already processes WDT will determine if negligence is a factor . And if so , rest assured those processes will be implemented to DT letter to ensure IN such a tragedy will not be repeated and those responsible will be made to answer . A Prime Example Why Informed Consent and Parental Rights are Important , and How Forced Vaccinations Endanger DT Lives of NNS NNS carry serious risks , and even DT U.S. Supreme Court has acknowledged these risks by stating IN NNS are “ Unavoidably unsafe . ” All across DT U.S. pro-vaccine extremists are trying to eliminate NN exemptions and parental choice for NNS . A recent bill passed in Oregon even gave dentists DT right to vaccinate NNS , as DT NN extremists push DT agenda of Big Pharma to try and vaccinate DT entire NN , regardless of whether or not some NNS are more susceptible to NN injuries than others . And in California Senator Richard Pan wants California to be DT first NN in DT U.S. to eliminate even DT JJ exemption for NNS , where physicians can best determine whether their patients should receive every NN recommended by DT CDC in DT childhood NN schedule . Pan wants DT politicians , DT NN Department of NNP NNP , to approve any JJ exemption to NNS instead of JJ doctors who provide JJ services to California NNS , and their parents . Of course when NNS die or are injured by NNS in DT NNP NNPS , EX is no NN attention and JJ outcry IN EX was in Samoa . DT ’s because DT U.S. is DT only country in DT NN WDT has given DT pharmaceutical industry immunity from legal consequences due to harm caused by NNS . DT previous version of DT list , published on April 20 , included 5 candidate NNS in clinical evaluation and 71 in preclinical evaluation . NNP York - based pharmaceutical giant Pfizer on Monday began testing a NN candidate for SARS - CoV - 2 , DT NN WDT causes NN - CD . DT hope is DT protein pieces will cause DT body to create antibodies WDT will stop DT NN from being able to attach to and invade cells . DT work is being done at DT university ’s Jenner Institute , named for Edward Jenner , DT 18th - century British physician who pioneered DT smallpox NN . DT university is partnering with DT British pharmaceutical company AstraZeneca to move forward with manufacturing should DT candidate NN prove effective . Oxford University and its spin - out company Vaccitech , which jointly hold DT rights to DT technology used to develop DT candidate NN , will receive no royalties during DT pandemic , DT university VBD . DT collaboration ’s mission statement VBD in part , “ PRP VBP IN as long as anyone is at risk from this NN , DT entire NN is at risk – every single person on DT NN needs to be protected from this NN . ’ DT NNP NNPS was among DT few NNS not taking part in DT fund - raising effort . text: Dr. Stephen Thomas , who helped develop NN candidates for diseases such as Ebola , Zika and MERS , discusses DT challenges involved in accelerating development during a pandemic . When I served in DT U.S. Army as a physician - scientist , I was assigned to Thailand , and EX is CD patient I remember vividly . He was only about 8 NNS old , lived on a farm in DT northern part of DT country , and was in DT hospital with a serious brain infection . His infection was caused by DT Japanese encephalitis NN ( JEV ) , which he ’d caught from a mosquito . If he survived , he was destined to live his life with severe and debilitating neurologic abnormalities . Even worse – this tragedy MD have been avoided . Thailand had a safe and effective JEV NN and worked extremely hard to routinely immunize all its NNS , but this child had been missed . DT heartbreaking situation reminded me what my friend and mentor , Dr. Bruce Innis , told me as I embarked on a career in NN development , “ NNS do n’t save lives , NN saves lives . ” He should VB , Dr. Innis has helped successfully develop more than 15 NNS , including DT JEV NN licensed in DT U.S . Developing NNS is a complex process driven by DT fundamentals of biology , biomanufacturing and engineering , and innovation . NN concepts are explored , and prototypes first tested in DT lab . NNS then test DT safety of DT NN on animals and , if results are promising , clinical trials involving NNS begin . PRP can take NNS to develop a NN , and something WDT works well in DT lab MD not fare as well in NNS . PRP need to keep this long , complicated , uncertain process in mind as PRP hear NN emerge about NN candidates for DT NNP - CD pandemic . DT U.S. Food and Drug Administration reviews and decides whether a NN candidate is suitable for experimentation in humans . Although DT agency does consider DT results of animal studies , much of its review focuses on how DT NN is manufactured , and whether DT process is scalable . Manufacturing at scale ( hundreds of millions of doses ) is important because PRP is not enough to demonstrate a NN is safe and has clinical benefit , PRP need a system in place to make sure DT NN is accessible , and NNS are actually vaccinated . DT entire process can take up to ten NNS , sometimes longer , and can cost up to a billion U.S. dollars , sometimes more . Even in times of a JJ NN emergency PRP is difficult to advance a NN from concept to DT marketplace . I played key roles in developing candidate NNS for Ebola , MERS - CoV , and Zika , and despite DT human suffering caused by these diseases , despite their international focus , and despite considerable investment from governments and DT pharmaceutical industry , only CD of those NNS ( Ebola ) has been licensed . DT NNP NNP Organization ( WHO ) attempts to expedite JJ NN development efforts by facilitating coordination and communication , using tools IN their ‘ NN pipeline tracker . ’ In an unfortunate but recurring pattern , numerous NN candidates always populate DT tracker initially as outbreaks unfold and DT money flows but , invariably , developers move on and drop off as resources and interest dries up . PRP is unclear how DT WHO ’s role and influence will VB if DT U.S. severs ties and withdraws its NNS and funding from Geneva . JJ developers with promising NN candidates become permanently stalled in their development process because PRP cannot afford DT costs of required testing . Others experience significant bottlenecks when trying to access DT limited biomanufacturing facilities specialized in producing NNS suitable for human use . Even large pharmaceutical companies with generous financial coffers and in - house capabilities face sizeable opportunity costs by pursuing epidemic outbreak projects . PRP are forced to borrow staff and other resources from current projects to support JJ development teams , thereby stalling ongoing projects and DT introduction of NNS against other human diseases . Facing such programmatic headwinds , how is DT U.S. NN VBG to execute its NNP - CD NN development plan , Operation Warp Speed ? Compared to DT U.S. NN responses for Ebola , MERS , and Zika , JJ elements of DT operation are status quo , especially in DT areas of development and manufacturing . DT NNP - CD NN effort , however , looks to employ JJ approaches in DT hopes of reducing project timelines . For example , utilizing DT Department of Defense to deploy , distribute , and administer NNS MD support DT rapid immunization of sizable populations . Another JJ approach is DT expanded role of DT federal NN in DT private - JJ partnerships WDT have defined DT NNP - CD NN development space . Operation Warp Speed directs IN DT federal NN will decide on DT NN development pathways and DT pharmaceutical companies will not , “ … decide on their own protocols . ” DT successful past performance of private - JJ partnerships in NN development leave me very encouraged for DT prospect of a safe and effective NN - CD NN . My expectations are measured and cautious , however , given DT difficult realities of JJ - private coordination , risk sharing , and industry finding DT balance between meeting JJ NN needs and revenue goals . As with any ambitious and audacious plan , DT devil is in DT highly complex details . EX is no doubt DT federal NN has numerous very experienced NN developers , and PRP was my privilege to work with JJ of them during my Army career and I continue to do so today . But NN development involves numerous teams working together and requires close coordination , not only between NN agencies ( this is hard enough ) , but with Congress and DT academic and private sectors . Achieving harmony in these relationships has been difficult in DT past because DT mission scope and incentives for DT NN and DT private sector are different in JJ important ways . John Young , Pfizer ’s chief business officer , was recently quoted saying Pfizer MD not seeking NN funding ( even after PRP were selected by U.S. NN as a finalist for funding ) because their focus was speed and PRP , “ … did n't VB to … spend a month negotiating with DT U.S. NN . ” DT NN is focused on protecting DT Nation and its citizens . DT pharmaceutical industry cares greatly about JJ NN , but RB answers to shareholders . Committing millions of dollars to high - risk ventures is a daily occurrence in DT life NN industries but IN risk is carefully calculated , as is DT financial upside . In some NNS , such as with Merck ’s Ebola and GSK ’s malaria NNS , companies embark on development projects despite understanding EX will be financial losses , but these situations are DT exception . How will industry manage DT risks and costs of developing a NNP - CD NN , while relinquishing considerable developmental command and control to DT NN ? Why does PRP matter who controls DT development plan ? Because PRP determine how DT NN will ultimately be used and by whom , thereby defining DT market . If protocol designs are restricted to meet U.S. or largely Western agendas , industry MD lose out on accessing a JJ NNP - CD NN market , perhaps DT biggest NN market , - which means billions MD be left without a NN and industry MD be left without a good way to recoup its investment . EX is RB DT issue of who will own DT intellectual property ( IP ) generated during DT collaboration . IP protections are major drivers of revenue streams and recovery of research and development investments . Members of Congress are already waging war on drug and other pharmaceutical pricing and profits . More than a few members wish to RB revamp provisions in U.S. Code , IN DT Bayh - Dole Act , to limit industry ’s exclusive rights to IP developed using U.S. taxpayer dollars . DT NN MD contend , some say rightly , IN if U.S. taxpayers are paying DT development bill , DT U.S. must be guaranteed an immediate return on its investment - such as preferential NN access and / or pricing . But this concept of “ America first , ” is not playing well . Paul Hudson , DT CEO of French NN juggernaut Sanofi Pasteur , was quickly corrected by DT French NN when he implied DT U.S. MD be entitled to preferential NNP - CD NN access due to its financial investment . Heads of prominent non-governmental organizations , governments , and industry convened this spring to discuss DT topic of NN access and DT result , expressed by Dr. Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus , WHO Director - General , was IN , “ NNS , NN partners , manufacturers , and DT private sector must act together and ensure IN DT fruits of NN and research can benefit everybody . ” Once a NN is available , manufacturing and distribution activities will need to be sustained and licenses and certifications maintained long after DT U.S. NN has moved on to DT next problem . These activities represent millions of dollars in expenditures every NN . DT pharmaceutical industry executes these tasks on a routine basis but without DT financial upside of JJ market access and IP rights , how will PRP be incentivized ? JJ companies jump into DT NN development pool during epidemics and pandemics because PRP is DT right thing to do for JJ NN . But few possess , or tolerate , DT required financial staying power to see DT project to completion . My experience leaves me little doubt IN developing a safe and effective NN - CD NN is feasible . DT unprecedented scope of coordination between , and among , U.S. NN agencies and industry is reassuring IN DT process can move fast , maybe even approach very fast , but DT ’s slightly slower than warp speed . Last week PRP was reported IN DT NN identified five companies PRP believes have DT highest likelihood of delivering a safe and effective NN - CD NN , including Moderna , AstraZeneca , Johnson & Johnson , Merck , and Pfizer . But numerous questions remain about how DT relationship between DT development partners will continue to be mutually beneficial long enough to not only realize DT development of a NN but to witness lives saved through NN . text: Originally published at McClatchy Newspapers by Greg Gordon on 5/20/11 WASHINGTON — Buried in FBI laboratory reports about DT anthrax attacks WDT killed five NNS in 2001 is data suggesting IN a chemical MD have been added to try to heighten DT powder ’s potency , a move WDT some experts say exceeded DT expertise of DT presumed killer . DT lab data , contained in more than 9,000 pages of files WDT emerged a NN after DT Justice Department closed its inquiry and condemned DT late Army microbiologist Bruce Ivins as DT perpetrator , shows unusual levels of silicon and tin in anthrax powder from two of DT five letters . Those elements are found in compounds WDT MD be used to weaponize DT anthrax , enabling DT lethal spores to float easily so PRP MD be readily inhaled by DT intended victims , NNS say . DT existence of DT silicon - tin chemical signature offered investigators DT possibility of tracing purchases of DT more than 100 such chemical products available before DT attacks , which might have produced hard evidence against Ivins or led DT agency to DT real culprit . More at DT Real NN But DT FBI lab reports released in late February give no hint IN bureau agents tried to find DT buyers of additives such as tin-catalyzed silicone polymers . DT apparent failure of DT FBI to pursue this avenue of investigation raises DT ominous possibility IN DT killer is still on DT loose . A McClatchy analysis of DT records RB shows IN other key scientific questions were left unresolved and conflicting data was n’t sorted out when DT FBI declared Ivins DT killer shortly after his July 29 , 2008 , suicide . CD chemist at a national laboratory told McClatchy IN DT tin-silicone findings and DT contradictory data should prompt a JJ round of testing on DT anthrax powder . A senior federal law enforcement official , who was made available only on DT condition of anonymity , VBD DT FBI had ordered exhaustive tests on DT possible sources of silicon in DT anthrax and concluded IN PRP was n’t added . Instead , DT lab found IN PRP ’s common for anthrax spores to incorporate environmental silicon and oxygen into their coatings as a “ natural phenomenon ” WDT does n’t affect DT spores ’ behavior , DT official VBD . To arrive at DT position , however , DT FBI had to discount its own bulk testing results showing IN silicon composed an extraordinary 10.8 percent of a sample from a mailing to DT NNP York Post and as much as 1.8 percent of DT anthrax from a letter sent to Democratic Sen. Patrick Leahy of Vermont , far more than DT occasional trace contamination . Tin — not usually seen in anthrax powder at all — was measured at 0.65 percent and 0.2 percent , respectively , in those letters . An FBI spokesman declined to comment on DT presence of tin or to answer other questions about DT silicon - tin connection . Several NNS and former colleagues of Ivins argue IN he was a career biologist who probably lacked DT chemistry knowledge and skills to concoct a silicon - based additive . “ EX ’s no way IN an individual scientist can invent a JJ way of making anthrax using silicon and tin , ” VBD Stuart Jacobsen , a Texas - based analytical chemist for an electronics company who ’s closely studied DT FBI lab results . “ PRP requires an institutional effort to do this , such as at a military lab . ” Martin Hugh - Jones , a NN - renowned anthrax expert who teaches veterinary medicine at Louisiana NNP University , called PRP “ just bizarre ” IN DT labs found both tin — which can be toxic to bacteria such as anthrax during lab culturing — and silicon . “ PRP have two elements at abnormally high levels , ” Hugh - Jones VBD . “ DT reduces your probability to a very small number IN PRP ’s an accident . ” DT silicon - tin connection was n’t DT only lead left open in CD of DT biggest investigations in FBI history , an inquiry WDT took DT bureau to DT cutting edge of laboratory NN . In April , McClatchy reported IN after locking in on Ivins in 2007 , DT bureau stopped searching for a match to a unique genetic bacterial strain NNS had found in DT anthrax WDT was mailed to DT Post and to NBC NNP anchor Tom Brokaw , although a senior bureau official had characterized PRP as DT hottest clue to date . FBI officials say PRP ’s all a moot point , because PRP ’re positive PRP got DT right man in Ivins . A mentally troubled anthrax researcher at DT U.S. Army NNP Research Institute of Infectious Diseases at Fort Detrick , Md. , Ivins overdosed on drugs not long after learning IN he ’d soon face five counts of capital murder . In ending DT inquiry last NN , DT Justice Department VBD IN a genetic fingerprint had pointed investigators to Ivins ’ lab , and gumshoe investigative techniques enabled them to compile considerable circumstantial evidence WDT demonstrated his guilt . Among these proofs , prosecutors cited Ivins ’ alleged attempt to steer investigators away from a flask of anthrax in his lab WDT genetically matched DT mailed powder — anthrax WDT had been shared with other researchers . PRP RB noted his anger over a looming congressional cut in funds for his research on a JJ anthrax NN . However , DT FBI never found hard evidence IN Ivins produced DT anthrax or IN he scrawled threatening letters seemingly meant to resemble those of Islamic terrorists . Or IN he secretly took late - night drives to Princeton , N.J. , to mail them . DT FBI declared Ivins DT killer soon after paying $ 5.8 million to settle a suit filed by another former USAMRIID researcher , Steven Hatfill , whom DT agency mistakenly had targeted earlier in its investigation . Anthrax is CD of DT deadliest and most feared biological weapons . Once inhaled , microscopic anthrax spores germinate into rapidly multiplying , highly toxic bacteria WDT attack human tissue . DT resulting illnesses are lethal within days if untreated . DT letters , mailed just weeks after DT Sept. 11 terrorist attacks , not only went to DT NNP York Post , Leahy and Brokaw , but RB to American NNP Inc. in Boca Raton , Fla. , and to Democratic then - Sen . Tom Daschle of South Dakota . Five NNS died , 17 were sickened and about 31,000 were forced to take powerful antibiotics for weeks . Crews wearing moon suits spent several weeks eradicating DT spores from a Senate office building and a central Postal Service facility in Washington . DT FBI guarded its laboratory ’s finding of 10.8 percent silicon in DT Post letter for NNS . NNP York Democratic Rep. Jerrold Nadler asked FBI Director Robert Mueller how much silicon was in DT Post and Leahy letters at a hearing before DT House Judiciary Committee in September 2008 . DT Justice Department responded seven months later IN silicon made up 1.4 percent of DT Leahy powder ( without disclosing DT 1.8 percent reading ) and IN “ a reliable quantitative measurement was not possible ” for DT Post letter . DT bureau ’s conclusions IN silicon was absorbed naturally drew a gentle challenge in February from a panel of DT National Academy of Sciences , which evaluated DT investigation ’s lab work . While finding no evidence IN silicon had been added to DT mailed anthrax , DT panel noted deep in its report IN DT FBI had provided “ no compelling explanation ” for conflicts in silicon test results between DT Sandia National Laboratories and its own lab . Sandia — which used electron microscopes , unlike DT FBI — reported only a tenth as much silicon in DT NNP York Post letter as DT bureau ’s lab did . Sandia VBD PRP was all embedded in DT spore coatings , where PRP was n’t harmful . DT Armed Forces Institute of Pathology ran a third set of tests and found pockets of heavy silica concentrations , but PRP MD n’t say whether PRP were inside or outside DT spores . Jacobsen , DT Texas chemist , suspects IN DT silica pockets represented excess material WDT went through a chemical reaction and hardened before PRP MD penetrate DT spores . DT National Academy of Sciences panel wrote IN DT varying composition of DT powder might have accounted for DT differing findings . While finding no evidence IN silicon was added , DT panel VBD PRP “ cannot rule out DT intentional addition of a silicon - based substance … in a failed attempt to enhance dispersion ” of DT NNP York Post powder . Tufts University chemistry professor David Walt , who led DT panel ’s analysis of DT silicon issue , VBD in a phone interview IN “ EX was not enough silicon in DT spores WDT MD account for DT total silicon content of DT bulk analysis . ” He VBD PRP was unclear whether DT “ trace ” levels of tin were significant . During DT FBI ’s seven - NN hunt , DT Department of Homeland Security commissioned a team of chemists at DT Lawrence Livermore National Laboratory in California to grow anthrax - IN spores under varying conditions to see how much silicon MD end up naturally in DT final product . PRP found little , if any , silicon in most NNS , far less than was in DT NNP York Post letter , VBD Stephan Velsko , CD of DT two researchers . He called DT tin readings from DT FBI ’s anthrax data “ baffling . ” Peter Weber , Velsko ’s co-researcher , VBD DT academy panel ’s focus on DT conflicting data “ raises a big question , ” and “ PRP ’d be really helpful for closure of this case if DT was resolved . ” He suggested IN further “ micro-analysis ” with a highly sophisticated electron microscope MD “ pop DT question marks really quickly . ” In a chapter in a recently updated book , “ Microbial Forensics , ” Velsko wrote IN DT anthrax “ must have indeed been produced under an unusual set of conditions ” to create such high silicon counts . DT scenario , he cautioned , might not be “ consistent with DT prosecution narrative in this case . ” About 100 tin-catalyzed silicone products are on DT market , and an even wider array was available in 2000 and 2001 , before DT mailings , VBD Richie Ashburn , a vice NN of CD manufacturer , Silicones Inc. , in High Point , N.C . Mike Wilson , a chemist for another silicone products maker , SiVance , in Gainesville , Fla. , VBD IN numerous silicon products MD be used to make spores or other particles NN - repellent . He RB VBD IN DT ratios of silicon to tin found in DT Post and Leahy samples MD be “ about right ” if a tin- catalyzed silicone had been added to DT spores . Jacobsen , a Scottish - born and - educated chemist who once experimented with silicon coatings on dust particles , VBD he got interested in DT spore chemistry after hearing rumors in late 2001 IN a U.S. military facility had made DT killer potions . He called PRP “ outrageous ” IN DT scientific issues have n’t been addressed . “ America , DT most advanced country in DT NN , and DT FBI have every resource available to them , ” he VBD . “ And yet PRP have no compelling explanation for not properly analyzing DT biggest forensic clue in DT most important investigation DT FBI labs had ever gotten in their history . ” As a result of Ivins ’ death and DT unanswered scientific issues , Congress ’ investigative arm , DT NNP Accountability Office , is investigating DT FBI ’s handling of DT anthrax inquiry .

text: Oprah Winfrey recently appeared on DT Ellen show talking about her recent bout with pneumonia , a relatively common , albeit potentially quite dangerous , infection of DT lungs . She described how she had initially thought PRP was just a cold . But her unrelenting symptoms of coughing and ' chest rattling ' led her first to an emergency room , and then to a lung specialist . Thankfully , Oprah is better now . And thankfully , she received excellent care , including close monitoring , antibiotics , and likely inhalers as well . text: Why Do PRP Still Vaccinate ? – 25 Questions From A Former NN Advocate I used to be pro NN . I VBP DT feeling of thinking others were just plain crazy and wrong for not vaccinating their NNS and themselves . ‘ Irresponsible ! ’ I VBD when pointing my finger .
