PRP was only recently , in 2009 IN I started questioning my long held beliefs and began digging in to DT history , efficacy and safety of NNS . I was appalled at what I found and DT recklessness of those NN NN agencies entrusted with our NN and our NNS ’s safety , and angry with myself IN I had put my family ’s NN at risk by blind faith in others when I was ultimately responsible for DT JJ decisions of my family . When I began to put this article together I specifically chose not to include research from or links to websites WDT are considered untrustworthy by most pro-vaxxers , sites such as Natural NNP , Mercola , etc. even though I personally trust those sites and much more than I MD WebMd and for good reason [ a ] . Instead I chose to employ basic logic and RB incorporate independent and .gov scientific studies - mostly peer review , journals , NN from mainstream sources ( IN pro-vaxxers love and totally trust ) and articles WDT link to other .gov scientific studies , as well as NN statistical resources . So , I started writing down questions and then looking for answers . I ’ll admit , some of these questions have already been asked by others , but I just expanded upon PRP to form a helpful list . I hope DT following information helps PRP in your lifelong journey in search of NN , vitality and truth in your own lives and your NNS ’s lives . 1 . Why are newborn babies vaccinated on their first day of life against a NN WDT is primarily transmitted sexually and by needles in drug users ? ( Pregnant women are already tested for STD ’s prior to birth so EX ’s no reason to give PRP to an infant ) . Interesting to note , of DT few NNS WDT still are given to infants and STILL has thimerasol in PRP is Hep B and DipTet ( and NN shot recommended to pregnant women ) . So , DT claim IN PRP has been removed from all NNS is a lie and misdirection . If PRP give PRP to all newborns then ALL DT newborns are getting DT thimerasol ( mercury derivative ) . “ PRP was removed from JJ child NNS in 2002 but remains in some NNS ( e.g. , hepatitis B NN and ) ” Page 21 . 2 . Why are babies given NNS to produce antibodies when PRP do not produce antibodies until after DT age of 3 to 6 months ? PRP VBP DT required antibodies from breastfeeding . 3 . Why does DT NN tell parents to delay breast feeding and VB more NNS when breast feeding babies produce higher levels of antibodies ? http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov… http://naturalsociety.com… 4 . Why are n’t NN manufacturers held responsible when their product injures your child ? Why MD these companies need to be protected from DT effects of such wonderful products ? ( Look into NN Injury Compensation Program .gov and VAERS ) DT Supreme Court ruling exempting DT NN manufacturers from all liability is done under DT explicit understanding IN PRP fall under DT category “ unavoidably unsafe products . ” http://www.supremecourt.gov/opinions/10pdf/09-152.pdf http://www.hrsa.gov/vaccinecompensation/index.html https://vaers.hhs.gov/index 5 . Why do PRP need multi- dose NNS if DT number CD priority of NN manufacturers is your child ’s safety ? 12 . Why is EX no outrage about DT 3.1 billion dollars paid out in NN injury / death claims and yet PRP claim EX is no correlation and PRP are perfectly safe ? http://www.hrsa.gov/vaccinecompensation/statisticsreport.pdf 14 . Why do n’t NNS recognize from history IN DT most widespread and lethal diseases in DT last 200 NNS were reduced due to cleaner drinking NN , improved sanitation , nutrition , less overcrowded areas and better living conditions ? NNS were introduced at points in NN where every single NN was already declining , most almost completely gone . To give NNS credit for JJ reductions in NN is IN giving a band - aid credit for healing a wound WDT was already closing . Dr. Hans Rosling shows exactly how DT NN condition of nearly all NNS of DT NN have improved with wealth , even 200 NNS ago , at DT times where EX no NNS . http://youtu.be/jbkSRLYSojo https://childhealthsafety.wordpress.com/graphs/ ( blog yes , but DT links are amazing and historical data . ) http://www.columbia.edu… By DT late 1950s , even before DT introduction of measles NN , measles - related deaths and case fatality rates in DT NNP NNPS had decreased markedly , presumably as a result of improvement in NN care and nutrition ( Oxford Journal of Infectious Diseases ) . 15 . DT early onset of neurological symptoms was characteristic , with changes of consciousness and convulsions as DT most striking features . text: DT NN is in a race to develop NNS against DT novel NN SARS - CoV - 2 and DT NN PRP causes , NNP - CD . PRP are determined to defeat this NN , which continues to infect millions of NNS and cause death and suffering around DT NN . Given DT urgent crisis , PRP ’s clear IN a NN cannot be developed soon enough to help stem DT pandemic . With DT goal of accomplishing what in normal times MD have been deemed impossible , PRP are engaging collaboratively with regulatory authorities to adapt traditional NN research and development to meet this unprecedented challenge . With our partner BioNTech , a German biotech company , PRP are developing not CD but at least four different NN candidates all at once . PRP began testing DT NN in Germany on April 23 . This week , PRP ’re starting to test our mRNA NN candidates in a U.S. trial — only six weeks after kicking off our NN - CD partnership . Never in my over 25 NNS of developing NNS have I seen a clinical trial launched at this speed . Usually , PRP takes NNS of dedicated research to VB to this point . This record milestone is a testament to DT innovation and collaboration among researchers and colleagues from two very different organizations and cultures , unprecedented access to advice and support from regulatory agencies and other NN agencies , and DT willingness of companies to VB above and beyond what is “ normal ” for them . Our approach is based on DT same technology WDT PRP are developing in another partnership with BioNTech — an mRNA seasonal influenza NN , which has not yet entered clinical studies . If successful , DT NN MD potentially transform DT yearly “ scramble ” of producing a NN NN by increasing DT speed of development and coverage of circulating strains . PRP saw DT opportunity to pursue a collaboration with BioNTech on DT same platform technology for NN - CD , which MD potentially help PRP develop a NN faster than using traditional approaches . Unlike JJ conventional NNS — which usually take months to NNS of research because PRP entail first developing biological cell , NN or bacterial production processes — mRNA NNS are fully synthetic , well characterized and use nearly identical processes for purification . If DT NN platform is proven to work , PRP MD allow PRP to quickly adapt DT platform to other pathogens by exchanging DT small portion of DT SARS - CoV - 2 genetic code for DT of another pathogen . In most conventional viral NNS used today , weakened or killed forms of a NN , or protein components of DT pathogen known as antigens , are administered to a person . DT immune system then recognizes these foreign NN components and unleashes a multipronged defense : special immune cells to kill infected cells and specific antibodies to prevent DT NN from infecting our cells . Then , if a vaccinated person encounters DT NN in DT future , their immune system already knows how to recognize , respond and defeat PRP before PRP become sick . DT mRNA NN technology does not require DT lengthy production of weakened or killed viruses or DT viral antigen . Instead , mRNA , a set of genetic instructions coding for viral antigens , is injected into DT body . Once inside cells , these instructions guide DT cell ’s machinery to produce DT antigens , which can then teach DT immune system how to recognize and fight off a future NN attack . In addition , RNA platforms can RB “ help ” DT immune system mount a stronger response to an antigen than DT induced by DT antigen alone . DT genetic material RNA can be seen by DT immune system as “ viral . ” DT launches a potent arm of DT immune system called innate immunity , which recognizes patterns of common pathogens such as viruses and bacteria and increases DT potency of DT NN . Clinical trials at pandemic speed NN clinical trials are typically run with only CD NN candidate in three separate phases , moving from small safety and immunogenicity studies then scaling up to large efficacy trials WDT usually involve tens of thousands of participants . PRP ’s a deliberative and sequential process WDT can take JJ NNS . Due to DT urgency of DT pandemic , well - established clinical development paths MD take too long for PRP . To shorten DT NN from preclinical to clinical evaluation , PRP are using a unique approach to test at least four different RNA NN candidates in parallel in a smaller number of clinical trial participants . DT ongoing U.S. phase 1 / 2 NN uses a JJ trial design WDT maximizes development speed while ensuring safety by quickly eliminating suboptimal NN candidates for DT benefit of DT “ winner ” in DT race . Instead of using sequential individual trials , PRP plan to adapt DT same phase 1 / 2 trial in real NN and based on continuous data collection to select DT final NN candidate , ensure safety and tolerability and collect functional immunogenicity data to inform DT seamless transition into DT clinical efficacy stage of DT NN . Given this design , PRP are shaving JJ NNS from DT NN development timeline , and assuming success , PRP ’ll potentially be able to roll out a promising NN candidate as early as fall 2020 . Early NN clinical trials are typically done exclusively in younger populations first and then tested in older populations . PRP are RB changing this model : After determining DT safety of each candidate ’s dose level in younger populations , PRP will then immediately test DT dose level in older adults , so IN necessary safety and immunogenicity data for DT population most vulnerable to NNP - CD are available almost at DT same NN to begin DT efficacy stage of DT trial . DT war against DT NN DT other critical aspect of creating a successful NN is ensuring IN PRP can manufacture and distribute hundreds of millions of doses . Again PRP have changed DT typical development approach . Under normal circumstances , DT investment of JJ hundreds of millions to billions of dollars is needed to build NN production capacity . These investments occur only after a NN candidate has proven itself to be safe and immunogenic . Today PRP are compressing a process WDT usually takes NNS to CD WDT MD take only several months , with huge upfront investments of capital and resources before PRP have clinical evidence WDT DT NN candidate MD be successful . To DT end , PRP are working together with BioNTech and Pfizer ’s manufacturing teams to quickly scale up infrastructure and try to eliminate any potential bottlenecks in sourcing DT materials needed to produce hundreds of millions of NN doses in record NN . I ’ve dedicated my scientific career to creating and developing NNS so IN vulnerable populations all over DT globe can be protected from NN and death . I have witnessed firsthand DT tremendous power of NNS to VB lives and help ensure IN NNS have a fighting chance to grow up healthy . NN R&D has always been challenging , but EX is normally sufficient NN to solve scientific problems during development . DT current crisis has turned our NN upside down as NN is DT CD thing PRP do not have . PRP are all energized and inspired to offer potential solutions with an unprecedented sense of urgency to make what seemed impossible only a couple of months ago now possible . DT ongoing experience has fortified my belief in DT power of NN , researchers , NN care professionals and others working closely to address DT pandemic . This NN is our enemy . And PRP need to do everything in our power to win DT war against PRP , not tomorrow , but today . DT above column is sponsor - generated content from Pfizer . text: This is especially true in DT community of Khayelitsha , a NN hotspot WDT RB has DT highest prevalence of tuberculosis ( TB ) in DT Cape Town metropolitan area ; in 2015 , CD - third of its pregnant mothers were HIV positive . “ DT NNS who were struggling before are now doubly at risk , ” says Claire Keene , Khayelitsha JJ coordinator for Doctors Without Borders ( MSF ) , which runs DT field hospital in partnership with local NN authorities . South Africa ’s NNP - CD epidemic has bucked some of DT trends seen in other nations . Locking down early , just three weeks after DT first case was confirmed on March 5 , seems to have spared DT country DT rapid exponential rise seen in Italy and Spain . But DT country has been unable to stop DT spread , as South Korea and NNP Zealand managed to . NN models predict IN NNP - CD will claim between 40,000 and 48,000 South African lives by DT end of this NN . Now , as DT country eases restrictions , which will allow its cash - strapped citizens to earn a living , South Africa is bracing for a wave of infections . NN - care networks designed to fight DT NN ’s most devastating co-epidemic — HIV and TB — are being subsumed into DT NN - CD response . DT NN has deployed more than 28,000 community NN workers to screen for DT NN in poor areas , and teams once established to trace DT contacts of TB patients have pivoted to handling this NN ’s pandemic . Yet JJ fear IN shifting these resources MD undo some of DT hard - won progress made against HIV and TB . National data show IN during DT lockdown , DT number of TB tests conducted was cut in half , as NNS MD n’t visit clinics , or did n’t VB to for fear PRP might catch DT NN . According to JJ NN workers , DT lockdown saw a drop in patients accessing their TB and HIV therapies , and a large nationwide survey conducted by DT country ’s Human Sciences Research Council found IN 13 percent of patients have struggled to access regular medication during DT NN - CD lockdown . “ PRP ’s VBG to take PRP NNS to recover what PRP ’ve lost in DT past few months , ” says Gavin Churchyard , CEO of DT Aurum Institute , a Johannesburg - based research and NN nonprofit . DT Khayelitsha Field Hospital is CD of several temporary facilities established to house NNP - CD patients in Cape Town , which — with two - thirds of DT country ’s more than 50,000 NN NNS — is DT current epicentre of South Africa ’s epidemic . text: DT UK and NNP have issued a joint warning cyber - spies are targeting DT NN sector . Hackers linked to foreign NNS have been hunting for information , including NNP - CD data and NN research , PRP say . UK sources say PRP have seen extensive activity but do not believe EX has been any data theft so far . Those behind DT activity are not named in DT alert but are thought to include NNP , Russia and Iran . DT three NNS have all seen major outbreaks of DT NN but have denied previous claims of involvement in such activity . DT joint advisory says DT UK and NNP are currently investigating a number of incidents in which other NNS are targeting pharmaceutical companies , JJ - research organisations , and universities , looking for intelligence and sensitive data , including research on DT NN . Understanding how other NNS are dealing with DT NNP - CD crisis and progress in research has become a high priority for intelligence agencies around DT NN . In a crisis , every NN will VB to use its intelligence capability to better inform itself . And in a locked - down NN , cyber - espionage is more practical than traditional human espionage , making PRP another field where an existing trend towards online working MD be accelerated . DT UK's National Cyber Security Centre ( NCSC ) has been working with these organisations since DT start of DT crisis , to offer advice and protection . And cyber - criminals MD target healthcare providers , knowing PRP MD be even more willing than usual to pay a ransom for DT return of their data . text: American drug maker Moderna VBD Monday IN its experimental NN - CD NN produced antibodies in a small group of healthy NNS in an early trial . DT company VBD eight NNS who received two small amounts of its NN developed antibodies similar to those developed by NNS who have recovered from DT NN . DT U.S. National Institute of Allergy and Infectious Diseases led DT experiment , RB called a trial . PRP involved 45 volunteers who received CD or two shots of differing amounts of DT NN . Tal Zaks is DT chief JJ officer at Moderna . Based on early results of DT trial , he VBD DT NN “ has DT potential to prevent NN - CD NN … . ” He RB VBD DT company now can better choose DT NN amount needed for further experiments . DT testing involved three different amounts . Zaks VBD DT two smaller amounts of NN seem safe and DT larger amount caused some short - term side effects . Three NN subjects developed “ NN - IN ” conditions following a second shot of DT large dose . Moderna VBD PRP plans to drop DT amount for DT next part of DT trial . Amesh Adalja is an infectious NN expert at DT Johns Hopkins Center for NNP Security who was not involved in DT NN . He told Reuters IN DT findings are meaningful , but noted IN PRP come from only eight NNS . “ PRP was designed for safety . Not for efficacy , ” he VBD . Moderna has been permitted to start a second part of human testing WDT will involve several hundreds of NNS . In April , DT U.S. NN gave DT company $ 483 million for NN development . Last week , U.S. officials gave DT NN special recognition to help speed DT process for approval . EX are currently no approved treatments or NNS for NN - CD . Almost 4.8 million NNS are confirmed to have had DT NN . PRP is known to have killed about 320,000 . However , experts VBP DT numbers MD be underreported . DT NNP NNP Organization has listed more than 100 efforts to develop effective treatments and NNS for DT NN . DT list includes clinical trials in NNP , at DT University of Oxford , and with American drug makers Pfizer , Inovio and Moderna . Experts predict a safe and effective NN MD take 12 to 18 months to develop . DT results of Moderna ’s early trial have not been published . text: A NNP NN being developed by Oxford University MD not stop NNS becoming infected with DT NN , experts warn . DT latest animal trials of DT " front runner " NN carried out using six monkeys revealed all went on to catch DT killer infection . ⚠️ Read our NN live blog for DT latest NN & updates DT revelations come as Drug giant AstraZeneca VBD PRP will make 30 million doses of DT NN by September if PRP works and DT UK will be DT first to VB them . Oxford finished its first phase of human trials this week - with everyone planned having received their NN doses on schedule . However , following DT publication of detailed trial results PRP was revealed DT NN was unable to prevent monkeys from catching NNP - CD . On DT upside , none of DT vaccinated animals displayed pneumonia which suggests IN , while not stopping DT NN , PRP MD be partially protective . DT setback has led some to question DT effectiveness of DT jab and in particular whether PRP will be able to prevent DT spread of DT NN . Dr William Haseltine , a former Harvard NNP School professor , VBD : " All of DT vaccinated monkeys treated with DT Oxford NN became infected when challenged , as judged by recovery of NN genomic RNA from nasal secretions . " He wrote in an article on Forbes : " EX was no difference in DT amount of viral RNA detected from this site in DT vaccinated monkeys as compared to DT unvaccinated animals . Which is to say , all vaccinated animals were infected . " Jonathan Ball , professor of molecular virology at DT University of Nottingham , VBD DT data suggests DT jab MD not be able to prevent DT spread of DT NN , reports DT Telegraph . " DT viral loads in DT noses of vaccinated and unvaccinated animals were identical is very significant . If DT same happened in humans , NN MD not stop spread , " he VBD . " I genuinely believe IN this finding should warrant an urgent re-appraisal of DT ongoing human trials of DT ChAdOx1 NN . " DT trials on DT rhesus macaque monkeys were carried out at DT National Institute of NNP 's Rocky Mountain Laboratory in DT NNP . Six monkeys were infected with single doses of DT NN and then exposed to DT NN . A control group of three non-vaccinated monkeys were RB infected . Both groups were then monitored for seven days for signs of developing NNP - CD . However , none of DT vaccinated monkeys displayed pneumonia which suggests PRP MD be in some way protective .

text: Getting ahead of DT NN Viruses are stealthy . PRP disguise themselves as PRP infect a host and penetrate IN host ’s cells , which gives them a head start over DT body ’s immune response . Once a cell recognizes certain telltale signs of a pathogen , PRP throws out an alarm signal to DT immune system . But because DT NN has DT head start , PRP still has NN to replicate itself and infect a JJ host before DT immune system can catch up . DT ’s why someone ’s first experience with an infectious NN can be so nasty . DT immune system is not so easily tricked a second NN : When PRP ’s beaten an invader once , PRP keeps a specialized weapons cache dedicated to DT particular pathogen , ready to mount a high - speed reaction if PRP ’s ever detected again . So , DT second NN DT NN shows up in your body , DT NN wo n’t have DT handy head start . To have herd immunity , each infected person must , on average , infect less than CD person ( though clearly , PRP ’s not possible to infect half a person ; if some infected NNS pass on DT infection and others do n’t , DT average transmission rate will be less than CD . ) Once DT transmission rate drops below CD , a community has herd immunity . DT wo n’t stop each and every case , but PRP will prevent DT NN from spreading indefinitely . JJ of our lessons on herd immunity come from DT measles , because PRP 's so contagious . DT more infectious a NN is , DT more NNS who need to be immune to reach herd immunity . CD person with measles , for instance , MD infect up to 18 other NNS in a susceptible population . To VB DT transmission rate all DT way down to less than CD , almost everyone in DT population needs to act as a buffer between an infected person and a JJ potential host . DT ’s why measles needs such a high rate of herd immunity — around 95 percent . DT do ’s and don’ts of making a herd NNS create a weapons cache for a NN without DT body ever having to fight off DT NN itself , which is why herd immunity is something WDT ’s generally pursued through NN rather than infection . For example , about 30 percent of measles NNS have complications such as seizures , pneumonia , and encephalitis , resulting in about two deaths for every thousand NNS in DT U.S. Exposing a whole population to measles MD be a dangerous way to cultivate herd immunity among DT survivors . “ DT problem with NN is IN no - PRP has had PRP before , regardless of age , ” says Gostic of DT University of Chicago . PRP ’s almost as if chicken pox had just emerged for DT first NN , leaving adults more susceptible to DT more severe NNS WDT come with age , she explains . Herd immunity RB is n’t something WDT can work for any NN . PRP does n’t matter how JJ NNS are vaccinated against tetanus , for example : If someone who is n’t vaccinated steps on a rusty nail , PRP can still VB infected , because tetanus lives in reservoirs outside of DT human body . An infection must be transmitted between NNS for herd immunity to have a protective effect . Immunity RB does n’t always last RB long . HIV mutates so quickly IN PRP can actually evolve within a single person , says Jessie Abbate , an infectious NN expert at DT Research Institute for Development in France . Swiftly mutating NN is RB a moving target for immunity and NNS , which is why each NN season ’s NN needs to anticipate DT strain WDT will circulate widely , she explains . What does this mean for NN ? Four other coronaviruses already circulate among humans , says Gaunt , and PRP all cause DT common cold , since PRP do n’t stay immune to those viruses for very long . If DT novel NN is similar , DT means IN NNS MD need to be repeatedly vaccinated or infected for herd immunity to be sustained . Some reports describe reinfections of DT novel NN in NNS who tested positive again after PRP had already recovered . PRP ’s not clear , though , IN these are actually NNS of reinfection — PRP ’s more likely IN PRP can be explained by NNS continuing to shed DT NN for a long NN , and IN DT level of NN shedding fluctuates over NN . Rapid reinfection is , for now , “ an outside possibility , ” Abbate agrees . If NNS were able to VB sick again really quickly , PRP MD n’t see DT rapid decline in case numbers WDT is happening in certain parts of DT NN . And PRP MD VB against almost every other NN WDT PRP ’ve known about , she says .

text: Vaccinations give protection against specific diseases , but DT level of protection in a population depends on DT proportion of NNS vaccinated . Pathogens are microbes WDT cause diseases . NNS contain a dead or altered form of DT NN - causing pathogen , which is introduced into DT body . These dead or altered pathogens carry a specific antigen . This causes DT immune system , specifically DT white blood cells , to produce complementary antibodies , which target and attach to DT antigen . DT body has two kinds of white blood cells which work together to destroy DT pathogens . • None DT first kind of white blood cell makes antibodies which cause DT pathogens to clump together . • None DT second type of white blood cell second destroys DT pathogen by engulfing and digesting PRP . This process is RB called DT white blood cells which make antibodies remain in DT body afterwards . These are called memory cells . PRP enable a more rapid and larger build - up of antibodies following a second exposure to DT pathogen . During DT primary infection DT antibodies slowly increase , peak at around ten days and then gradually decrease . A second exposure to DT same pathogen causes DT white blood cells to respond quickly in order to produce lots of DT relevant antibodies , which prevents infection .

text: On Tuesday , NNP 5 , 2020 , California Governor Gavin Newsom issued an executive order announcing IN this Friday DT NN will move to Stage Two of his 4 - stage NN - CD “ framework , ” wherein reopening of “ lower - risk businesses ” and spaces will be allowed to reopen , to be followed by DT reopening of higher - risk businesses and spaces in Stage Three . text: What Is DT Immune System ? DT immune system is DT body 's defense against infections . DT immune ( ih - MYOON ) system attacks germs and helps keep PRP healthy . What Are DT Parts of DT Immune System ? JJ cells and organs work together to protect DT body . White blood cells , RB called leukocytes ( LOO - kuh - sytes ) , play an important role in DT immune system . Some types of white blood cells , called phagocytes ( FAH - guh - sytes ) , chew up invading organisms . Others , called lymphocytes ( LIM - fuh - sytes ) , help DT body remember DT invaders and destroy them . CD type of phagocyte is DT neutrophil ( NOO - truh - fil ) , which fights bacteria . When someone might have bacterial infection , doctors can order a blood test to see if PRP caused DT body to have lots of neutrophils . Other types of phagocytes do their own jobs to make sure IN DT body responds to invaders . DT two kinds of lymphocytes are B lymphocytes and T lymphocytes . Lymphocytes start out in DT bone marrow and either stay RB and mature into B cells , or VBP to DT thymus gland to mature into T cells . B lymphocytes are IN DT body 's military intelligence system — PRP find their targets and send defenses to lock onto them . T cells are IN DT soldiers — PRP destroy DT invaders WDT DT intelligence system finds . How Does DT Immune System Work ? When DT body senses foreign substances ( called antigens ) , DT immune system works to recognize DT antigens and VB rid of them . B lymphocytes are triggered to make antibodies ( RB called immunoglobulins ) . These proteins lock onto specific antigens . After PRP 're made , antibodies usually stay in our bodies in case PRP have to fight DT same germ again . DT 's why someone who gets sick with a NN , IN chickenpox , usually wo n't VB sick from PRP again . This is RB how immunizations ( NNS ) prevent some diseases . An immunization introduces DT body to an antigen in a way WDT does n't make someone sick . But PRP does let DT body make antibodies WDT will protect DT person from future attack by DT germ . Although antibodies can recognize an antigen and lock onto PRP , PRP can't destroy PRP without help . DT 's DT job of DT T cells . PRP destroy antigens tagged by antibodies or cells WDT are infected or somehow changed . ( Some T cells are actually called " killer cells . " ) T cells RB help signal other cells ( IN phagocytes ) to do their jobs . • neutralize toxins ( poisonous or damaging substances ) produced by different organisms • activate a group of proteins called complement WDT are part of DT immune system . Complement helps kill bacteria , viruses , or infected cells . These specialized cells and parts of DT immune system offer DT body protection against NN . This protection is called immunity . Humans have three types of immunity — innate , adaptive , and passive : • Innate immunity : Everyone is born with innate ( or natural ) immunity , a type of general protection . For example , DT skin acts as a barrier to block germs from entering DT body . And DT immune system recognizes when certain invaders are foreign and MD be dangerous . • Adaptive immunity : Adaptive ( or active ) immunity develops throughout our lives . PRP develop adaptive immunity when PRP 're exposed to diseases or when PRP 're immunized against them with NNS . • Passive immunity : Passive immunity is " borrowed " from another source and PRP lasts for a short NN . For example , antibodies in a mother 's breast milk give a baby temporary immunity to diseases DT mother has been exposed to . DT immune system takes a while to develop and needs help from NNS . By getting all your child 's recommended NNS on NN , PRP can help keep your child as healthy as possible .

text: EX are three known serotypes ( closely related though distinguishable forms ) of wild poliovirus : PV1 , PV2 , and PV3 . DT most - widespread serotype is PV1 . PV2 likely has been eradicated ; DT last PV2 case was reported in 1999 in Uttar Pradesh , India . DT third serotype , PV3 , is close to eradication . Polio , in full poliomyelitis , RB called infantile paralysis , acute viral infectious NN of DT nervous system WDT usually begins with general symptoms such as fever , headache , nausea , fatigue , and muscle pains and spasms and is sometimes followed by a more - serious and permanent paralysis of muscles in CD or more limbs , DT throat , or DT chest . Between 5 and 10 percent of infected persons display only DT general symptoms outlined above , and more than 90 percent show no signs of illness at all . Since DT 1960s , thanks to widespread use of polio NNS , polio has been eliminated from most of DT NN . PRP is now endemic in only three NNS : Afghanistan , Pakistan , and Nigeria . Nigeria , however , was on DT brink of being polio - free in 2015 . Worldwide , since 1988 DT number of reported polio NNS has dropped by more than 99 percent . DT course of DT NN Poliomyelitis means “ gray marrow inflammation , ” referring to DT propensity of DT poliovirus to attack certain cells in DT spinal cord and brainstem . After DT poliovirus is swallowed , PRP multiplies in lymph nodes of DT intestinal tract and spreads through DT body via DT bloodstream . In some NNS DT NN gets no farther , causing only a vague flulike illness to develop . DT most - common early symptoms of polio are mild headache , fever , sore throat , nausea , vomiting , diarrhea , restlessness , and drowsiness . Fever peaks in two to three days and then rapidly subsides , and patients recover within three to four days without DT development of paralysis . In some NNS , however , DT NN begins an assault on DT central nervous system , inflaming and destroying motor cells of DT spinal cord and brainstem . In those NNS patients become irritable and develop pain in DT back and limbs , muscle tenderness , and stiff neck . Paralysis does not always involve DT limbs , however . DT abdominal muscles or DT muscles of DT back MD be paralyzed , affecting posture . DT neck muscles MD become weak , so IN DT head can not be raised . Paralysis of DT face muscles MD cause twisting of DT mouth or drooping eyelids . In bulbar polio DT NN attacks DT brainstem , and DT nerve centres WDT control swallowing and talking are damaged . Secretions collect in DT throat and MD lead to suffocation by blocking DT airway . Some 5 to 10 percent of persons afflicted with paralytic polio die , usually of respiratory complications . EX seem to be individual differences in DT degree of natural susceptibility to DT NN . text: As DT measles outbreak spreads across DT country , tens of thousands of NNS remain in a paperwork limbo — unsure whether PRP are fully vaccinated , a big unknown in assessing DT risk at JJ schools . text: When a NN NN becomes available in DT NNP NNPS , DT federal NN and NNS will face a crucial choice : Should all or most residents be required to VB DT NN ? Or should PRP be required only for school NNS , with a JJ exception allowed , and for groups IN front - line NN - care workers ? Some officials might VB few or no requirements at all because PRP VBP enough NNS will VB DT NN voluntarily or have immunity from an infection to halt DT spread of DT NN . But in NNS IN Oklahoma , efforts to require and promote DT NN MD run into strong headwinds . Anti-vaccine activists are vocal and influential in DT NN , spurred on by a national movement . PRP ’s CD reason Oklahoma is CD of only 15 NNS , including Texas and Arkansas , WDT allow parents to cite personal reasons to exempt their NNS from immunizations required by schools and day - care centers . PRP fill out and turn in a form . All NNS grant exemptions for JJ reasons , and 45 NNS plus Washington , D.C. , allow exemptions for religious objections . NN skeptics have successfully fought off efforts in DT Legislature and NN NN to tighten exemptions . Just this NN , a NN advisory committee proposed requiring parents who opt out of vaccinations for their NNS for religious or personal reasons to first attend a NN education session at their local NN department . PRP RB proposed IN exemptions expire after sixth grade unless parents renew them . Both failed to advance . A key reason driving proposals IN these is Oklahoma ’s rising numbers and rates of exemptions . In 2018 - CD , DT overall exemption rate for all kindergarteners was 2.6 % , up from 2.2 % in 2017 - 18 and 1.9 % in 2016 - 17 , according to DT Oklahoma NNP Department of NNP . In 2009 - 10 , DT exemption rate was 1.1 % . DT number of approved NN exemptions doubled from 2,417 in 2014 to 5,082 in 2019 . Liza Greve , executive director of DT Oklahomans for NNP and Parental Rights Foundation , a nonprofit WDT promotes what is often called NN choice or NN freedom , VBD she believes EX ’s a good chance Oklahoma will add a NN - CD NN to its NN schedule for NNS , and NN - care workers will be required to take PRP . But her organization will advocate for an individual ’s right to choose . “ Whatever shakes out , Oklahomans need to have a choice in NN and treatment , ” she VBD , citing concerns IN rapid development of a NN - CD NN will heighten risks of adverse reactions . Dr. Ervin Yen , an Oklahoma City anesthesiologist who advocated for stronger immunization policies during his four NNS in DT Oklahoma Senate , VBD he thinks DT federal NN should require DT NN for all citizens because of how deadly and contagious DT NN is . But he believes DT decision will be left up to DT NNS . “ I VBP a significant number of NNS will mandate PRP , and I VBP Oklahoma will have to consider PRP , ” Yen VBD . Oklahoma requires NNS entering school to be vaccinated for nine diseases , including measles , chickenpox and polio . Parents can apply for exemptions on JJ , religious or personal grounds . JJ exemptions represent DT smallest share of school exemptions in DT NN . House Majority Floor Leader Jon Echols , R - Oklahoma City , anticipates DT NN NN department MD update DT NN schedule for NNS to include NN - CD once a safe and effective NN is available and DT Legislature MD approve PRP as long as parents MD apply for DT same exemptions . “ I VBP PRP MD be widely used , ” Echols VBD . “ I MD take PRP . ” But a general requirement to be vaccinated MD not fly , Echols VBD . “ EX ’s no chance of DT Oklahoma Legislature passing a NNP ’s Republic of NNP mandate , ” he VBD . Nationwide nearly half DT NNPS require young adults be vaccinated against meningococcal NN before heading to college , and 15 NNS RB require DT hepatitis B NN . But unlike policies for NNS , few requirements exist for adult immunizations in DT U.S. and little JJ NN infrastructure supports mass NN of adults , according to DT National Conference of NNP Legislatures . Doctors and NNS say every NN has an adverse reaction rate . For DT measles NN , PRP is CD per 1 million NNS vaccinated , according to DT NNP NNP Organization . “ But PRP save 40 to 50 NNS ( per million ) from dying , ” Yen VBD . DT benefits of DT eventual NN - CD NN will “ hugely outweigh DT risks , ” he VBD . “ NN is way deadlier than measles . ” Even if DT death rate turns out to be only 1 % , a NN given to 1 million NNS MD save 10,000 lives , Yen VBD . NNS across DT globe are fast - tracking development of a NN - CD NN , with 118 candidate NNS in DT works , DT NNP NNP Organization reports . Of those , eight are in clinical or human trials and 110 are not yet being tested on humans . PRP ’s not clear when a safe and effective NN MD be developed and available for distribution . Predictions have ranged from 12 or 18 months to at least a few NNS out , and residents in developed NNS , or ones WDT originate a successful NN , MD gain NN immunity first , while more impoverished NNS wait . DT U.S. Food and Drug Administration is streamlining its processes for NN NNS and therapeutic treatments . “ DT FDA is VBG to rush PRP through , ” VBD William Hildebrand , a research professor at DT University of Oklahoma College of Medicine who is among DT JJ NNS worldwide working to create a NN . “ DT NN is demanding PRP . ” Hildebrand ’s team is looking at using DT body ’s protective T - cells to find and kill NN - infected cells , rather than developing a NN WDT helps DT body produce antibodies . PRP ’s a long shot , he VBD . “ Everybody ’s odds are a little long ( individually ) , but collectively our odds are pretty good , ” Hildebrand VBD . “ DT odds are pretty good DT scientific community is VBG to come up with something WDT will stop this NN . ” For a NN to stop DT spread of an infectious NN , a sufficiently high number of NNS must be immune to DT NN . DT provides indirect protection , or herd immunity , to those who are n’t vaccinated or who have compromised immune systems and are at greater risk of catching an infection , including babies , older adults or NNS with certain JJ conditions . Herd immunity for each NN is based on how JJ additional NNS each infected person will cause during their infectious period . CD person with measles , for example , will infect 12 to 18 others , so , based on a complex calculation , 90 % of DT population needs to be vaccinated to ensure DT NN does not spread . In DT case of NNP - CD , DT NN shows an infected person will pass PRP along to about three others , meaning about 70 % of DT population will need to be vaccinated to reach herd immunity , VBD Gary Raskob , dean of DT OU College of NNP NNP . An analysis by DT Journal of Infection in mid-March estimated IN DT percentage of a population WDT must be immune via NN or natural immunity to halt DT spread of NN - CD varies by country . In Kuwait , PRP ’s less than 6 % ; in Japan , 33 % , and in Spain , 81 % . DT percentages are based on R - naught values , DT epidemiological number for DT reproduction rate of DT NN . “ DT NN will be crucial , ” Raskob VBD . “ PRP have to VB DT NN to understand DT importance of NN . ” JJ acceptance likely will be better than for DT measles NN , he VBD . “ Since measles was eradicated , JJ NNS have never seen a case of measles , even most physicians practicing today , ” Raskob VBD . Not so with NNP - CD . NNS are reminded daily of DT severe and fatal effects of DT NN and JJ NNS have personal experience with PRP . NNS are likely to be waiting in line as production scales up once DT FDA approves a NN , he VBD . If EX ’s not enough NN to meet DT initial demand , PRP MD likely VB first to NN - care workers and then DT most vulnerable population , Raskob VBD . Hospitals and long - term care facilities will have DT ability to require IN employees be vaccinated over any personal objections , he VBD . Oklahoma law currently requires hospital employees to provide documentation of immunity to measles , mumps , rubella and varicella . Several hospitals have adopted DT Oklahoma Hospital Association policy WDT supports mandatory employee influenza vaccinations as a condition of employment in hospitals . ‘ PRP Have to Proceed With Caution ’ Amid DT quest for a NN NN , suspicion gathers among networks and groups WDT object to JJ proven NNS and NN requirements . A NN published this week in DT NN journal Nature found nearly 100 million NNS expressing views on NN on Facebook and concluded DT explosive growth in anti-vaccination views MD increase opposition to a future NN NN and “ amplify outbreaks , as happened for measles in 2019 . ” DT Oklahomans for NNP and Parental Rights political action committee , which contributes to NN legislative campaigns , says NNS have been linked to chronic childhood conditions , including NN , asthma , diabetes and obesity . Claims IN these are made by other anti-vaccination groups despite research to DT contrary showing NNS are generally safe . Greve , who leads DT PAC as well as DT nonprofit advocacy group , VBD supporters are following DT NN - CD NN NN and keeping an eye on safety and efficacy studies . “ Sometimes in an emergency situation , corners are cut when PRP should n’t be , ” Greve VBD . “ DT evolving NN is moving very quickly . When PRP comes to a NN , PRP have to proceed with caution . ” CD concern is DT risk of immune enhancement , in which a NN actually weakens a person ’s response to DT NN so DT person becomes sicker , Greve VBD . An example occurred when an investigational NN against respiratory syncytial NN ( RSV ) backfired in DT 1960s . In CD NN , DT hospitalization rate of infants who were vaccinated approached 80 % compared to 5 % for those not vaccinated , and two toddlers died , according to DT National Institutes of NNP ’s National Library of Medicine . Greve ’s advocacy group supported a dozen NN - related bills filed this legislative session , including efforts to protect personal exemptions and establish a stronger tracking system for reporting any injuries or deaths from vaccinations . Hildebrand , of DT OU College of Medicine , VBD multiple studies are underway to provide DT answers NNS need to develop an effective NN - CD NN in record NN . He VBD DT rush to discover a NN means DT result MD carry a greater risk of serious reaction than normal . “ This NN might be more relaxed or liberal in its acceptable adverse reaction rate , ” he VBD . When DT NN is available , he VBD , NNS will have to ask themselves what ’s riskier , DT odds of an adverse reaction or DT danger of getting DT NN . text: Crises create DT opportunity for leaders to provide direction , meaning , and support when followers need PRP DT most . CD way for leaders to earn their followers ’ trust in a crisis is through self sacrifice–either through their own giving or DT of DT organization . DT author ’s research shows IN when leaders sacrifice in this way , PRP makes employees feel more positively toward them and more committed to their organizations . But to reap DT benefits , leaders must give with purpose , and be transparent about why and how much PRP are giving . PRP might VB IN crises tend to bring out DT worst in NNS , but DT is n’t reflected in how PRP view our leaders , at least . In fact , crises cause PRP to view leaders as more charismatic and effective than PRP normally do . This is probably why U.S. presidents are almost universally re-elected in times of war . And research has shown IN leaders who self - sacrifice tend to be seen as DT most effective . Following 9/11 , I was so intrigued by crisis leadership IN I did a NN on DT topic . In my research I found IN leader self - sacrifice , such as cutting PRP ’s own salary or giving up PRP ’s own benefits , caused employees to feel more positively toward their leaders and more committed to their organizations during crises . This finding has been corroborated by additional research in DT lab and field WDT suggests IN when leaders demonstrate self - sacrificial behavior , PRP makes PRP see them as having higher moral values and as being a better role model — leading to better organizational outcomes . More recently , PRP have seen CEOs step up to support their employees during this pandemic by pledging not to lay off employees — even those who can not VB into work . For example , even though all of Patagonia ’s stores are closed , CEO Yvon Chouinard has announced IN DT company will continue to pay all employees , leading some to conclude IN DT values - driven organization will survive DT pandemic while other organizations will fail . Other CEOs who have committed to no layoffs include Hearst CEO Steven Swartz , LinkedIn CEO Jeff Weiner , Twitter and Square CEO Jack Dorsey , Morgan Stanley CEO James Gorman , Citigroup CEO Mike Corbat , Bank of America CEO Brian Moynihan , Visa CEO Alfred F. Kelly Jr. , and FedEx CEO Frederick Smith , Cisco CEO Chuck Robbins . So , what can leaders do in this NN to support their employees and how can PRP be sure IN their giving hits DT mark ? Effective measures fall into three categories : taking some of DT same hits as your staff ; giving with a larger purpose in mind ; and being aggressively transparent even when PRP ’s hard . Self - sacrifice is not just about DT company doing what ’s right . If PRP are VBG to ask your employees to sacrifice , PRP need to sacrifice as well . If PRP expect your team to behave safely , PRP as a leader should behave safely . If PRP expect your team to VB down in DT trenches , PRP should be down RB with them . No NN likes DT leader who throws their team on DT front line while PRP sit in their office . Marriott International CEO Arne Sorenson , forfeited his salary for DT NN and is donating hotel rooms to front - line workers to help fight NNP - CD . Marriot RB asked its executives to sacrifice half of their salaries and has been furloughed JJ other employees . As a result , Marriot is still viewed – at least in DT NN — as an employer of choice despite its need to furlough employees . Other companies whose top leaders have cut their salaries include NBCUniversal , Uber , Delta , and Yelp . In my own field of academia , highly paid deans , coaches , and administrators at top universities IN Harvard are taking pay cuts to help make up for DT impending deficits WDT higher education is facing . Even NN leaders , IN Jacinda Arden , NNP Zealand ’s prime minister , are taking pay cuts . Not all of PRP are CEOs who can make DT decision to keep NNS ’s paychecks coming or give up our salary for a NN . But EX are still ways to sacrifice for our employees . Small gestures IN ordering lunch to be sent remotely to your employees for a team zoom meeting can VB a long way at maintaining DT morale of DT team . If your organization has a leave donation program , PRP can donate some of your NN off to your team members who need PRP . When PRP ’re a leader , sacrificing along with your employees MD mean IN PRP will be more committed to staying with DT company during and after DT crisis . And , considering DT cost of employee turnover , this MD mean DT difference between recovering from DT NNP - CD crisis — or not . JJ organizations are offering free services IN free virtual tours or free learning tools for kids . Likewise , PRP have seen organizations step up to help provide resources needed to combat DT effects of DT pandemic . Tesla , Toyota , Ford and GM have shut down factories to make ventilators while Medtronic openly shared DT software and specifications for their portable ventilators , allowing anyone to use them for free to help create ventilators in response to NNP - CD . But , whatever DT give , PRP is important to tie DT sacrifice to vision , mission , and DT values of your organization so IN NNS can understand why PRP are doing PRP . When Salesforce co-CEO Marc Benioff pledged not to do any layoffs for DT next three months , he tied PRP to DT cultural value of Ohana ( family ) and giving , asking IN employees RB continue to support DT NNS PRP relied on before DT crisis , such as house cleaners or dog walkers . Leaders should be clear about how their actions are consistent with DT organization ’s values . If DT purpose is n’t clear , EX can be backlash . Research shows IN PRP are a skeptical bunch and when leaders self - sacrifice , PRP try to infer why DT leader might be doing PRP or focus on what PRP are not doing ( IN whether or not DT leaders are keeping their bonuses ) . DT more cynical among PRP might infer IN Johnson & Johnson ’s decision to invest a billion dollars to develop a NNP - CD NN was driven by profit . But , when CEO Alex Gorsky tied DT act to their responsibility to improve DT NN of NNS and PRP announced IN PRP MD provide DT NN on a not - for - profit basis , DT doubt turns to admiration . In addition to explaining why PRP are making a sacrifice , leaders should be transparent about what DT sacrifice amounts to . If a leader publicly donates 10 % of her salary to a nonprofit , she should explain what DT nonprofit is and what exactly is happening to DT money . For example , Jack Dorsey is donating $ 1 billion of his Square equity ( 28 % of his wealth ) to fund NNP - CD relief . Not only is he giving away DT money ; he RB shared a Google Doc showing how DT funds MD be spent . Voluntary transparency becomes key in this situation . Disney ’s CEO Bob Chapek is forgoing 50 % of his salary and other benefits as a result of NNP - CD . But this decision came after pressure from DT union for some information from leadership over concerns about DT closing of Disney parks . Even when PRP are not in a crisis , 84 % of employees VBP organizations are not doing enough to create transparency . But this comes at a cost to DT organization . CD NN showed IN organizations WDT were more transparent had higher productivity , innovation , and retention than those WDT were more opaque . In contrast , increasing transparency can in fact build trust . Crises create DT opportunity for leaders to provide direction , meaning , and support when followers need PRP DT most . Learning IN Columbia Sportswear CEO Tim Boyle reduced his salary to $ 10,000 while continuing to pay its employees or IN Yum Brands CEO , David Gibbs , gave up his salary and gave $ 1,000 bonuses to DT managers of his restaurants does more than lift DT spirits of their employees . These various strains of research indicate IN this type of sacrifice can improve morale and trust for DT rest of PRP , and ease DT pain DT rest of PRP are feeling in this NN .

text: San Francisco ( CNN ) Drugmakers are racing to develop a NN for DT NNP - CD NN -- a complex feat in itself -- but what might be even trickier is getting PRP to DT NN . JJ glass is n't made from your typical beach sand , and DT vials are n't your everyday soda - lime glass found in JJ household items . text: 8 June 2020 – To fight DT NN and to support DT recovery , EU grants €314 million to innovative companies DT European Commission has announced IN PRP has awarded 36 companies with nearly € 166 million , via DT European Innovation Council Accelerator Pilot , will work on pioneering projects : bio-decontamination wipes , developing low - cost mass casualty ventilation monitoring systems , and an antibody platform to treat severe NNS of infection . Over € 148 million will be granted to another 36 companies set to contribute to DT recovery plan for Europe , for example by DT development of stronger and taller wind turbine towers made from wood modules . 28 NNP 2020 - NN JJ Response : “ JJ Goal : Unite For Our Future ” kick - off with support from NNP Citizen DT NNP NNP Response was kick - started on 4 NNP and has so far raised € 9,8 billion for universal access to affordable NN NN , treatments and testing . On DT launch of DT next phase , NNP von der Leyen VBD : “ DT NN needs to unit and defeat DT NN once and for all . DT good NN is IN this is already happening . PRP are launch a JJ campaign “ JJ Goal : Unite For Our Future ” and this idea comes from NNP Citizen . During DT next month , NNS will make their voices heard and contribute to our common fight against DT NN . On 27 June , I will host a final pledging summit where businesses , foundations and citizens can join forces with JJ donors . ” 27 NNP 2020 - Europe ’s moment : major € 2,4 trillion Recovery Plan for Europe unveiled to repair and prepare for DT next generation To kick - start DT European recovery , protect lives , livelihoods and jobs , DT European Commission is proposing a major € 2,4 trillion recovery plan which is based on using DT full potential of a powerful , modern and revamped EU budget to deliver a more sustainable , digital , inclusive and fair Europe . Commission NNP Ursula von der Leyen VBD : “ Europe ’s next generation will reap DT benefits of tomorrow . These investments will not only preserve DT outstanding achievements of DT last 70 NNS , but will RB ensure IN our Union is NN natural , digital , social and a strong JJ player in DT future . This is about all of PRP . PRP is way bigger than any of PRP . This is Europe 's moment . ” 12 NNP 2020 - € 117 million granted for NN treatments and diagnostics DT Commission selected 8 large - scale research projects aimed at developing treatments and diagnostics for DT NN , in a fast - track call for proposals launched in March by DT Innovative Medicines Initiative ( IMI ) , a JJ - private partnership . DT Commission increased DT Horizon 2020 initially - allocated funding of € 45 m to € 72 million , while € 45 million will be provided by DT pharmaceutical industry , Innovative Medicines Initiative associated partners and other organisations , bringing DT total investment to € 117 million . DT selected projects are part of DT common European response to DT NN outbreak WDT DT Commission is coordinating since DT beginning of DT crisis . By allocating funding from Horizon 2020 and partnering with DT pharmaceutical industry , DT Commission is able to fund a larger number of high - quality proposals and speed up DT development of NN diagnostics and treatments , essential tools necessary to tackle DT JJ emergency . 11 NNP 2020 – European solidarity in action – rescEU masks delivered to North Macedonia and Montenegro Following previous deliveries to Italy , Spain and Croatia , additional batches of masks are being delivered to North Macedonia and Montenegro via rescEU – DT common European reserve of JJ equipment to help NNS affected by DT NN outbreak . A first batch of 1,5 million JJ masks was delivered to 17 Member NNPS and DT UK to protect healthcare workers against NN on 8 NNP . Additional weekly instalments of 1,5 million masks will RB be delivered over DT coming six weeks via DT Emergency Support Instrument . Romania and Germany , host DT rescEU reserve and are therefore responsible for procuring DT equipment , while DT Commission finances 100 % of purchase of DT masks and other equipment . More information here . 29 April 2020 – Tackling DT NN crisis : European Commission steps up its support to DT Western Balkans DT European Commission has announced over € 3.3 billion of EU financial support for DT Western Balkans – addressing DT immediate NN and social needs of DT NN pandemic , and DT JJ recovery . In addition to its contribution ahead of DT EU - Western Balkans ’ leaders meeting of 6 NNP 2020 , DT Commission has broadly outlined longer - term support – an JJ and Investment Plan – to be presented in DT autumn . NNP von der Leyen VBD : “ PRP have a special responsibility to assist in this pandemic our partners in DT Western Balkans , as their future clearly lies in European Union . DT EU is mobilising a substantial financial package , confirming DT strong solidarity . Together PRP will overcome this crisis and recover ” . 24 April 2020 – European Commission to shape a common recovery plan with a revamped EU long - term budget at its heart European leaders tasked DT European Commission with shaping a collective response to DT crisis following a videoconference on 23 April . A thorough JJ assessment will soon be under way and DT European budget , clearly linked to DT Recovery Fund , is a NN - tested and a trusted instrument WDT can deliver DT magnitude of tasks behind DT recovery . DT bulk of DT investments will VB to creating investments and JJ cohesion , improving DT Union ’s resilience and autonomy , all while furthering modern policies IN DT European Green Deal and DT digital transition . Solid partnerships in DT EU ’s immediate neighbourhood must RB be strengthened . “ DT next EU long - term budget , our next seven - NN budget , has to adapt to DT JJ circumstances , post - corona crisis . PRP need to increase its firepower to be able to generate DT necessary investment across DT whole European Union , ” VBD NNP von der Leyen . This whole endeavour is about protecting DT Single Market , investments should be front - loaded in DT first NNS and PRP will be necessary to find DT right balance between grants and loans . To swiftly support agricultural sector and food markets following DT outbreak of DT NN , DT European Commission has proposed exceptional measures . DT Commission proposes to grant private storage aid for dairy and meat products , flexibility in DT implementation of market support programmes to refocus funding priorities , and exceptional derogation from EU competition rules to stabilise DT markets in different sectors . For example , DT milk sector will be allowed to collectively plan milk production and DT flower and potatoes sector will be allowed to withdraw products from DT market . Such agreements and decisions MD only be valid for a period of maximum six months . Consumer price movements will be monitored closely to avoid adverse effects . DT Commission aims to have these measures adopted by DT end of April . 16 April – 2020 – NNP von der Leyen : “ DT European budget will be DT mothership of Europe ’s recovery ” Despite Europe ’s collective response being well above € 3 trillion – DT most impressive response in DT NN - more is needed , NNP von der Leyen VBD at DT European Parliament . DT EU budget will be DT mothership of Europe ’s recovery , driving DT economy towards a more green and digital Europe . Investments in large - scale renovation , renewables , clean transport , sustainable food and nature restoration will be more important than before . Using every single euro available has meant investing in DT procurement of JJ equipment , DT development of NNS , securing jobs and supporting business to jumpstart DT economy . NNP von der Leyen concluded with a passionate plea for DT European Union : “ If PRP all stand up for Europe today – with courage , trust and solidarity – I VBP IN tomorrow Europe ’s soul will shine brighter than ever before . ” 14 April 2020 – € 2,7 billion from DT EU budget to support DT healthcare sector To directly support healthcare systems in EU NNS , DT European Commission proposed to activate DT EU ’s Emergency Support Instrument – a measure WDT DT Council quickly approved on 14 April . DT € 2.7 billion Instrument will support DT distribution of protective gear , DT movement of patients to hospitals with free capacity , and to DT development of medication and testing methods . DT instrument will be used together with other EU tools , for example DT rescEU JJ stockpile , which is receiving €300 million in addition to DT initially proposed allocation of € 80 million , to support DT distribution of JJ equipment across DT EU . PRP will RB be possible for individuals , foundations and Member NNPS to make donations and crowd fund . DT Commission proposed to postpone regulations on JJ devices by CD NN to allow manufacturers to focus on DT production of critical JJ devices and avoiding shortages or delays potentially caused by regulatory bodies , thereby and saving lives . DT Commission RB decided to temporarily lift customs duties and VAT on DT import of JJ devices and protective equipment from third NNS . By making DT import of masks , gloves , overalls and other protective equipment in some NNS by up to CD third cheaper , DT decision will further increase DT availability of these critical goods and help those in need . text: This article was updated on June 4 , 2020 Coronaviruses typically affect DT respiratory tracts of birds and mammals , including humans . Doctors associate them with DT common cold , bronchitis , pneumonia , severe acute respiratory syndrome ( SARS ) , and NN NN 2019 ( NNP - CD ) . These viruses can RB affect DT gut . Over DT past 80 NNS , NNS have found IN these viruses can infect mice , rats , dogs , cats , turkeys , horses , pigs , and cattle . Sometimes , these animals transmit DT viruses to humans . Most recently , authorities identified a JJ NN outbreak in NNP WDT has now reached other NNS . DT NN is called severe acute respiratory syndrome NN 2 ( SARS - CoV - 2 ) and PRP can cause NN - CD . In this article , PRP explain DT different types of human NN , their symptoms , and how NNS transmit them . PRP RB focus on three particularly dangerous diseases caused by coronaviruses : NNP - CD , SARS , and Middle East respiratory syndrome ( MERS ) . Stay informed with live updates on DT current NN - CD outbreak and visit our NN hub for more advice on prevention and treatment . Covering DT mouth when sneezing can help stop DT spread of coronaviruses . DT first NNS with NNP - CD had links to an animal and seafood market . This suggests IN animals initially transmitted DT NN to humans . Then , NNS with no connections to DT market developed DT NN , confirming IN humans can pass DT NN to each other . Most NNS who VBP NN - CD will have a mild form of DT NN . According to DT WHO , around 80 % of NNS who VBP NN - CD will recover without needing hospitalization . DT remaining 20 % become seriously ill and develop difficulty breathing . Some groups are more at risk of severe NN , including older adults and NNS with underlying JJ concerns , including high blood pressure , heart and lung problems , diabetes , and cancer . DT mortality rate varies between NNS . In DT U.S. , DT death rate is around 6 % . According to DT CDC , NNS are not at higher risk of NN - CD than adults . DT CDC RB recommend IN infants born to women with suspected or confirmed NN - CD are put into isolation . According to DT CDC , NNS MD start to experience symptoms 2 – 14 days after exposure to DT NN . Symptoms MD include : • JJ loss of taste or smell No NN is currently available for NNP - CD . However , NNS have now replicated DT NN . This MD allow for early detection and treatment in NNS who have DT NN but are not experiencing symptoms . According to DT CDC , DT following groups have a higher risk of developing serious illness from NN - CD : • NNS of any age who have serious underlying JJ conditions , including chronic lung NN , serious heart conditions , severe obesity , a compromised immune system , or diabetes DT CDC note IN although EX have been reports of complications in young NNS , these are rare . NNP - CD most commonly produces mild symptoms in NNS . Cold - or NN - JJ symptoms usually set in around 2 – 4 days after DT infection develops . Typically , DT symptoms are mild , though PRP vary from person to person . In some NNS , NN infections are fatal . While NNS can easily cultivate rhinoviruses — which RB cause DT common cold — in DT laboratory , this is not DT case with coronaviruses . This makes PRP difficult to gauge DT impact of these pathogens . EX is currently no cure for DT cold - JJ illnesses caused by coronaviruses . Treatments include self - care and over - DT - counter medications . Taking DT following steps MD help : A doctor can identify DT NN responsible in a sample of fluid from a person ’s body , such as a sample of blood or mucus from DT nose . Coronaviruses belong to DT subfamily Coronavirinae in DT family Coronaviridae . Different types of NN vary , in terms of DT severity of NN WDT PRP cause and how far PRP spread . Doctors currently recognize seven types of NN WDT can infect humans . Rarer strains WDT cause more severe illnesses include MERS - CoV , which causes DT NN MERS , and SARS - CoV , DT NN responsible for SARS . text: Measles , or rubeola , is a viral infection WDT starts in DT respiratory system . PRP still remains a significant cause of death worldwide , despite DT availability of a safe , effective NN . EX were about 110,000 JJ deaths related to measles in 2017 , most of them in NNS under DT age of 5 , according to DT . Measles NNS have RB been increasing in DT NNP NNPS in recent NNS . Learn more about DT symptoms of measles , how PRP spreads , and how PRP can be prevented . Measles is caused by infection with a NN from DT paramyxovirus family . Viruses are tiny parasitic microbes . Once PRP ’ve been infected , DT NN invades host cells and uses cellular components to complete its life cycle . DT measles NN infects DT respiratory tract first . However , PRP eventually spreads to other parts of DT body through DT bloodstream . Measles is only known to occur in humans and not in other animals . EX are known genetic types of measles , although only 6 are currently circulating . Measles can be spread through DT air from respiratory droplets and small aerosol particles . An infected person can release DT NN into DT air when PRP cough or sneeze . These respiratory particles can RB settle on objects and surfaces . PRP can become infected if PRP come into contact with a contaminated object , such as a door handle , and then touch your face , nose , or mouth . DT measles NN can live outside of DT body for longer than PRP MD VB . In fact , PRP can remain infectious in DT air or on surfaces for up to . Measles is highly contagious . This means IN DT infection can spread very easily from person to person . A susceptible person WDT ’s exposed to DT measles NN has a 90 percent chance of becoming infected . Additionally , an infected person can VB on to spread DT NN to anywhere between 9 and 18 susceptible individuals . A person WDT has measles can spread DT NN to others before PRP even VBP IN PRP have PRP . An infected person is contagious for four days before DT characteristic rash appears . After DT rash appears , PRP ’re still contagious for another four days . DT main risk factor for catching measles is being unvaccinated . Additionally , some groups are at a higher risk of developing complications from measles infection , including young NNS , NNS with a weakened immune system , and pregnant women . If PRP suspect IN PRP have measles or have been exposed to someone with measles , contact your doctor immediately . PRP can evaluate PRP and direct PRP where to be seen to determine if PRP have DT infection . Doctors can confirm measles by examining your skin rash and checking for symptoms WDT are characteristic of DT NN , such as white spots in DT mouth , fever , cough , and sore throat . If PRP suspect PRP MD have measles based on your history and observation , your doctor will order a blood test to check for DT measles NN . EX ’s no specific treatment for measles . Unlike bacterial infections , viral infections are n’t sensitive to antibiotics . DT NN and symptoms typically disappear in about two or three weeks . EX are some interventions available for NNS who MD have been exposed to DT NN . These can help prevent an infection or lessen its severity . PRP include : • a measles NN , given within 72 hours of exposure • a dose of immune proteins called immunoglobulin , taken within six days of exposure Your doctor MD recommend DT following to help PRP recover : • rest to help boost your immune system Although PRP ’s often associated with childhood illness , adults can VB measles too . NNS who are n’t vaccinated are at a higher risk of catching DT NN . PRP ’s generally accepted IN adults born during or before 1957 are naturally immune to measles . This is because DT NN was first licensed in 1963 . Before then , most NNS had been naturally exposed to DT infection by their adolescent NNS and became immune as a result . According to DT , serious complications are not only more common in young NNS , but RB in adults over DT age of 20 . These complications can include things IN pneumonia , encephalitis , and blindness . If PRP ’re an adult who has n’t been vaccinated or is n’t sure of their NN status , PRP should see your doctor to receive DT NN . At least CD dose of DT NN is recommended for unvaccinated adults . DT measles NN is n’t given to NNS until PRP ’re at least 12 months old . Before receiving their first dose of DT NN is DT NN PRP ’re most vulnerable to being infected with DT measles NN . Babies receive some protection from measles through passive immunity , which is provided from mother to child through DT placenta and during breastfeeding . However , has shown IN this immunity can be lost in just over 2.5 months after birth or DT NN breastfeeding is discontinued . NNS under 5 NNS of age are more likely to have complications due to measles . These can include things IN pneumonia , encephalitis , and ear infections WDT can result in hearing loss . DT incubation period of an infectious NN is DT NN WDT passes between exposure and when symptoms develop . DT incubation period for measles is between 10 and 14 days . After DT initial incubation period , PRP MD begin to experience nonspecific symptoms , such as fever , cough , and runny nose . DT rash will begin to develop several days later . PRP ’s important to remember IN PRP can still spread DT infection to others for four days prior to developing DT rash . If PRP VBP PRP ’ve been exposed to measles and have n’t been vaccinated , PRP should contact your doctor as soon as possible . In addition to a classic measles infection , EX are RB several other types of measles infections WDT PRP can VB . Atypical measles occurs in NNS who received a killed measles NN between 1963 and 1967 . When exposed to measles , these individuals come down with an illness WDT has symptoms such as high fever , rash , and sometimes pneumonia . Modified measles occurs in NNS who ’ve been given post - exposure immunoglobulin and in infants who still have some passive immunity . Modified measles is typically milder than a regular case of measles . Hemorrhagic measles is rarely reported in DT NNP NNPS . PRP causes symptoms IN high fever , seizures , and bleeding into DT skin and mucus membranes . PRP MD have heard rubella referred to as “ German measles . ” But measles and rubella are actually caused by two different viruses . Rubella is n’t as contagious as measles . However , PRP can cause serious complications if a woman develops DT infection while pregnant . Even though different viruses cause measles and rubella , PRP ’re RB similar in several ways . This is called congenital measles . Babies with congenital measles have a rash after birth or develop CD shortly afterward . PRP ’re at an increased risk of complications , which can be life - threatening . If PRP ’re pregnant , do n’t have immunity to measles , and believe IN PRP ’ve been exposed , PRP should contact your doctor immediately . Receiving an injection of immunoglobulin MD help to prevent an infection . Measles has a low death rate in healthy NNS and adults , and most NNS who contract DT measles NN recover fully . DT risk of complications is higher in DT following groups : Approximately of NNS with measles experience CD or more complications . Measles can lead to life - threatening complications , such as pneumonia and inflammation of DT brain ( encephalitis ) . Other complications associated with measles MD include : • pregnancy complications , such as miscarriage or preterm labor • subacute sclerosing panencephalitis ( SSPE ) , a rare degenerative condition of DT nervous system WDT develops NNS after infection PRP ca n’t VB measles more than once . After PRP ’ve had DT NN , PRP ’re immune for life . However , measles and its potential complications are preventable through NN . NN not only protects PRP and your family , but RB prevents DT measles NN from circulating in your community and affecting those who ca n’t be vaccinated .

text: EX are 4 groups of NNS who are advised to VB vaccinated against pneumococcal infections : • anyone from DT ages of 2 to 64 with a NN condition WDT increases their risk of pneumococcal infection • anyone at occupational risk , such as welders Babies are routinely vaccinated with a type of pneumococcal NN known as DT pneumococcal conjugate NN ( PCV ) as part of their childhood NN programme . text: JJ NN NN makers have been rolling out details about their manufacturing and launch plans — even ahead of any clinical data . Pfizer plans to draw on sites in Kalamazoo , Michigan , and Andover , Massachusetts , as well as St. Louis for DT early stages of its mRNA NN ramp - up . DT company is in human testing with four candidates alongside partner BioNTech , which will supply doses for clinical testing . DT company plans raw material manufacturing in St. Louis and drug substance manufacturing in Andover . DT Kalamazoo site is slated to handle formulation and filling . Aside from Pfizer 's U.S. sites , DT drugmaker has identified a plant in Puurs , Belgium , as a NN - CD NN manufacturing center . DT company plans to select other sites as well . For its part , BioNTech intends to add capacity at two of its facilities in Germany . Even though DT partners just entered human testing and have n't reported any data , Pfizer employees are taking steps to prepare for DT possible rollout now . IN other companies , Pfizer is doing DT work “ at risk , ” or before DT NN demonstrates efficacy , to cut crucial NN PRP MD take to launch if DT data turn out positive . text: DT toddler months continue to bring DT JJ challenges of colds , scrapes and bruises , and other minor emergencies . text: A NNP NN test patient VBD he fainted and felt sicker than ever after getting DT Moderna injection , reports say . Ian Haydon , 29 , from Seattle was CD of four volunteers who reacted badly during DT NNP - CD clinical trials run by Moderna , who touted DT positive early findings . DT communications manager developed DT chills and a a 103.2 - degree fever hours after getting his second dose of DT trial drug , reported STAT NNP . Other symptoms he started exhibiting included nausea and severe aches in his muscles , prompting his worried girlfriend to call DT NN 's 24 - hour hotline . Haydon and his partner were told to VB to an urgent care as soon as possible and PRP arrived at 5 am . Rather than VBG to hospital , he opted to VB home and VB some much - needed rest after taking some Tylenol . But even after a nap , Hayden still had a 101.5 temperature and felt so sick IN he vomited in DT bathroom , he told DT publication . He recalled how on his way back to DT bedroom , he RB fainted – but thankfully his girlfriend was RB to protect his head from cracking on DT floor . DT couple were forced to call DT trial 's doctors again but Haydon staged home and rested and his temperature fell later on DT evening . Haydon told CNN 's Anderson Cooper IN his initially hid his " rough " reaction to DT jab for fear of Haydon initially hid DT full drama of his reaction . Although he told CNN ’s Anderson Cooper IN he had a “ rough NN of things for 24 hours , " he tweeted IN he kept his experience under wraps for fear of “ triggering anti-vax " NNS . “ I understand IN sharing DT story , PRP ’s VBG to be frightening to some NNS , ” he told STAT NNP . “ I hope IN PRP does n’t fuel any sort of general antagonism towards NNS in general or towards even this NN . ” But Haydon RB revealed IN he took a dose ten times stronger than other NNS and he " learned recently IN 2 other high - dose participants MD have had something similar . " “ EX ’s no failure here — this is a big reason why PRP do clinical trials , ” he wrote in a series of tweets . “ Even safe meds ca n’t be taken at 10 x doses . “ PRP ’re over , and I ’m back to marathon training . ” In DT wake of his experience , Haydon VBD he is “ cautiously optimistic ” about a NN . “ NNS are DT single most important medicines PRP have . PRP ’s important to test them carefully — which is what ’s happening here , ” he added in DT Twitter thread . “ What I went through pales in comparison to being hospitalized with NNP - CD . Or to DT pain of losing a loved NN to DT pandemic . " His comments come as DT NNP NN death topped 100,000 on Wednesday afternoon . Other trials are still underway , including DT American company Novavax , which began their NN testing in Australia this week .
