text: VB breaking NN alerts and special reports . DT NN and stories WDT matter , delivered weekday mornings . PRP ’s getting ugly out RB on social NN . Anti-vaccine activists are attacking pediatricians head to head on Twitter , Facebook and other social NN platforms , and PRP ’re not hesitating to make their attacks personal . A few fed - up doctors are fighting back , both online and , more recently , in DT courts . CD pediatrician , Dr. Eve Switzer of Enid , Oklahoma , filed a defamation suit last NN against former Oklahoma ophthalmologist Jim Meehan and Oklahomans for NNP and NNP Choice , saying PRP publicly and falsely accused her of failing to provide informed consent to parents about vaccinations . “ Anti-vaxxers have gotten out of control , ” Switzer told NBC NNP . “ As a pediatrician , DT way IN PRP has affected me personally , my practice and my staff , even , I really felt IN I needed to have some sort of remedy and my only remedy was a legal remedy . ” PRP 's difficult enough to counter DT continual questions raised by NN skeptics and activists who , increasingly , say all NNS are unsafe for all NNS . Worries about NN , a preservative called thimerosal , DT spacing of NNS , NN ingredients and whether kids VBP too JJ NNS have all been repeatedly and thoroughly addressed , but DT does n’t stop users of social NN from bringing them up again and again . “ VBG up against DT anti-vaccine movement is a thankless task for a number of reasons . For CD , DT goalpost is moving , ” VBD Dr. Peter Hotez , director of DT Texas NNP 's Hospital Center for NNP Development and dean of DT school of tropical medicine at Baylor College of Medicine . “ So if PRP can explain why MMR ( measles , mumps and rubella ) NN does n’t cause NN , PRP ’ll turn around and say well PRP must be thimerosal in NNS . If PRP debunk this , then PRP ’ll say ‘ well PRP are spacing NNS too close together ’ and if PRP debunk DT and then PRP ’s aluminum in NNS , ” he added . Using social NN takes PRP to a JJ level . Just as online NNS allow NNS to stay in their own political echo chambers , viewing and sharing only their own beliefs , use of social NN is allowing NN skeptics to harden their messages . Facebook feeds offer continual validation with video after video of parents who say PRP believe NNS gave their NNS eczema or asthma or even killed their babies — claims made with no JJ backing . And on Twitter , any post about DT benefits of NNS — all supported by decades of NN — is often immediately attacked . Most recently , a Detroit - area mother jailed for a week for refusing to follow a court order WDT involved vaccinating her kids got an instant support group . Although DT judge in DT case , Circuit Court Judge Karen McDonald , made PRP clear DT sentence was about disregarding a court order WDT Bredow had initially agreed to , Bredow herself and anti-vaccine groups framed PRP as having taken a stand for her beliefs . In reality , EX is no legitimate debate about DT safety or benefits of NNS . While no JJ group claims NNS are 100 percent safe , DT Centers for NNP Control and Prevention , National Institutes of NNP , and dozens of academic researchers independent of DT federal NN have shown DT benefits of NNS both to individual NNS and adults and to DT population at large . “ Childhood NN saves up to 3 million lives every NN , but 1.5 million NNS still die each NN from diseases WDT MD have been prevented by NNS , ” DT nonprofit Sabin NNP Institute says . But PRP might not VB IN if PRP take a look at social NN . “ PRP ’s more systematic and more aggressive and more effective , ” VBD Hotez , who is RB a pediatrician , DT parent of a young woman with NN , and a vocal advocate for NN . “ EX ’s a JJ element to DT anti-vaccine group WDT has sort of an alt - right flavor to PRP . ” Theodore Tomeny of DT psychology department of DT University of Alabama and colleagues tracked Twitter activity and found more than 270,000 tweets containing anti-vaccine statements between 2009 and 2015 — half of all DT tweets PRP found about NNS in general . California , Connecticut , Massachusetts , NNP York and Pennsylvania were particularly rich in anti-vaccine Twitter users . “ PRP found IN anti-vaccine sentiment seems to be prevalent on Twitter , ” Tomeny VBD . “ PRP RB seems to cluster geographically . PRP observed spikes over NN WDT seemed to be associated with current events IN CD of DT recent measles outbreaks in California . ” PRP not only repeat untrue rumors about NNS , but accuse NN and academic doctors of colluding with pharmaceutical companies to cover up DT dangers of NNS , without real evidence to back up these accusations . Pediatricians , JJ NN experts and others MD do well to monitor this type of social NN use and counter its influence , Tomeny and colleagues wrote in DT October issue of DT journal Social NNP & Medicine . DT instinct for some MD be to just turn them off . “ Thank god for DT mute and block function , ” Hotez VBD . But Hotez says PRP ’s RB important to counter some of DT more viral wrong stuff . Related : Detroit Mom Jailed , But Was PRP Really About NNS ? “ I VBP PRP ’s very important to VB DT facts out RB . So I have put a lot of effort into explaining why NNS do n’t cause NN , ” he VBD . “ DT argument IN measles is not dangerous — I VBP DT is important to refute . DT allegation IN I am making millions of dollars off my NN — I VBP PRP ’s important to refute DT . ” Texas NNP 's took over work from DT Sabin NNP Institute to develop NNS to prevent parasitic diseases such as hookworm and schistosomiasis . “ PRP do n’t seem to understand IN these are NNS for DT NN ’s poorest NNS WDT will never make any money , ” Hotez VBD . PRP ’s not difficult to find personal attacks against Hotez on DT internet , including blogs WDT outright call him a liar . Dr. Paul Offit of NNP ’s Hospital of Philadelphia is a veteran of such personal attacks WDT even extended to threats against his kids . But with universal access to social NN giving a platform to anyone with a smartphone , any pediatrician who is vocal about DT anti-vaccine movement , or who even posts something JJ about DT benefits of NNS , can be targeted . Tomeny VBD PRP MD be DT impersonal aspect of social NN . “ Perhaps PRP ’s DT fact IN PRP is not face - to - face communication , ” he VBD . “ PRP are not having to view DT other person ’s reactions and temper your statements based on PRP . ” Switzer has found IN to be DT case . While she finds PRP easy to answer polite questions from parents in her office , she ’s had a different experience online . “ Most of what I VBP WDT ’s confrontational is on social NN , ” she VBD . “ This is a group of NNS who when I say anti-vaxxers , these are DT NNS I am talking about — DT NNS who are confrontational . PRP adamantly believe IN NNS are n’t safe or effective . PRP really prefer to perpetuate myths about them , things WDT NN just does n’t support . ” JJ parents who MD not be familiar with DT JJ evidence MD hear some of these claims and wonder if PRP are true . “ Sometimes all PRP takes is implanting DT teeny little bit of doubt into a parent , ” Switzer VBD . “ So if PRP ignore these anti-vaccine NNS with all of DT nonsense WDT PRP are putting on social NN , I really feel IN IN PRP gives them a greater voice . I VBP more pediatricians should be involved in putting stuff out on social NN to counter DT misleading and just blatantly false information WDT PRP use . ” So Switzer is not only taking DT case NN . She ’s RB suing , and another group of pediatricians say PRP have filed a formal complaint again Meehan with DT Oklahoma NNP Board of NNP Licensure . “ PRP , DT undersigned , wish to file a formal complaint against James C. Meehan , MD , for his unprofessional behavior on social NN directed at each of PRP , ” DT complaint reads . PRP 's signed by eight physicians and JJ students , including Dr. Christopher Johnson , a pediatric critical care specialist in Santa Fe who lists a torrent of abusive tweets from Meehan in DT complaint , as well as Dr. Alastair McAlpine of Red Cross NNP 's Hospital in Cape Town , South Africa , RB a Meehan target . Lyle Kelsey , executive director of DT board , VBD he MD not confirm or deny IN DT report had been filed until DT board decided to investigate , a process , he VBD , DT MD take months . But PRP ’s not hard to find Meehan ’s combative posts on Twitter . “ DT level of ignorance & amount of misinformation parroted by these JJ doctors should & will haunt them as DT truth of harm is exposed , ” Meehan says in CD . Meehan , an ophthalmologist by training , says he now has a “ wellness ” practice in Tulsa . “ Scott , only a bottom of DT med school class , weak , bought , anti-science , vax pusher look ( sic ) PRP MD argue EX is no debate IN NNS , ” Meehan blasts in another directed at Dr. Scott Krugman , chairman of DT Department of Pediatrics at MedStar Franklin Square NNP Center in Perry Hall , Maryland . “ I will not be engaging , but this is a nice example of what this crew does to pediatricians on a daily basis , ” Krugman VBD . Meehan is just as combative in person . “ No NN wants to debate me , ” he told NBC NNP . And , he and other experts point out , DT anti-vaccination arguments are doing real harm . Earlier this month a NN published in DT Journal of DT American NNP Association showed measles outbreaks are probably caused by NNS failing to vaccinate their NNS .

( This is just an informal expression of interest , not a binding contract . ) DT site , which was inspired by DT scholarly article , launched in mid-April and is premised on DT claim IN shaving even CD day from DT long - distance race for a NNP - CD NN MD save up to 7,120 lives .
